title: Great weekend getaway
review: Everything was great! All employees were helpful and smiling. Love the restaurant and bar on site makes it very convenient . The pool was clean as were all other areas. We will definitely be returning.

title: Great location
review: Thank you!  We're delighted you enjoying your getaway here and please know we appreciate your kind words!  We do appreciate the compliments to our staff - everyone here wants each guest to enjoy a fabulous vacation!  Looking forward to your next visit with us.  Please stay in touch on our Facebook page!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice but needs updated
review: Have stayed here several times before.  Latest was for the Clearwater Holiday Jazz Festival on Oct 19th.  Great location, service and Jimmy's Fish house on site restaurant food was great also. They even gave me an upgraded suite room centrally located facing the gulf!!!!

title: Excellent
review: Thank you!  We're pleased you enjoyed your stay and had opportunity to enjoy some fabulous music at Clearwater Jazz Holiday!    We hear similar comments on our central location from many of our guests - it's so easy to get to beach, marina, shopping and restaurants!  So glad you enjoyed that beautiful gulf view - and we sure hope you'll return as soon as you can!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Our new get away hotel...
review: All of the staff we interacted with at this hotel were very friendly which made the stay more enjoyable. The rooms were clean with comfortable beds. The suite was 2 connecting rooms with one set with beds & the other as a living room with kitchenette.The lobby needs serious updates. Furniture looks like it is from the 50's or 60's.   Jimmy's restaurant on site was a nice feature. We ate there all 4 nights of our stay. The food was wonderful, but I a bit expensive in my opinion.

title: Aging hotel but good location and views
review: We stayed 1 night and if it weren't for the stunning view off our balcony I would have rated this hotel as overpriced for what you get.  The hotel is in bad need of updating and an overhaul.  The old gold wallpaper in our bathroom was peeling and the grout around the dated tiles was crumbling out.  However,  the room seemed clean and we sat out on the balcony enjoying a beautiful view right on the water.  We walked 10 minutes one direction for a nice Italian dinner and again for a good breakfast, and then about 6 minutes the other way to the beach.  I would stay again in the future if they update the rooms.

title: Perfect for Families
review: Hello and thank you for writing about your stay with us.  We appreciate your candor and do indeed share it with our top management team.    Please know that renovations are also on our radar.  Sometimes we need to give priority to the physical plant instead of beautifications, but indeed we have them as part of our ongoing plan.  We're glad you stayed with us and enjoyed the proximity to the beach and the fabulous views -- hopefully you arrived in time for a brilliant sunset!  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook.  We'd love to see you return.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great for a mini vacation
review: We booked a suite - which was basically a bedroom and a living room connected. It was perfect for our four kids. The hotel is on the water, but not on the actual beach. You have to walk about five minutes for beach access, but we liked the pool better anyway. The pool sits right along the water so you have a beautiful view of the boats and the water. There's a great restaurant connected to the hotel, where we ate dinner every evening because kids eat free! We did not enjoy the breakfast there as the food was very bland, but the menu for lunch and dinner was excellent and we were so happy with the affordable prices. There's an arcade in the hotel as well, where my kids racked up tickets and were allowed to trade them in for little treats in the gift shop. At sunset, if you're…

title: Another great stay at this wonderful property
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and took time to write about it.  Your comments help others decide what we have to offer and we appreciate your comments (sorry about the breakfast issue!) and do hope you'll be back with us for more fun on Clearwater Beach!  Our thanks for visiting!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: My husband whisked me away for the weekend to celebrate our anniversary and my birthday.    The good:  Jimmy's Fish house was fabulous.  The garlic butter oysters were our favorite appetizer.  My husband loved the all you can eat fish on Friday night.  Their World famous bloody Mary for breakfast on Sat was worth that title.  So delish.  Live music played both nights.  The not so good:  Our room was on the 6th floor.  We got in around 6pm on Friday so there were no "gulf" view rooms left which we were sad about but not surprised being that we got there late.  The building is old, this is very apparent in the carpeting on the 6th floor.  Old I can handle, filthy not so much.  It was really dirty.  The room itself was showing it's age as well.  The sliding door to the balcony was…

title: Nice hotel
review: Had an overnight stay here. All the amenities you would want with free WiFi.   Rooms where a good size, clean and tidy.  Ideally situated to walk the area and access bars and restaurants.   Downside you have to pay extra for parking at the hotel.

title: Long Weekend Getaway
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you chose to stay with us and had a very enjoyable vacation on Clearwater Beach.  Re: parking - mostly all resorts on Clearwater Beach have separate parking fees, made necessary because of the shortage of space here.  We try to keep them as low as possible - and - a tip is that some people choose to arrive from the airport either by public shuttle or Uber and use the Jolley Trolley - (or walk ) - to get around to shops, restaurant or beach.  Sure hope you'll be back with us for more fun in the sun!  Thanks again.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 50th Birthday Get A Way
review: Probably the best hotel I've every stayed at.  The hotel was clean, and the staff super friendly.  Jimmy's restaurant/bar was amazing.  Food and drinks couldn't have been better.  Great views. Nice pool.  Walking distance to everything and the dolphins jumping around just make you smile.  I will definitely be back.

title: Budget Friendly, not disappointed
review: Thank you!  It pleases us so much to hear from guests who enjoy their stay here.  We're glad the dolphins made it even more fun (we never get tired of seeing them either!) and hopefully you caught a glorious sunset or two!  Please stay in touch on our Facebook page for reasons to come back - and we look forward to when you can return!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General​ Manager

title: My Daughter’s Wedding
review: My boyfriend and I were celebrating his birthday. The hotel was clean, the staff was accommodating. We enjoyed Jimmy’s Fish House. The deck seating was great. The deck is over the Gulf which makes for great  ambience. The food was good. The mixed drinks were ok at best. (My only negative)  We enjoyed sitting at the pool with the Gulf of Mexico at your feet.   Breathtaking!   The public beach is within walking distance. (600 feet).  We had a great stay. Highly recommended

title: Not terrible, but not great
review: Found a piece of hair in the shower as soon as I walked in . Our air conditioner broke on the first night so we had to switch rooms. Iron didn’t work. Not a perfect stay at the least. For the price I guess you get what you pay for.

title: It was okay
review: Thank you for writing a review and we're sorry your a/c broke and that you had issues with housekeeping. We're glad you reported it so we could make corrections for you and apologize for any inconvenience.  We hope that ultimately you left with good memories of your beach holiday.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: this is an irresponsible hotel
review: We were traveling and we were trying to find a place to stay for the night and we decided on Clearwater. According to my gps there was a Holiday Inn so I called.  I was immediately placed on hold when I called. No problem- they were busy and I get that. On the recording while on hold it said this is a NEW Holiday Inn and was on the Gulf of Mexico. Awesome! Just what I had hoped for- newer, on the water and a Holiday Inn, which are usually very nice.  I arrive to find an attendant in the middle of the driveway parking lot. He let us drive right past so not sure what he was there for. I go in to ask about a room and I am told there is a $20 parking fee. Uh...okay. Why didn't I get told that over the phone? (However, the people coming in for the restaurant on the top floor also…

title: Brief 2 night stay was fairly decent.
review: Hello and thanks for your comments on your recent visit.  Please know we want each customer to have a wonderful experience and we're sorry we did not live up to your expectations. To address a few of your issues, our reservationists are trained to answer questions that potential guests have, so unless you had inquired about parking or complimentary breakfast or extra bedding or whatever your needs were, they would not have volunteered that. As far as not being on the beach, you are correct, but our website does not indicate we are "on the beach".  We do abut the water of Clearwater Pass and - as you found out - we are less than a five-minute walk (or trolley ride) to the public beach.   No, we are not new and we will review the recording.  With any issue you had such as the door, had you called or stopped down, we would have had maintenance address it.  We're sorry you were disappointed but even though you do not plan to return, we hope you do return to Clearwater Beach for a holiday in the sun.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice place
review: I stayed at this place for couple of days.  Air-conditioning was not working midnight and they moved us to different room. I understand, A/C may go wrong sometimes.   But, few days later, when I checked my credit card, there is an additional 235$ charge . I called the hotel and asked about 235$. They said, it’s charged accidentally and we will refund in 5 days.  I called the corporate office to expresss my disappointment.  I told them, “if they charged me 235$, why did they give me only 44$ Parking receipt during check out and said, you are all set , as you paid thru Priceline”.  they hung up on me while I was talking .   I paid huge amount to reserve this hotel. And I had the worst experience.   I am glad that there are review websites like this, so I can at least tell the…

title: Don't waste your time with this hotel
review: There is NO beach access.  They advertise on the Holiday Inn website 400 steps to beach access....NOPE.  Go somewhere else!!!!  You can not see sunsets even with a gulf view room.so don't pay for that either.  No FREE breakfast like most Holiday Inn's.  The restaurant is understaffed for breakfast so be prepared to wait.  The windows to our room are covered with bird poop....isn't that lovely!  And twice now people have just walked into our room unannounced.  Housekeeping at 8:30 in the morning.....really!!  Hotel hallways are so dirty.  Need I say more?  Thank heaven it was only for two nights!

title: ANOTHER GOOD STAY
review: We value your opinion but, as you can read by other recent reviewers, many others have found our hotel to be to their liking and satisfaction.  May I ask you to reach out to me personally via email so I can address all the issues you have mentioned?  My email is:  CBottger@clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com.  Thank you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Amazing views
review: Great location and friendly staff. Within walking distance to the beach and most restaurants. Sunsets are absolutely amazing! We stayed in March 2019 and the hotel has done a very nice job of restricting college spring breakers. Good place for families. The pool man did get a little carried away when he saw I had two towels and two lounge chairs while waiting for my wife. He yelled across the pool at me to let me know I was in violation of his pool regulations. A little embarrassing but I would still recommend.

title: View & Value
review: Thank you!  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us (and we apologize for the comments of our overzealous pool man.  Please know that will be addressed with our department head.  So glad you enjoyed the spectacular sunset views!  Hope you brought your camera to capture the magic!  We appreciate your recommendation and hope you'll be back with us again for more fun on Clearwater Beach, rated #1 U.S. Beach by Trip Advisor!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: You Can See The Sunset!
review: 5 nights in July, 2019. We booked a two-room suite with a gulf view. This consisted of 2 queen beds in one room and a living room area with a pullout couch and mini kitchen area in the other room. We had no idea the room would have two full bathrooms so that was an added bonus. The rooms and bathrooms were large and clean and the views from the balcony were stunning. We were on the third floor overlooking the pool and gulf. I would imagine any lower wouldn't be as good and higher floors may even be better. The beds were very comfortable and I like that they offer soft and firm pillows that are labeled.  The pool was huge and a perfect temperature. Around the pool area the were games to play. The restaurant had a beautiful outdoor deck to sit on with live music which was great…

title: Reservations
review: I have never been at this hotel so I don't know about services and rooms but the reservations department it's really bad, they try to sell you the reservations on a tricky way with a lot of not clear negotiation and lying to the customers, after we agree on a deal the confirmation email I received didn't match what was discussed with Ana that's the reason I decided to cancel my reservation and go to another hotel after dealing with her for long 30 minutes and making me waste my time and feeling disrespected and mistreated.

title: Clean
review: Thank you very much for writing to us about this.  This is definitely not the experience that Holiday Inn sets for its high standards.  Is it possible that you could email me directly with your confirmation number so I can determine who took your reservation and follow up on this?  You can reach me at: CBottger@clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com.   Just indicate that you are following up on your Trip Advisor review.  Thank you and please accept our apologies.  We look forward to hearing from you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice Hotel but not for Kids
review: We got a great rate on this hotel. Love the location, love the pool, love the bar at the pool, love the restaurant. They put us in a corner room with a great view of the ocean. Did not expect the view. The beds are new. The room definitely needs a redo. Bath room is very scuffed up. Carpet is worn out. Towels and hot water were plentiful. So didn’t bother us too much. I will ask if rooms are redone before our next visit.

title: Can't wait to come back!
review: Thank you!  We're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us - and so pleased you enjoyed the thrilling view!    Please know we value guest feedback and share it with the proper department heads.  As to renovations, we are always in process of doing upgrades, be it to the physical plant (as in A/C, etc.) or room and public area improvement, so we're always a working in progress!  Please do come back - we'd love to have you!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Close to beach
review: My family and I stayed at this hotel after 3 days at Legoland for some down time. We have never been to Clearwater before and the views are beautiful. I thought from looking at the photos on the hotel website that it was on the beach but it is not. It is actually rocky in front of the hotel and it overlooks a kind of bay. You have to walk on the street past 3 other hotels to reach the beach.  The sofa bed in the room was awful. My teenaged daughter ended up pulling the mattress in the floor and sleeping as she said it was more comfortable! I asked at the front desk about extra padding or something that we could use to make the pull out bed more comfortable. They said they were in the process of updating and the sofas were scheduled to be replaced. They sent up another mattress…

title: 4 night ‘relax’ after Orlando - was ok
review: Just returned home from a 4 night stay after a busy 10 days in Orlando.  We were a party of 3, myself my fiancé and our 2 year old son. We were unaware that this was quite a lively ‘drinking’ hotel and for the first 2 nights were rudely woken up early hours of the morning by drunk people running up and down the corridor and at one point was knocking on people’s doors! At 7 months pregnant I didn’t feel comfortable confronting them but was really annoyed about this. (I appreciate this is not the hotels fault however it had a negative impact on our stay).  Another negative was the pool, we had just returned from a holiday inn in Orlando that supplied floats and pool games for children however there was nothing of the sort here. I’m only 5ft and could hardly stand up anywhere in…

title: The tale of the awful sofa bed-The breakfast that’s not a breakfast -And great customer service from Marcus Greene
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience with us.  Please know that guest feedback is important to us and it is shared with top management so that we can correct any issues and learn from our guests if they have suggestions or recommendations on how we may make their stay a wonderful experience.  Regarding the noise - we completely understand that you come for a relaxing stay and excessive noise at night can be a hindrance to good sleep.  Our security team would have addressed this immediately.  Please accept our apologies on the balcony lock and the time it took to correct it.  This has been taken up with our department head so no other guests will have this issue.  We do hope you left Clearwater Beach with good memories and we would love to have you consider us again.  Please know that you can always reach out to me personally if any incidents arise that are not addressed properly.  Thank you,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Location Location Location
review: Ok - so my fourth year staying here- ( still no refurb) Looking tired in places! Party of 6 checked into a suite. 2 queen beds and a sofa bed. Sofa bed NOT fit for purpose. No support curls in the middle. Not what you would expect for a $250 dollar room plus €20 parking - plus occupancy tax -  So went to front desk at 9am - reported issue- had to return at 1pm then again at 3pm. Told bed was fixed - still the same - had minor words with lady on front desk who was beyond rude to me-  In stepped a guy called Marcus Green ( thank god!) Arranged a room swap the next day to a better room- Thank you for saving my vacation. This guy was good .. great customer service ethic - if your listening IHG - he’s one for future prospects... Now the breakfast that’s not a breakfast. When you buy…

title: Double Queen Jr Suite
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay.  We can only say - we apologize.  We're so sorry you had issues with the sofa bed and we regret that your issue was not addressed.  We have taken this up with our Chief Engineer with the hope that no other guests will be experiencing what you did. As far as the breakfasts are concerned, that is an IHG policy.  If you want to reach out directly to them with your recommendation, we are sure they will respond.  And, we are always having renovations in the works - sometimes you can see them and sometimes they are in the physical plant (a/c's, plumbing, etc.) but we regularly schedule renovations.  We're glad you ending on a positive note and hope that was in part because you enjoyed the beautiful Clearwater Beach area and took away good memories.  We thank you for being an IHG member and staying with us and send all kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Thanks
review: Awesome location ,good service, Most everything is walking distance,a lots to do so what ever you’re into pack it up and go cuz you can probably get it done the street performers are a plus in the clearwater plaza fun fun fun in the sun sun sun!!!

title: Wonderful stay
review: We stayed here for a couple of nights before going home and we had a lovely break. Staff are wonderful, room was huge and very clean. Bathroom was also clean and spacious. The beds were super comfy with squishy pillows. The pool area was very clean with plenty of towels and loungers. The view was perfect and overlooking the sea. We will definitely return.

title: Desperate need for renovations and improved hospitality
review: Thank you so much - we're delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and do appreciate that you took time to let us know.  Please know that your compliments on our staff will be shared - our team wants each guest to have a pleasant experience and we're certainly glad you did.  Enjoy your beach memories until you can return again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Clearwater
review: We arrived here around 2 in the afternoon, told we could check in early. We waited for our room until 5pm. The first set of keys did not work and our door was so old that it was jammed shut by a piece of metal. The smell of bleach when entering the room absolutely bowled me over and we breathed it in along with our children the entire stay. Not to mention this hotel is in need of serious renovations. The furniture is very old and very dirty.   Our family has a few food allergies which I thought the kitchen might accommodate. Mikey our server quickly informed us that the kitchen can’t accommodate food allergies and that the only safe item on the menu was salad. Normally restaurants have means to cook food without allergens - like steaming broccoli or chicken. Not Jimmys. Our…

title: Definitely stay again
review: Please know that we value each guest's feedback and share comments with our top management team.  In your case, I would ask that you email me directly with details of when you stayed and the issues you had. I would like to respond to you personally.   Please know however, that Jimmy's Fish House has a separate management team (and a separate TripAdvisor page) so you may want to reach out to them directly.  I look forward to hearing from you because it is our desire that each guest has a stay that meets their expectations.  Christine Bottger General Manager CBottger@clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com

title: Bad
review: Over all the trip was great.  Very nice restaurant downstairs with good food, and right on the water to watch the sunset.  My only complaint, is that you have to pay $20 a day to park in the garage, while paying to stay there, the same cost that anyone off the street has to pay jus to park and go to the beach.  I feel like if I am paying to stay at your location, I should NOT have to pay the same as someone else who isn't.

title: Clean and Tidy in a great location
review: Stayed here with my family, 2 adults and 2 children We had a suite which was clean and tidy with plenty of room The room wasn't modern but still adequate for our short stay The staff were great on reception and the pool and bar were also very good i would not hesitate to stay here again

title: Good overall
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay with us - and a wonderful vacation on Clearwater Beach.  Please know we thank you for choosing us and are excited to hear you may join us again.  There's always something fun to do in Clearwater!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great place to stay
review: Nice. Hotel. Decor / furniture very dated but you go there for the views and the service not the furniture. I had room that was permanently in shade but visited pool and bar and walked to beach. Would go again

title: Best location to celebrate Graduation!
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  Please know we value your input and that we share it with our top management team.  Renovations and maintenance are always on schedule here so the issues you addressed are already on our radar.  We're so glad you found the location to your liking and look forward to your next stay.  There is always somethng fun to do in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great pool area and view!
review: We loved the hotel and the restaurant connected was awesome! It’s walkable to the beach and in a really great area. We’d definitely recommend it for couples or for families. The hotels next door are nice as well. We used Uber to get from the Clearwater Airport and it was easy.

title: Incredible customer service on a trip we'll never forget!
review: We are unable to go on a honeymoon after our wedding next month because I start graduate school immediately after. This trip to Clearwater was our "pre-honeymoon" and our stay at this Holiday Inn made the trip magical! We've stayed here before and it was an easy choice to stay here again! This trip especially was amazing, thanks to the exceptional treatment we received from Zeny at the front desk. She upgraded our room to a suite on the 8th floor overlooking the Gulf and allowed us to check in early due to my fiance's Spire Elite status. We felt like royalty and could not have been happier with Zeny and the rest of the hotel and staff. Very clean, nice pool area, great poolside bar and restaurant, and walkable to everything, including tons of other bars and restaurants and…

title: Nice place to stay
review: How wonderful!  First of all, congratulations on your upcoming nuptials - and we're glad you could get away for a bit of downtime before your magical day.    We'll be certain that Zeny and her supervisors receive word of your compliments - she is a great team member!  In fact, all our team is here to ensure each guest has a pleasurable experience.  It's wonderful to know you'll be back with us again - and we hope that Florida honeymoon (whenever it will be) will be with us.  All the best!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: One night- But worth more
review: We had a very nice room.  The clerk upgraded us to a suite at no extra charge.  There is a nice deck overlooking the bay. Parking was $18 extra per night.  The Quality Inn next door was $20 per night  There is no beach directly behind the inn.  Quality Inn had a small beach and cove.

title: Fun in the Sun
review: Thank you for staying with us and taking time to write about your experience.  We're glad you enjoyed your visit to Clearwater Beach, which is minutes away from the public beach and other area activities.  It was our pleasure to offer you the upgrade!  Nothing pleases us more than to see guests return and we hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: staycation
review: This was a beautiful location and we had an excellent view and room.  I had booked the room about a month before.  When I went to check us in, the man at the desk pleasantly informed me that we had been moved up to a suite/ocean view as there had been such a high demand for rooms!  No extra charge!!   Excellent!!

title: very good stay and great room
review: This was the third time and the hotel did not disappoint - Ivan was excellent on front desk  The room was spotlessly clean and tidy and well equipped.  jimmys was excellent and the pool clean and well managed  had a slight problem with the bill - my fault for doing 3 bookings! - but all sorted and what was lovely was that mgt sorted a free breakfast due to the problem - very proactive thank you  also thank you to Keith Richards (yes really!) at Jimmys  -he was excellent and should be in show business  They did not seem to be doing the breakfast buffet anymore which is a shame but the food at Jimmys was excellent and fresh and still very good value for the location  A lovely stay thank you

title: Don’t stay close to Shepherds.
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thanks also for singling out Ivan and Keith -- they represent all our team who wants each guest to have a great experience and we'll be sure to let them - and their supervisors - know of your compliment.  Yes, at times throughout the year we do not serve a breakfast buffet but glad you found the food at Jimmy's to be excellent.    Sure hope you'll be thinking of returning soon for more fun on America's #1 US Beach!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: Everything was very nice until we went to bed. The noise (loud base) of the music coming from Shepherds resort was so loud we could not go to sleep until 2am. We were in the building close to shepherds on the 4th floor. We have stayed here before in the tower the furthest away from shepherds and never had this problem. Paying 350+ a night you would think they would offer ear plugs at least to everyone so close to Shepherds.  I know it’s not Holiday Inns fault, but they should at least warn people when booking.

title: Perfect weekend getaway
review: First off, we thank you for staying with us and are pleased you found the resort to your liking.  Understandably, a good night's rest is important and we're sorry the noise next door to be a bit much.  You didn't mention how long you were staying or if you requested a move - we would have tried to accommodate you because we want each guest to have a pleasant experience.  If you come to visit Clearwater Beach again and stay with us, feel to reach out to me personally if any issues occur.  We really do value you as a Holiday Inn customer.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great service
review: We arrived on 14th. Warm welcome at front desk. Slightly alarmed on arrival due to the very dated reception.  We asked for a high room as it was our first visit. Informed we had a corner room with pool and ocean view.  Although very clean( apart from the gum found on side of our bath in room.  This hotel is a great location but definitely not 3star. It has to be the most shabby, tired, hotel that desperately needs updating. Especially with the holiday inn brand. It was like a old Blackpool hotel from back in the 70s.  I have to say the saving grace was the coffee machine and TV. Especially that game of thrones was airing its season return. Couldn’t wait to leave.  The seaview was if you went outside to the left of balcony and then could see some kind of view. The window onto our…

title: Brilliant
review: Just spent 4 nights here. Service was excellent, check in/out quick and everything very clean. Bedrooms good size and pool area tidy. Excellent location with the beach, restaurants, bars and shopping just mins from the hotel. Will stay again.

title: Great Location, Nice Stay,  a little over priced
review: Thank you!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your beach holiday and are so glad you chose to stay with us!  Your comments are so appreciated and we'll share your compliments with our staff because our entire team here wants each guest to have a positive experience.  We can't wait to have you stay here again.  If you're not already following us on Facebook, please do.  We'll keep you in the know of specials, events and reasons to come back!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Another Great Visit!
review: This is a good Holiday Inn. The room was clean and kept up.There is no safe in the room.   It is an easy walking distance to the beach and to area restaurants.  The rooms are pricey and parking is extra $20/day.  With the high price of the room, it seems like parking should be included. While the hotel has a small lot, it shares a parking ramp next door, so there is plenty of parking.  Having to pay for parking on top of a pricey hotel  with a basic room seems a lot.   The desk staff while not rude are also not overly helpful.  I would stay here again due to the location but I might look sooner for another option (we booked last minute).

title: Great balcony view of the sunset
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience.  Please know that each review we receive is carefully scrutinized so that we can provide our top management with feedback from our guests.  We're glad you stayed with us, and to address some of your concerns, you came at the height of our tourist season when prices are high.  We do try and stay competitive with comparable resorts in the area, however, and we do not charge a resort fee as other beach hotels do.  Parking is an issue anywhere on the beach and our prices are in line with other resorts.  Some guests opt for taking ground transportation from the airport and doing without a car since the trolleys run so frequently and for a nominal fee.   We will take note of the service issue because each of our staff is directed to provide exceptional and friendly service to our guests.  You are right - the location is one of the most popular reasons our guests return, and we do hope you'll be back with us again.  Please feel free to reach out to me on your next visit if you should have any issues.  Thank you,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Family Stay!
review: Just returned from Florida - had another great visit to the Holiday Inn & Suites in Clearwater. This hotel is very nice and I would recommend it to anyone visiting the area. Our family loves the food at Jimmy's. The pool area was a bit crowded, but that's to be expected on spring break week. The staff is very nice and friendly. The rooms are a nice size, and our suite had two bathrooms, which is great when you are traveling with three teens. I got no complaints about the pull out couch from my daughter. We were there a few years ago, and since then they have widened the little "beach" area off of the patio by Jimmy's. If they could turn that area into a private beach with umbrellas, I don't know if I would ever leave the property! :) Highly recommend!

title: AWESOME VACAY!!!
review: Have stayed here about 6x, & cant wait to come back!!!!  All staff was great, especially bartender Bridd.  He ROCKED & made our stay such fun!  The food was good & very reasoably priced.  Pool was clean, beautiful & inviting.  Sunsets were SPECTACULAR!!!  Can't wait to come back!!!!

title: Cockroaches!
review: Awww, you made our day!  We like nothing more than for our guests to enjoy their stay with us - and to let us know!  We'll share your compliments but if you'd like to post your words about Bridd on Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar, I'm sure they'll be grateful.  We can't wait to have you back here also!  There's always something fun to do on Clearwater Beach!  Thank you!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Absolutely brilliant
review: We recently checked in and found out there were multiple cockroaches in our bathroom. After talking to the manger at 12:30am we were told “it’s Florida”. Will not be coming back. Checked out in the morning

title: Fantastic Place
review: Hello,   We are sorry you experienced unpleasantness during your stay with us.  For the record, those are not cockroaches, they are Palmetto Bugs that are prevalent here in Florida.  We do have a pest control company that services us on a regular basis but sometimes these insects do get inside one way or another.  They are not an indication of uncleanliness.  We're not sure who you spoke with that evening because we don't have a regular duty manager on at that time, and you did not say if you were offered the opportunity to move your room.  So we're sorry your stay with us was not as expected because we want each of our guests to have a totally pleasant experience.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: excellent  in all regards
review: Such a lovely clean big room with 2 double beds.beds changed every day and clean towels.really clean.hotel was amazing right on the beach which was breath taking.food was lovely.great big portions.staff brilliant.area itself was breath taking as was the beach.we fell in love with this area and have booked to return next year.our place from now on 5☆ all the way

title: Great Property Short walk to the Beach
review: The hotel was great.  Our room was clean, everything worked properly, and the beds were comfortable.  We were able to check in a little before the official check-in time.  They have space to store your luggage so we took a nice walk and grabbed some lunch until the room was ready.  I didn't realize our city view room would have a balcony so that was a nice surprise.  Great pool deck to watch the nightly sunset.  The restaurant/Jimmy's Fish House also had good food although our waiter was slow and seemed stressed at dinner.  Excellent service the following morning for breakfast.  Our only problem was we only booked for one night.  We hope to be able to stay longer next year.

title: Older Hotel
review: Thank you!    We're so glad you stayed with us and enjoyed some fun time on Clearwater Beach.  We appreciate your comments so others may know from your experience that we met your expectations for a beach holiday.  Please know we look forward to the time when you can "stay longer" - - there's always something fun to do on Clearwater Beach!

title: Decent hotel well situated in Clearwater
review: This hotel is quite old with narrow hallways that are musty. The room was clean and average in size but the bathroom is small with a tub very old. I requested a quiet room and I was placed next to a very noisy family that stood in the hall shouting. The pool area is nice but no beach at all! I won’t stay here again.

title: Good view, old hotel, medium service
review: Thank you for taking time to comment about your stay with us.  Please know we do appreciate guest feedback and share it with our top management team because our aim is that each guest enjoy a pleasant stay when they visit.  You are right.  We are not one of the newest properties on the beach but we do enjoy a clientele who have been staying with us for years, especially our families.  As such, we work hard to be an affordable property and even do not charge a resort fee.  As far as the noisy family, we hope that all our guests are respectful of others but obviously in this case, you encountered some who were bothersome and we do apologize.  Yes, we are not on the beach - nor do we claim to be - but within 5 minutes you can walk to the beautiful public beach (which today was ranked #1 Beach in the U.S. by Trip Advisor's Traveler's Choice) or there is a trolley and Florida free ride that will take you there.    Although we're sorry you prefer not to stay here again, we do hope you will return to our beautiful Clearwater Beach for more vacation memories.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Not a bad place for a weekend trip, clean and close-ish to the beach
review: stayed here for 1 night during a month Florida road trip  nice room, very comfortable bed! very clean but bathroom very small!! asked for a ocean view room but all we had was a view of some covered hut on the side of the pool so were a little disappointed  pool area very nice and very clean, pool was heated which was lovely! view out onto the ocean was also beautiful!  the hotel restaurant was lovely, food was delicious and served promptly! the ultimate pina colada was awesome!, have 5 of them! lol   not much to fault about this hotel and infact the hotel bar and restaurant was heaving with people unlike the whole of clearway sea front! so its clearly the place to be in the evening!

title: Nice hotel somewhat close to the beach.
review: We enjoyed Clearwater Beach and the hotel was nice. We only spent one night there so really didn't get to see all the hotel had to offer. the negative thing was that we checked in after 3 pm because our room wasn't ready so they gave us another room. There was no continental breakfast so we had to go to a local restaurant for breakfast and had to check out 10 am. It cost $ 240.00 for the night so not worth it at all.

title: Great location, loved the restaurant/bar onsite
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  Please know that we value guest feedback because we want each guest to enjoy a memorable stay.  We do not offer continental breakfasts at this property.  Many of the limited properties do but we do have onsite Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar right here on site.  As far as pricing is concern, if you compared our prices at this time of year with other properties on the beach, you will find that we are very competitive.  For many years we have maintained a reputation as being a family resort so we do our best to keep our prices affordable for our guests.  We hope you left with good memories of Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Needs Updating
review: We stayed here for the first time last month and loved it. My boyfriend and I have both been to Clearwater in the past but never stayed at this hotel. It did not disappoint! The room and hotel itself was nice, the location was central to both the beach and plenty of restaurants. Mainly, we LOVED having the restaurant/bar and tiki bar onsite. We spent out mornings on the sun deck and it was so convenient to have everything right there. The staff at both the tiki bar and inside bar were both great.

title: This place is tired and so are staff
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you stayed with us and had a wonderful Florida vacation!    We appreciate your kind words so that others can learn from a guest's opinion all that we have to offer.  You're right - our location to everything on the beach is very appealing to our guests, and having a full service hotel to suit everyone's needs is another plus.  Glad you enjoyed Jimmy's Fish House -- hope you got to see our egret friend, George, who "monitors" the deck in the mornings!  Sure hope you'll be back with us again.  Thank you so much.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Some aspects of this hotel are better than others...
review: The hotel is in a great location, easy walk to the beach and restaurants, but the hotel and room itself is dirty and outdated. The ice machine was out of order on our floor and 3 others in our tower.The pool was great for the kids as it was heated, but no hot tub for adults and the outdoor tiki bar never opened in the 5 days we were there. The best part about the hotel was, Zeny, the staff member at the front desk, she is kind and helped us to get a better room due to issues with ours.

title: Beach location - lousy customer service.
review: First of all when I checked in they informed me that they had me down for 3 nights and charged me for the night before I arrived.  I pulled out my reservation, proved it was for two nights and the removed the one night charged already.  But never apologized. I had to prove it with my copy of the confirmation to get them to take off the room charge that was their mistake.

title: Disappointing Holiday Inn
review: Thank you for taking time to comment on your recent stay.  It is truly our goal to provide excellent customer service and we are so sorry this did not happen in your case.  Please know that this will be addressed with our reservation staff because we expect higher service from our staff.  Since there were obviously some things you liked about your stay, we hope you will return again, and do feel free to reach out to me personally if I can help with any issues that come up.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Christmas
review: Have stayed in quite a few HDI and was definitely below expectations.  First the good things, beds were comfortable, staff was friendly. Jimmy's restaurant was great met several people at the restaurant that stay off site but come there just for the restaurant. View of Clearwater sound was cool saw several dolphins. Jimmys restaurant is a good place to watch the sunset.    Now for the not so good, no USB hookups?  went down to the front desk and they did give me a power strip and said this was something they were going to put in the rooms. They advertise just a short walk to the beach but fail to mention its a pretty good hike.  If you have car its $18 a day which could really add up if you stay multiple days. (this is supposedly standard in the area cant confirm that everyone…

title: Say "yes" to this hotel
review: Thank you for staying with us and for providing valuable insight.   Please know that we sincerely want each guest to have an excellent vacation stay and we are very sorry we did not meet your expectations on some issues    Regarding some of your issues - please know our highest management heads will receive notice of such things including the front desk staff's response and the ice machines that were in disrepair.  We are also addressing the condition of the cooking utensils and we have plans to improve the USB hookups.  As far as parking fees are concerned, most beach resorts do charge a similar rate - and some even charge a resort fee which we do not.  Parking space is at a premium here on the beach and some guests prefer to shuttle here and avoid the expense of a car.    The beach is less than 5 minutes but we also have a Jolley Trolley that comes by and will transport you if you choose not to walk.  Again, we appreciate your comments.  We hope you ultimately took away some good memories of your stay here on Clearwater Beach and we appreciate your business.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Ok. Passing note only.
review: Again we stayed at Holiday Inn on Clearwater Beach. The place was decorated so homey for Christmas. The staff was amazing. We love the bar & restaurant ! The staff there as well were very accommodating to our needs.  We will b back soon!!!

title: Nice hotel and friendly staff
review: We found the hotel to be very restful and the staff was very friendly.  I would have rated it higher but had to wait for our room to be ready. Once we got our room it was nice to sit by the pool and relax.

title: Beautiful hotel on the coast!
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us -- we certainly enjoyed having you!  So sorry you had to wait for your room.  Sometimes circumstances are such that we can't get in to clean as quickly as we would like to.  We hope you weren't too inconvenienced.  Glad you enjoyed the resort amenities and pool, and we will share your compliments with our staff.  They all want everyone's stay to be a pleasant one.  We look forward to the next time you are able to visit us!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Family vacation 2018
review: I would have rated this hotel with five stars but there are a couple issues.  Let's start with the good. Rooms are clean, spacious and well kept.  View is very nice and the location in priceless.  The downsides would be the pushy timeshare salesmen in the lobby and the fact that when you book this hotel they don't mention that they charge $20USD per night to park.   Overall, I'll probably go back but my first impression could have been better.

title: Super Friendly Staff and Great Night's Sleep!  Mother Daughter Quick Trip!
review: Thank you for staying with us!  We're so glad you had a chance to enjoy a beautiful Clearwater Beach getaway and we're honored that you chose to stay with us.  We appreciate your comments and we certainly share them with our top management team.  As far as the parking is concerned, most all resorts on the beach do charge for parking and we do try and keep the rates as affordable as possible.  Now that you know your way around Clearwater Beach, you might consider taking an Uber or other grand transport here and back and find it more affordable.  With the Jolley Trolley and Family Free Rides available, you can easily have fun without driving.  Re: the timeshare salesmen.  Thank you for addressing it because we do have strict policies in place.  We will address this.  Again, thanks for staying with us and we do hope you'll return.   You also now have my name so feel free to reach out to me personally if you have any issues at our resort.  Thank you again.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Loved the gulf view
review: Checking in was seamless!! Best Check at any hotel by far!! The customer service agent at the desk was very friendly and helpful.. had all of my info already and explained every question.  Clearwater is an awesome area to vacation. Lots of happy people all around.. laid back atmosphere and people are genuinely nice!  The room was huge we opted for the king bed suite w/bunk beds. We were surprised by the size but the decor was definitely in need of an update. The main bathroom was nicely done but the furniture seemed dingy and in need of an update. However it was comfy. Location was right on the water but didn’t have a walkout beach like other hotels in the area... it did have a nice pier with lots of seating and a smaller overcrowded pool. The drinks served at the pool side bar…

title: Perfect Stay and Great Location!
review: We stayed for the New Year’s Weekend! Front desk staff was very friendly and accommodating. Perfect view of the gulf. Pool was nice and you always can find a Lounge chair. Walking distance to beach, marina and restaurants. Definitely a hotel to come back too.

title: Just ok
review: Thank you!  We're excited that you rang in 2019 with us!   Your words are very much appreciated and we are glad that you found the resort amenities, location and beach access to your liking.  We'd like nothing better than to see you back here again with us....hope you can!  Happy New Year,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Price and pool
review: Typical Holiday inn, nothing fancy. It's an older hotel so it's very basic and boring. The staff was not over the top amazing. The beds were comfortable. Beware it's 18 dollars to park!! It's a non smoking building but Ash tray in balcony...kinda defeats purpose.

title: Live music on the patio every evening
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  Please know we value your feedback and do share it with our top management.  Your comment about our staff does disappoint us because so many guests go out of their way to compliment them - and each one of our team does try to make each guest's stay an exceptional one.  Regarding parking - most resorts on the beach do charge for parking because space is so limited.  Our rates are competitive with other beach resorts.  Ultimately, we hope you enjoyed your beach vacation in Clearwater and wish you a fine holiday season.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location and nice hotel
review: Hotel over all was nice. I have two issues with the hotel. First: the fact that a patron of the hotel now has to pay 18.00 per day to park a rental car on the property that you are staying at is not cool!! Then you see a teenager working outside saying 18.00 to park for beach goers!! Now if your not staying there then yeah pay to park but if you are that’s horrible! Second: please don’t offer a heated pool when your pool is in no way heated at all! Heated means warmer than usual. A pool is usually cold and refreshing that does not mean heated.....cold and refreshing in December??? Heated of a hotter than usual temperature. Now the folks from the other country they loved it but those of us from northern states who left to come to warmer climate and heated pool would like a heated…

title: Older property, but good location
review: This Holiday Inn is an older property in a good location.  The room - a suite - I stayed in had a view of the Gulf of Mexico and was overlooking the pool area.  There is a nice pool area but no actual beach.  It is within easy walking distance to shops and restaurants and there a restaurant on the property also.  I stayed here for several days and it was a comfortable stay but not one of the best hotels I have visited.    At the pool there is a tiki bar for drinks but the drinks were extremely watered down. The restaurant was good - breakfast was very good, dinner was pretty good.  It is right on the water so your view while dining is great.  The wifi in the hotel is fast but did not seem to be secured very well.  The bed in the room was very comfortable, air conditioning was a…

title: Pretty decent
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience during your stay.  Please know that we value guest feedback and do share it with our top management team.  While we appreciate your compliments, some of the issues you brought up are being addressed with appropriate department heads.  We're glad you ultimately enjoyed the resort amenities as well as access to the public beach areas.  We do hope you will return again for more fun in the sun.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Loved the stay
review: Good location, with a fantastic attached bar / restaurant with a huge patio, live music and gorgeous sunset. The rooms are a very good size. The hotel has a very decent sized pool and outdoor bar area - overall 3.5 stars.

title: Wow the best
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write about your stay.   You may be interested to know that Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar has their own Trip Advisor page if you would like to leave feedback for them as well.  We appreciate your comments and are glad you enjoyed the facilities - and our famous sunset views!  Hopefully we'll see you back here for more fun in the sun.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Fabulous views
review: Great hotel and  great location.  Robert P. at the front desk was extremely helpful and helped make the stay memorable.  We will definitely be back and spend a full weekend.  Loved the restaurant and the live band.

title: Great view with the right room
review: I stayed her last week and I must say the staff was very nice. I didn't care for the food at Jimmy's that is downstairs in the hotel.  The room I first had was a view of the building next door. Once I asked for a new room they did give me a better view.  I would stay again

title: Holiday turn it inn.
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We're pleased we were able to change the room to accommodate you for a better view.    We're sorry you did not enjoy the food at Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar.  They do have their own Trip Advisor page if you wanted to leave feedback for them.  Most of all, we're delighted to hear you'd like to come back.  There is always something fun going on in the area, so please stay in touch on our Facebook page and return to see us!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Reservations
review: Booked to get away from busy Orlando for a beach weekend.  Got a great deal through a 3rd party website, all was going so well, even though they gave us a room next to a noisy elevator and an air con unit that sounded like the space shuttle taking off all night, we put up with it because it was only a couple of nights and we knew it was because we’d booked via a 3rd party.  The hotel itself is in a good position. Lovely sunset views, good pool and deck area that the kids loved. 2 good bars that were quite reasonable, friendly staff etc, Only a 2 minute walk to the beach.  Downside, Watch the breakfast it was expensive $4,50 for an orange juice😳 also no safe in your room which wouldn’t be ideal for a longer stay.  The real problem was the last night  when the fire alarm went off…

title: Beautiful Sunsets
review: Hello and thank you for taking time to write about your experience.  First off, may I personally apologize for the inconvenience caused by the fire alarm in the middle of the night.  We recognize that it is an unsettling experience to have your sleep interrupted and a tarnish on your overall experience.  As you mentioned, because you booked through a third party, we had no choice but to suggest you go back to them on your request for a refund.   That is the reason we offered the complimentary parking, which was something we were able to do on this end.  I would like to provide you with my personal email and ask you to email me directly so I can follow up with you on your other concerns.  Please reach out at your convenience to:  CBottget@Clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com.  We do hope that ultimately you enjoyed visiting Clearwater Beach and I want to be able to convey to you that we do value you as a customer of Holiday Inn and our resort.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Vacation with broken air conditioner twice in the same week
review: I made a reservation under an incorrect name through CLC even though the issue would of been solved the next morning with the right information, they refused to let the guest check in. Due to that , we had to look for another hotel late at night.

title: Wonderful short stay
review: I had a wonderful mini stay at this hotel. I usually stay in gulf front rooms on high floors but since I just showed up, the only room with a view which was available was the pool front room on the bottom floor. I was unsure about it but turned out that I loved it! There were glass sliders straight out to the pool and two chairs in front of a little private seating area with table. I walked straight out to the pool and tiki bar and could sneak back into my room for anything I needed without having to go around to the lobby or up the elevators. Since the pool is in front of the gulf, I had a nice view of the gulf as well.  Staff was wonderful, beds comfy, room clean and had a microwave, mini fridge and wet bar area with coffee maker.  Front desk staff was nice and thank you to…

title: missing chef
review: We're so pleased you had such a wonderful stay!  Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience so others will know what to expect.    We appreciate very much your complimemts to our staff.  Everyone really wants each guest to feel at home here and leave with great memories.  It's exciting for us to know you're thinking about your next trip back.  We look forward to having you!  Best wishes,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location, hotel needs a bit of work
review: last day of our stay we went for breakfast, and with big surprise we have been told that breakfast could not be served because the chef did not show up.?????? never happened to me in many years of traveling, is unacceptable for a big chain hotel.

title: Nice place to stay
review: Thank you for staying with us and taking time to comment.  Unfortunately, you are correct, and we do sincerely apologize.  Unforeseen circumstances at Jimmy's that morning caused a delay in our breakfast service.   As you mentioned that it has never happened in all your years of traveling, we can add that it never happened here also.  We do hope that if the rest of your stay was to your satisfaction that you will return for another holiday on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Location, Pool, Bar Area
review: Excellent location on the Gulf, but don't think that there's a beach there....the hotel has no beach. It fronts straight onto the Gulf. You can walk to the hotel next door that has a beach, or take 10 minutes to walk to the main Clearwater Beach. The rooms are just a little tired and the aircon is noisy, but still comfortable rooms and have a fridge and even a microwave. Try and make sure that you get one of the higher rooms facing the Gulf, it makes early mornings a delight taking in the view. It's disappointingly expensive to park there at $18/night, but there's not a lot of choice. You definitely need a car as there's not a great deal to do in Clearwater unless you just want to sit in the sun or play in the water. There are some reasonable places to eat within easy walking…

title: Great stay, beautiful water view!
review: We stayed three nights at the Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites on Clearwater Beach. The view from our fourth floor room was lovely. The pool was refreshing, maybe even warm but comfortable and well maintained. The pool deck was clean and offered pool towels, plenty of lounge chairs and an outdoor bar.  In the evenings there is live outdoor music from "Jimmy fish house Iguanas Bar" that is on property. The deck was right on the water and was enjoyable but the music could be heard from my room after 10 which was a little annoying. To be fair I dont drink, or party and go to bed early so its just my personal issues with noise. It ended around 11-ish on the weekend so it wasnt too bad. The hotel was within walking distance to food such as" Taco Bus" and "Ice& Cream" which made for some…

title: Bad bed
review: Thank you for taking time to comment on your stay with us.  We're so pleased you enjoyed the resort and the surrounding area for you three-night stay.  We're sorry if the music from Jimmy's was bothersome.   Jimmy's is known for its lively entertainment, especially on weekends, so thank you for understanding.  We do hope you'll be back with us again, and thank you for your recommendation!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Really Poor
review: As IHG platinum I got as signed to a room with old bed, dirty floor, window curtain  with hole, water running slow in the shower.  I woke up with bad back pain due to the bed safe old not comfy at all. Window curtain with hole will not work when you like your room dark to sleep.

title: Vaca
review: Hopefully you have received the direct email from me by now, and we certainly thank you for taking time to provide feedback about your experience.    We strive to make each stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible, and we appreciate that you brought your experience to our attention. We take feedback seriously and comments such as yours help coach our team to make the necessary changes, so we can provide a better experience in the future.  I will along with my Executive Housekeeper be conducting our mattress test to evaluate the mattress for replacement if necessary will purchase a new mattress for this room.    We recognize that you are an IHG Platinum Elite Rewards Club Member with us and value your opinion.   I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.  Again, thank you for sharing your comments, and if I can be of assistance to you, or you would like to discuss your stay in more depth, please contact me directly at 727-447-6461 x 7042 or cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Short Stay
review: I will not stay at this hotel again. 1. Our room door did not lock correctly (it could just be pushed open). We were told it was going to be fixed but it wasn't.  2. When we booked, we paid a price that included breakfast, turns out that we only got $12.50 allowance for 2 adults towards breakfast. We had booked and paid  for 3 adults and a child.  3. A faulty fire alarm meant we were woken up twice during the night and had to evacuate  4. The air-con in the room was incredibly loud and made it difficult to sleep  5. We booked a family room for 4 but were only given 3 towels

title: Great hotel with views in walking distance to wverything
review: We had to reschedule our Sanibel Island condo vacation at the last minute due to red tide and green algae - and was able to reserve a suite here at the holiday inn - the staff has been really helpful and friendly and the hotel is very family friendly - there is Even a kiddie pool! Sunsets are beautiful from the room or deck and the food at the restaurant was good too .. they let me stake out a table and work for a couple of hours ... such fun for families ... definitely recommend !

title: Great getaway- Overlooks water but no beach!
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We are all disheartened at the red tide in Florida and hoping it will be gone soon.  We appreciate your compliments to our staff (which we will share) and are glad you enjoyed Jimmy's Fish House and the views of those spectacular sunsets.  Hopefully we'll see you and your family back again for more fun in Clearwater.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Loved the Family Suites
review: Very nice hotel with friendly staff ROOM- clean and comfortable, upgraded to a suite with gulf view Rm 658, 2 queen with balcony, adjacent room is living room, kitchenette- small fridge, micro, Keurig, some dishes, and a Full 2nd bathroom which was a pleasant surprise! Great for two sisters traveling together  PARKING-plenty available onsite $18/day POOL- nice large pool overlooks water, plenty of loungers. Tiki Bar, No Beach!! Gulf Water comes right up to edge of property. Can walk a few minutes to beach area. If I had young kids I would have been upset to not have beach area right at my resort. Lots of boats going by, pretty view, Sand Key view straight ahead. Nice sunset. ARCADE- Nice arcade area for kids with plenty of game choices GIFT SHOP- small shop, has snacks, gifts,…

title: Very Good IHG Property
review: Thank you for taking time to write such a thorough review of your recent stay.   We also thank you for staying with us and are glad you found the resort to be comfortable and with many features to appeal to your family.  We'll share your compliments to our staff - they all work hard so each guest will enjoy a pleasant vacation experience.  Hopefully we'll see you back here the next time you need for time on the beach.  Thanks again, Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Winter Getaway
review: This is the first hotel/condo we've stayed at on Clearwater Beach that we can't wait to come back to.  The Family Suites are HUGE. We had rooms 301 and 303 (large family - we had four in each suite) and couldn't get over how much space we had. Two bathrooms in each suite, an extra vanity area, a huge living room, a balcony... the only drawback was the view... we were directly above/looking at garbage dumpsters and the hotel's a/c unit, which made sitting on the balcony noisy. But it makes sense to give couples the romantic view. ;)  Rooms were clean. Location was within easy walking distance of everything we wanted to do. Restaurant had an excellent breakfast and good service.  Accessible/handicapped parking was not easy to find... always full - but there was plenty of parking…

title: Vacation
review: Just got back from vacation. We stayed here from the 23rd too the 28th. Had A great experience and a great city view with balcony on the 4th floor. It was amazing and no complaints. If your looking to get on the beach it's about a4minute walk that's all it done. Even A game room

title: The Gulf View!!
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate that you took time to review our resort.  We certainly hope you'll be back with us as soon as possible - there's so much to see and do in Clearwater!

title: Reasonable & roomy suite. Clean too.
review: We had a great stay. The hotel doesn't have beach access but it is only a 5-minute walk to Clearwater beach. Gary was great, he was able to get us in early and also provide us with the room overlooking Jimmys outside patio and the Gulf. The pool was clean and the bartender by the poolside bar was quick and friendly. The only complaint I have was when we had breakfast at Jimmy's, it seemed like no one wanted to attend us. The hostess bobby was the one to bring us drinks and tell us about the menu. Not one waiter/waitress stopped by to asked if we needed anything or even took our plates when we finished eating. I would've given this review a 4 for that but Bobby was great and the breakfast buffet had a great food. Although, The waitress (can't remember her name) during our dinner…

title: Beautiful views
review: Thank you so much for letting others know you had a great stay with us.  We want every one of our guests to leave with wonderful memories!  Your feedback is appreciated on the waitstaff at Jimmy's.  Did you know they have their own Trip Advisor page?   We will share your comments with their management, however and are sorry you did not receive the service that they are generally known for.  We do hope you'll be back with us whenever the sun and sand calls to you. There's always fun things to do in Clearwater and we hope you'll follow us on Facebook for ideas,  Enjoy the rest of your summer!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Enjoyed Our Stay
review: Nice, big suite with 2 baths...what a plus. We had a room without a view, but all things considered the room was roomy, clean & reasonable with a good location including restaurant, bar & pool with nearby beach too!

title: Mini weekend getaway
review: This place was awesome. Close to all. Very clean place. Granddaughter loved the pool. Family suite was big and view was awesome. Ate at restaurant on premises and the food was excellent. Had a great breakfast buffet. Will definitely be going back.

title: The Perfect Getaway
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  Family vacations are so important -- those young one grow up so fast!  We do hope you'll be back again to make more family memories.  Thanks for your compliments!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Our summer vacation
review: My boy friend booked this room as it had been my desire to have a beach getaway for quite some time. This was everything that I could have hoped for with additional perks. The staff was awesome, professional, and willing to accommodate us in any way possible. The hotel grounds and our room was clean to my liking (I can be very thorough when doing my initial inspection). The hotel is reasonably priced for the view that we were privileged to have. In addition, there are quite a few eateries in close proximity that provide tasty meals. I have not a single complaint. This was an overall peaceful getaway and I would definitely stay again and I highly recommend it.

title: Absolutely Excellent Beach Hotel
review: Wow, how nice of your boyfriend to book such a surprise for you!   We're glad you had a wonderful time and we do appreciate your compliments.  Our entire staff works hard so that each guest can leave with wonderful memories.  We do hope you will be able to come back again.   So many of our guests feel like this is their "beach place" and we hope you will too.  Thanks again and enjoy your summer.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice hotel for the price
review: We are spending our summer vacation in Clearwater at the Holiday Inn. We got an upgrade so we got a double suite. The hotel is not bad, may need a little updating but the overall room that we had was fantastic. Our room was just off the inlet, the staff was great helped us get Busch Garden tickets cheaper than we could anywhere else. Has a full and a restaurant at the hotel. Was not a far walk at all to the beach and you can see the sunset from the restaurant. This hotel also has a very nice weight room for exercising.

title: Great customer service
review: Stayed here over the weekend with my family. The hotel isnt on the beach but has great view of the gulf. The beach is just a few short blocks away. The customer service from the hotel was great. The manager Markus checked us in and gave us a great view. Every time we walked passed the desk he greeted us with a big smile. We will be back next year!

title: Holiday disappointment
review: Thank you so much!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us - and we'll be sure to comment to Markus that your first impression was a positive one!  We're delighted to know you're already planning your next visit with us.  Please follow us on our Facebook page for events you may want to build your next trip around.  One fun event is the 17-day Pier 60 Sugar Sand Festival in April - it's fabulous!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Denied due to service dog
review: I am here in Clearwater Beach for a conference and stayed here because it is on the water. When I checked in I asked if they had any rooms with water view but was told they only had city view available. That was understandable until I got to my room and all I see is the wall of the next tower. Not cool, so beware when you check in to ask what your view really is.  The room was nice and clean and well stocked.  This hotel is on the water but has no beach. The pool was nice and there is plenty of seats to relax on.

title: Best deal in Clearwater
review: Thanks for writing a review and we're so sorry we were unable to provide you a room with a better view.  We can understand your disappointment and would have changed it if we could.  We appreciate your comments that overall your experience was good.  Next time we hope you'll be back just for pleasure. Be sure to ask what room views are available the next time you come.  Thanks again and we hope you enjoyed Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Beware of the ocean view rooms
review: I had a reservation arriving on Tuesday July 10th. At check in, I advised the front office member whose name is Marcus that I had a service dog and a car. He immediately asked me what kind of service dog I have which I let him know is an an emotional support service dog. He told me the hotel did not allow this type of service animal and proceeded to cancel my reservation. I told him I have always stayed at Holiday Inn hotels without any issue and he offered me complimentary parking instead and gave me the address for the nearest Holiday Inn which was 20 miles away according to him. I booked a room at the nearby Springhill Suites Clearwater Beach which is accommodating to pets.

title: Great Place to stay
review: The room was nice and clean.  Jimmy's restaurant attached to the hotel was really good and fairly priced. Plus kids under 12 eat free! The sunset view was amazing.  It is a short 5 min walk to the beach. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Waterfront Hotel with great amenities in the heart of Clearwater Beach
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay and all the resort has to offer.  You're right, most people love that we're so close to all the activities on Clearwater Beach, plus we have those awesome views from our patio!  Hope you'll be back with us again -- soon!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: This hotell needs renovation and better staff!
review: A long standing hotel in Clearwater Beach.  Charge of parking and wifi and resort fee applies to your room rate upon check out.  Rooms are large but bathrooms are quite small.  Regular rooms and 1 and 2 bed suites available at this hotel.   Jimmys Iguana Bar offers good food and happy hour but bar could do with updating, hasn't changed in years. .  Live music on the waterfront each evening.  Great made to order breakfasts to eat on the waterfront.  Gorgeous outdoor waterfront seating for eating breakfast, lunch dinner.  Staff are very good at this hotel .  Shops, kids play room and laundry available at this hotel.

title: What a bargain
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay here.  We're pleased to hear you enjoyed your Clearwater Beach holiday - and the great weather for enjoying our patio for your meals.  We appreciate your compliments to our staff.  They all try hard to ensure each guest has a wonderful guest experience. Please know that your feedback is important to us and your comments will be shared with our top management so we can continue to improve guest experiences.  Hope you'll be back with us soon.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Excellent view of the Gulf of Mexico
review: We booked this hotell based in rating on Tripadvisor. I sort of knew this was not going to be a great hotell, but we thought we would give it a chance.   We got a absolutely terrible rom at the 5 floor, facing the street and parking lots. Thats ok, but the problem is the industry fans right under our rooms. This make the balcony pretty much worthless because of the noise.  The whole room looked like it was from the early 90`s. Light switch did not work, aircon was so noisy that you could not leave it on when sleeping.  At the first night we did not get new towels or beds made up either. I would go so far to say that this is the worst hotel in Florida i ever stayed at.  I tried to complain about the room, and the lack of towels, but it did not help!  The pool, and the location is…

title: Overpriced beach hotel
review: We stayed June 16th got one night. When we arrived it was difficult to turn into the parking lot because the garage is available to the public for a fee and many were lined up to park. Once we were able to go into the lobby, check-in was quick. We arrived at 3:15 and our room wasn't ready. I was told I could park in the parking garage, leave my luggage at the front desk if I wanted, and the room was guaranteed to be ready at 4pm. I declined to leave my items and went a short distance to Sand Key beach for a few hours. When I returned the room was ready. Our family consists of 2 adults, a 19, 17, and 11 year old. We got a suite with 2 queen beds, 2 bathrooms, a kitchenette, a balcony, and sitting area with a pullout sofa. The room was spacious and clean. The beds were not as…

title: Family vacation with 4 kids, ages 8 and under
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience with us.  Please know that we value guest feedback and we do share suggestions and comments with our executive team.  We're sorry your teens felt the sofa was uncomfortable and you also were disappointed in the bed's comfort.  Most sleeper beds cannot compare with regular beds with box springs and mattresses and as for our regular beds, we have few complaints from other guests. As for the parking garage, it is necessary because space is limited on the beach and this has to provide spaces for two hotels.  It was constructed with specific dimensions to accommodate vehicles so we're sorry if you felt it was a tight fit for your SUV.  You did mention your enjoyment of the resort features, pool, amenities, and views.  Although we'd love to have you return, we hope that wherever you decide to stay, you'll return for more sunshine and sand on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Totally awful experience
review: This hotel was great for our two-night stay—Monday and Tuesday nights! We had a gulf view for our adjoining rooms that comfortably slept our family of six. We were on the 6th floor and heard little to no noise from the pool. We used the pool several times and loved it although it rarely had towels, the front desk staff gladly provided some to us. Clearwater Beach is a short, easy walk to the west of the property. Sandkey Beach is visible from the hotel but across the channel.   We took a dolphin cruise and the boat captain mentioned that our general hotel area (restaurant and gulf in front) is “the big party area on the weekends.” Not sure how much fun that would’ve been with kids but ya never know! ;) We ate at Jimmy’s (the on-site restaurant) for several meals and it was good…

title: Little things to annoy
review: Thank you for letting us know that you and your family had a wonderful vacation with us!   As you saw, we're very family friendly and are so glad you found the resort amenities and closeness to public beach, shopping and attractions easily within your reach.
