Please know your feedback on the scarcity of towels has been noted and discussed with our team - but we're glad you went to the front desk who were able to assist.     How fun that you took the dolphin cruise - and we hope you saw some from Jimmy's deck as well!  Jimmy's has a separate Trip Advisor page but we'll pass along your compliments.  We hope you'll be like so many others who come back to see us whenever the need for sun and sand calls to you.  We'd love to see you again!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 50 th High School Reunion
review: Whether it was someone puking off the balcony onto mine. Asked them to clean it 3 times before they got around to it. We were unfortunately next to an outside door which the staff kept slamming from 8am to 11 am when I complained they did it even more so I have to assume they were doing it on purpose. We checked out 3 days early and the refused to refund my money. Stay clear of this hotel it a total dump. You get what you pay for I suppose

title: Great location, excellent room
review: Very friendly and helpful staff at check-in.  Great room with balcony, with view on the pool and the Gulf. Really lovely! Spacious and clean room, two comfortable queen beds with selection of pillows (soft, firm). Bathroom with an excellent shower! Small refrigerator and microwave in the room, as well as a coffeemaker   Near the pool you can get pool towels, so no need to bring them with you on your travel.   Hotel also has a small beach area, where you can easily access/walk into the water. Here you can also rent a waterski at Waverunners.   Around the hotel there's a lot to go to (shops, supermarket, restaurants, etc.), all within walking distance. You can leave the car at the hotel parking. At the hotel there's also a restaurant.  Only one thing could be better, the noise of…

title: Where else would we stay?
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thanks for taking time to write so others can see the fun times that await them!  You are right - our guests love our central location and easy access to the public beach, shopping, dining and attractions. We appreciate your comments on the a/c - we have notified our maintenance department to address this issue.  Please plan to come see us again for more fun on Clearwater Beach.  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Deceiving
review: We have never had anything but great experiences with holiday inn and this was no different. It is super clean and the staff is very kind. They told us when we arrived the city view room we had reserved (only because of how cheap) had sold out and gave us the gulf view at no additional charge. The views are breath taking and the room is split so the beds and a bathroom are in one room and the living room dining table and a bathroom are in the other. It has a balcony on the side with the beds. We have seen several dolphins everyday.

title: Great location
review: Thank you!  We thank you first for being a repeat customer and for taking time to comment on your most recent stay.  Please know we share comments with our department heads and appreciate your comments on cleanliness and staff friendliness.  Each of our team wants every guest to leave with special memories.  We're glad the dolphins entertained you!  They're so fun to watch!   Hopefully you caught a few glorious sunsets as well!  We'll look forward to having you back with us - and from all of us at Holiday Inn, thank you!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good family hotel.
review: The location is good, but the hotels outward appearance is deceiving. I stayed one night and that was too many in my opinion. The hotel is in desperate need of some serious repairs.   Hotel staff was very helpful, pleasant and nice. However that didn't make me feel any safer or relaxed during my stay. All of the hotel doors were assessable by anyone, the doors appeared to be broken or damaged or disarmed. At anytime throughout the night any one walking off the street could walk into the hotel - by way of the side door or patio entrances. I returned around 11:45pm and door was wide open (like the lock was never engaged) and you can get to any floor by the elevators.  Room 551 seemed to have been "fixed" at some point, but the repairs were completed. The holes in the wall from the…

title: Nice Suite
review: Stayed here for one night in the middle of the week.  Due to my rewards status, I got an upgrade to a gulf side suite.  The suite is basically two side by side rooms.  One is furnished with bedroom furniture and a small desk.  The other is furnished as a living area with a small table for dining, a kitchenette with a microwave, Keurig machine, dishwasher and dishes and silverware.  Both sides of the suite have a bathroom.  One had a tub/shower arrangement and the other was a shower only.  The water pressure and shower heads made for a nice shower.   Both sides of the suite had a view of the gulf with the bedroom side having a small balcony that you could sit on to enjoy the view.  Unfortunately, the hotel next door blocked our view of the sunset, but we just went downstairs and…

title: Great View Hotel Needs Updating
review: Thank you so much for such a detailed review of your overnight stay with us!  We do appreciate guest feedback.  The parking rates are comparable to other resorts on the beach.  Parking space is at a premium but we try to keep it as affordable as possible.  We're glad you enjoyed the resort's location with easy access to the public beach, shopping and restaurants.  Most of all, we hope you'll be back with us again soon for more fun on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: April vacation 2018
review: My husband and I visit Clearwater regularly, but it had been a couple of years.  This was our favorite spot, but we will probably not return unless updates are made.  For $250 per night, you should get a pretty nice place.  The rooms were clean, but the bathroom did not have air conditioning.  The hallway was also not air conditioned and the carpet needed replacing.  The oceanfront view was nice, but the umbrellas viewed from the room to the outside restaurant seating needed to be replaced.  Other than the updates, service was good throughout.  Oh yes, one more thing.  I saw a dog in the hallway and would recommend asking for a pet free floor if you are not an animal lover (if there is one).  Was not aware of the $18 per day parking fee.

title: Standard rooms but friendly staff
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We appreciate your feedback and it is shared with our management team.  We have made some updates to the property and will continue to do so in the future, so please check back with us.  Thanks for the compliment on the service.  Our team wants every guest to enjoy their stay.    As far as the dog is concerned, we only allow service dogs so we do not have a pet free floor, and as for parking, we keep the rates in line with what other area resorts charge.  Space is scarce so you'll find mostly all resorts do charge.  We hope you'll consider returning again for more fun on Clearwater Beach.  On behalf of Holiday Inn, we thank you again.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A smile goes a long way
review: Great location!  Able to be right on the gulf with gorgeous views from poolside of dolphins playing alongside the boats passing by. Excellent sunset views and fun restaurant and bar Jimmy’s Fish House and Iguana bar. Its right on the gulf but not on the sand but it’s less than 5 min walk to the beach. Everyone who works here has been pleasant and helpful

title: GREAT STAY!
review: This was our second time staying at this Holiday Inn. We booked our rooms through Allegiant Airlines and saved a lot of money.  The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Check-in for us was a breeze. Our room was clean and we had an amazing view of the Gulf from our balcony.  Room service is excellent and we always tip our housekeeper.  It got a little loud at the pool with some spring breakers but it was nothing major. A couple of nights we were awakened by loud spring breaker voices but again it wasn't anything major for us. It's spring break in Clearwater.  Nothing fancy here but it is clean, friendly, and has rooms with great views! We will definitely return next year.

title: Great location. Nice hotel.
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you found us through our great partner, Allegiant Airlines!    We really appreciate your compliments to our staff, including the cleanliness of the rooms.  Our entire team here works hard to ensure every guest has a great stay and leaves with good memories.  You are right - spring break can sometimes bring out those who have partied too much -- sure hope it wasn't too bothersome for you.  We look forward to having you back next year.  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice Hotel but...
review: This hotel is in a great location for a beach vacation. Twenty minute walk to the marina or pier. Lots of shops and restaurants nearby. The hotel is not the newest or fanciest, but it is clean and was very comfortable for our family of four. The pool is very nice, the restaurant ok, and you are able to hop out into the ocean for shell hunting easily in the late afternoon.  Hotel staff were all nice and helpful to us during our five day stay.

title: best visit in a long time
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We're so pleased you enjoyed the resort and its closeness to all the activities of the public beach area.  We need to mention for those who are reading this that there is a trolley and Florida Free Ride service that will take you up to the public beach if you prefer not to walk.  Your compliments to our staff are much appreciated -- everyone here wants each guest to leave with a great memory.  Sure hope you'll be back with us again - soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Squeezed a day in at the beach.
review: The location of the hotel was great and the room itself was fine.  However, we were woken up twice during our three night stay in the early morning hours (2:00 one morning and 3:00 am another) for the fire alarm.  No explanation was given to the guests.  Also, the security of the hotel is lacking.  You can access any door/stairwell without your hotel key.  The $18 parking fee is rather high too.  We most likely will not stay there again.

title: Oh. It is awful.
review: So.  First night.  Debris on sheets.  Please just change.  Second night.  Nope.   Call down to get sheets change.  Then after sheets changed coffee maker you guessed it - not cleaned.   You have got to be kidding me?   Yeah. Find somewhere else to stay.  Room 206. March 14th.

title: Amazing.
review: Hello Laura,  I called you yesterday and am waiting for you to call  back so we can discuss your issues.   We hope you can connect soon.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice place to stay
review: I can't say enough wonderful things about the staff and hotel.  Esp. Gary, he went over and above to help me.  Will only stay there from now on.  The room was beautiful, the grounds and view were nice.  The food was delicious.  Over and above service.  Can't wait to go back.

title: 2nd year and it's still the best!
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased you stayed with us and enjoyed the resort!   We'll let Gary know that he made your stay special because that is, of course, our #1 priority.    We can't wait for you to come back either -- hope it's soon!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Not on the beach
review: We have been staying at this Holiday Inn for the past several years.  We find that it is reasonable with a nice view of the gulf.  This hotel is waterfront but not beachfront so if you are looking for beach access this is not the place.   The pool area is very nice and they provide pool towels.  You do have to pay to park and there is a garage next door.  We were fortunate enough to find a spot outside on the lot and not have to deal with the garage.    We had asked for a later check-out since our flight was late afternoon and we were a Priority club member but the front desk was only able to give us an extra hour, that was disappointing but that was our only issue.

title: Great Place To Stay
review: This was a great place. The location is right on the water, just a short walk from Clearwater Beach. Nice pool area and perfect view of the gulf. The indoor/outdoor bar was great. Food was very tasty and the drinks hit the spot. The staff was friendly. I would recommend staying here when visiting Clearwater Beach!

title: Good hotel
review: Thank you so much!  We're so pleased to know you had a great time and that you enjoyed all the amenities of our resort.  We'll share your compliments with our staff because everyone has a goal to ensure a great experience for each guest.  We do hope you'll be back for more fun in the sun - soon!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Long Weekend Getaway
review: We stayed here for two nights in an allocated on arrival room.  As we are members of their reward club they gave us a suite., the guy on check in was very friendly, in the past we have had indifferent service on reception, so it was good to get friendly service. The suite was very nice and the pool area well maintained.  They had run out of pool towels to a member of staff very helpfully gave us beach towels.

title: Management complaint
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write.  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay - and we certainly thank you for being a member of the Holiday Inn Rewards Program.  Your compliments will be shared with our staff because each and every one has a goal to provide our guests with a wonderful experience.     We do hope you'll be back with us again for more fun in the sun.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Its ok
review: Everything was great!  staff, food, pool, bar, entertainment.  Easy to get to local sites, beach, docks, entertainment, shopping, restaurants, airport, fishing, jet skiing, boating, cruising, sunset, scooter rental, etc.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Only stayed for one night. Got in early and room wasn't ready. Got a prkg pass and sat next to pool for a couple hours having a few drinks @ the bar. Room was big & clean. Nice walk-in shower. Two TVS although we weren't there to watch and never even turned them on. Pool looked inviting. Reading other reviews I didn't smell smoke and it was really quiet at night. From the signs posted in the lobby it's supposed to be a nonsmoking facility. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Connie Hocking
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay here and thanks for taking time to leave comments so other readers can see what we have to offer.  You're right - many people find that they stay so busy they never have time to watch t.v.  We're sure you found that the views are much more enjoyable to watch!  We do hope you'll be back with us again.  There is always something fun to do in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location right in the water
review: Thursday February 8,2018.seven family member ate at Jimmy . My food was excellent. One order was wrong. Two had cold French fries. The waitress was very rude. My bill was $24.37 18%tip4.19 total $28.56. She brought back $11.00. I ask about the .44 cent. She said are you kidding me. No I think it is very rude and steeling. She did go to her purse and get the 44 cent. The manager was told and not everyone in the party was happy about Lisa the waitress attitude. We stayed at the hotel very nice clean on the water great view.

title: Clean room. Friendly staff
review: Thank you for taking time to write us about your experience here.   We're glad you enjoyed our property and appreciate your comments on our location and cleanliness.  As far as Jimmy's is concerned, may we suggest you write a review directly on their Trip Advisor page which is Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar?  That way their manager can be aware of what your issue was and be able to respond directly.  It is our wish that your entire experience be a good one so please know we do value you as a customer and hope this one staff member did not tarnish your memories of a good beach vacation.  Thank you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: THIS IS YOUR PARTY HOTEL!
review: We booked this hotel through a Delta Airlines package.  The hotel was clean, close to everything, heated pool right on the water front, and...the bed in our first room was so comfortable we took a picture of the tag so we could try to find the same one for home.  The package was to include a room with a balcony which we did not get for the first 3 days, in a hotel that was not full.  The front desk manager told us that if we had booked with them directly we would have had a better room, and she wouldn’t move us for 3 days/nights.  However, they did allow us to move after a few days to a room as promised.  Outside of that singular poor experience, the location, amenities(nice pool and workout facility), the connected restaurant and bar are great.  It is a short cab/Uber ride from…

title: fun place
review: This hotel is clean. The pool right by the water is amazing! We loved laying by the pool but if we felt like it we could go down to the lower deck right on the water....or walk a few steps to the beach! The concierge (Shirley) made our trip 10 times better with awesome suggestions and friendly service.

title: Location was great
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for writing about your experience.  We'll let Shirley know you sent compliments to her!  We do hope you'll be back again soon for more fun in the sun.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Do it yourself housekeeping!?
review: I had a minor problem on our first night, the bed was harder than what I wanted. I contacted the desk clerk the next morning and took care of the problem. I was very impressed with this. The room was great and staff wonderful. The location was close to our relative and had walking paths very close by. It was a perfect location for us.

title: Great family suite with beautiful view
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay here.  We're so pleased you called attention to the issue of the bed so we could correct it while you were here.  Your compliments to the staff are so appreciated because each of our team wants each guest to have a fabulous stay -- and we certainly hope you'll be back with us again for more sun and fun!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Conveniently located, clean, and reasonably priced
review: I've stayed here before and my daughter loved it so we came back, but we'll never return. The lack of service received from housekeeping is absolutely inexcusable. The room has 2 beds and today they only made one bed and left the other completely undone with sheets/blanket on the floor. Went to the front desk and asked for the bed to be made. Housekeeper came and proceeded to take the dirty sheets/blanket and put them on the bed. Speechless, we left. Returned to find pillows thrown on the other bed that was made and the bed we complained about with no pillows. Front desk said they can't do anything. When I pay $500 for a hotel stay, I expect beds to be made, not for me to do it myself so I can sleep, simple as that. If the staff at this hotel can't figure that out, they should…

title: Wedding
review: The hotel was really nice and clean. Wonderful area to have a wedding. Great area to walk around and many things to sightsee. The back of the hotel sits right on the gulf. I will definitely visit this hotel again. The staff was friendly too.

title: Very poor setvice
review: Thank you!   We're delighted you enjoyed your stay while attending for a wedding, and even more delighted that you plan to return for a future getaway.  We'll look forward to having you here!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Time in Clearwater
review: Looking firwards to diner at Jimmies. Ordered the raw oysters.  Very small and still attached. No silverware so we had to scrape the oysters from the shell with cittlery from a table from us. No waitress checking on us. Wife had a sour glass of wine, and by the time she got up to find a waitress,  i was finished my drink.  Very poor service and food. Last time i will go there.

title: Great stay
review: Hello, please know that Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar has a separate page for reviews and you may want to post your comments there.  We know management always appreciates feedback in an effort to maintain and improve customer service.  Thank you,  Christine Bottger General Manager Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach

title: great location to the beach
review: The Location is great, walking distance to the beach, restaurants and Clearwater Marine Aquarium.   Overall the staff is very nice. The only set back was one of the elevators was not working, therefore creating long waits in the lobby and your floor.  My son and I took the stairs, which concerned us the stairs led outside and the door was never locked (good for us because we were tired of waiting for the elevator) however made us question security at night.  Even at night you could access the stairs without a key.

title: Great as always!
review: We travel to Clearwater a couple times a year.  When we get a hotel we always love to stay at Holiday Inn & Suites Clearwater Beach.  The suites are roomy and work great for our family.  The big pool is heated and clean.  The kiddie pool could be warmer.  I don't believe it is heated, or it wasn't on while we were there.  There are many restaurants nearby and it is a short walk to the public beach and pier 60.  I wasn't a fan of the pillows and usually bring my own, but only brought a small carry on this time.

title: Wonderful Vacation
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your family's stay with us!   We're glad you enjoyed all we have to offer as well as close proximity to beach and other Clearwater attractions.  Anytime you stay with us and find that anything that would make your stay more pleasant, please feel free to reach out to us (as in the pillows).   We want to do everything we can to make certain you leave with great memories.  Happy Holidays and we hope you'll be back with us in 2018!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Family short stay
review: We stayed here for three nights and we loved it so much we cancelled our reservation at another hotel down the street to stay here for another three nights. We loved our room 510 the views were spectacular. Every morning we would have our coffees on the balcony watching the boats go by. The room was clean, and the staff were excellent. It was our first time visiting Clearwater Beach, and we will be back.

title: Return and Regressed!
review: Thank you!   We're delighted you enjoyed your vacation in Clearwater - and even more thrilled that you stayed with us!  You're so right - balcony views offer even more ways to catch views of beautiful Gulf of Mexico, sailing ships and dolphins.    We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to our staff.  They try hard to make certain each of our guests leave with great memories.  Thanks again, happy holidays, and we'll look forward to seeing you again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Weeekend Getaway
review: Stayed here for 2 nights in late October, we've visited this hotel several times over the last 15 years and love it's great location for the beech and attractions of Clearwater. We thought with our grandson we would book bead and breakfast, bit disappointed as you get a voucher which unless you order the cheapest item it doesn't cover the cost so you have to put to plus tip, although kid's eat free, next time I'll give it a miss and go to the IHOP  The hotel is great clean well appointed rooms and the staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful,  Although it's not on the website they CHARGE for parking $7.50 per night

title: Fulfilling Bucket Lists
review: This was my 2nd stay at Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites Clearwater Beach. Both times have been perfect. My friend and I stayed at HI for an extended weekend and were upgraded to a pool cabana room. I was afraid it would be noisy by the pool, bar, and arcade. I wasn't sure we would want to stay by the pool, but Tamera (?) gave me a key to check it out before I made any decisions. The view took my breath away! Not only could we walk out our doors and step in the pool, but we could walk a few more feet and lounge on the deck by the Gulf or step in and out of Jimmys for a drink anytime we wanted! You must try one of their Bloody Mary's, just don't let the seagulls steal the shrimp skewer! The pool was beautifully lit up at night, there was live music, perfect weather as always, helpful…

title: Oh my...
review: Thank you!   We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and so appreciate that you took time to share some of your experiences on Trip Advisor so others can know what to expect.  Yes, the view is what most guests rave about - we are so close to the water and have awesome views of Gulf sunsets.     Thanks also for the compliments to our staff.  We'll share them with our team because everyone here wants each guest to have a fine experience.  Sure hope you'll be back with us ASAP!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Very much a great family and business hotel
review: Ok over all it's a nice place but after 3 can u tell me where to get a decent cup of coffee?? I get they want to sell booze but all I wanted was a cup of coffee & I was told if u go out the front down & go about 3 blocks..... oh my

title: Very Good Location
review: Thank you for taking time to write comments about your stay with us.  We do have coffee makers in every room but we do not have coffee service until 6:30 a.m.  We appreciate your feedback and hope that - other than that - you enjoyed your stay in Clearwater.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A nice stay
review: We stay here at least once a month. Hotel staff are great. Pool and Food is great. Outside bar is very nice near the pool. free shots at sunset for paying customers. can walk to some private beaches and fish from shore. Overall exceptional. Hotel is in need of a bit updating however we are happy and comfortable every time we stay. Gary the manager will take care of you and your needs.

title: Great place to stay on Clearwater Beach
review: Stayed here towards the end of September 2017. We had booked a gulf view room and this was available around 1PM which was handy. The hotel is in a good location, although it's not right on the beach itself its only a few minutes walk away. I like the location as it's near enough to the beach, restaurants and shops and it's a nice walk back in the evening.  The room was a bit tired but does the job. Plenty of space, AC worked well and it was comfortable.   We ate in Jimmy's bar which is on site and it was so much better than we expected. Service was great and so was the food. Definitely get some wings if you do visit.  The only negative I'd say is that the whole hotel needs a bit of an update.   Would stay here again if visiting Clearwater Beach!

title: Un-vacation
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased you stayed with us for your Florida holiday and that you enjoyed all there is to see and do on Clearwater Beach.  Please know that we share guest feedback with top management so your comments will be addressed at an upcoming meeting.  We're also pleased you enjoyed Jimmy's Fish House (they do have their own Trip Advisor page) and all our resort amenities.  We hope you'll be like so many others and make plans to return for more fun and memories.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice Hotel, Nice Pool and Super Friendly Staff!
review: Gave our room away twice, then told us half way through our 6 night stay that we cancelled our reservation & checked out. Had to confront the manager to get our room back for the remainder of our stay. The poolside is advertised & posted no smoking, but poolside attendant turns a blind eye to it.  Wifi is very spotty, even in rooms  Constantly cutting in and out. Over the six night stay our room was only half cleaned

title: NIce exterior but tired interior
review: While we appreciate your comments and take guest feedback seriously, we have been unable to locate your reservation in our system so we are unable to respond properly.   We don't know if possibly you stayed with us right after Hurricane Harvey, had your room booked under another name, or other specifics.  In any event, we do take customer service seriously and strive to do our best to satisfy all our guests.  We regret that you had a less then enjoyable stay with us.   If you care to contact me personally, please feel free to do so at CBottger@clearwaterbeachhi.com.   Thank you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Beautiful Property
review: The price is right for being on the water. There is a trolley line with tops right across the street. The lobby is comfy, there is a little shop there and it is right next to Shepard's Inn if you want to hit clubs and party a short walk away. This seems to be a very family friendly hotel. The pool is alright! Very laid back and not stuffy.. The staff were great. The restaurant there has okay food, but it smells funny in there and the bar is a dud.

title: Comfy and Friendly
review: Spent 4 comfortable nights during a work trip. Parking is a bit of an issue as the garage is attached to another hotel so it wasn’t real easy getting to my car on busy nights. Room was clean and AC worked great. It wasn’t too busy this time of year. Concierge station was a big help. I’ll be back.

title: A Wonderful Place To Stay and Will Be Back
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your recent stay with us.  We have many guests who come here in business and then return for pleasure and we hope you'll be among them.  You are right, the fall is a perfect time to come with nice weather and less crowds.  We look forward to your next visit!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Hotel Staff/Location - Concierge not helpful
review: Me and my wife booked for one week, and were certainly glad we did.  If one wanted too, staying just at the hotel alone, every need would be met without going anywhere.  The room we stayed in was on the 7th floor and was perfect to watch all the people walking, to the left a view of the Gulf, and the whole street scene.  The beds were very comfortable, the flat screen TV was of very good size, and the coffee maker, refrigerator and micro wave was very useful.  Our days were started with coffee on the balcony, then breakfast at Jimmy's Fish House & Iguana Bar (right on the hotel grounds) outside by the Gulf waters (Great Views!). Then it would be outside to the pool area where we relaxed with the Tiki Bar next to us and the pool in front of us. The pool is quite large and the…

title: Friendly Staff and Great Location
review: How nice of you to take time to write about your stay and directly address our team members who went out of their way to help you.  Be sure that they - as well as their supervisor - will read your compliments.  Guest satisfaction is so important to us so we're pleased you left with good memories.  Please also know the internet issue is being addressed - we're so fortunate we had some tech-savvy staff who could help solve your problem!  Most of all, we're delighted to hear you are already planning your return trip.  There is always something fun going on in Clearwater and we look forward to seeing you again.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Stuck in elevator
review: We arrived today for a couple of nights stay. We are IHG members and only stay at their hotels. We were upgraded without having to ask and although we are not Gulf facing we do have a “water view”.  Thanks front desk staff!  We went exploring and saw trolleys/buses and thought it would be a great way to go to the Clearwater Aquarium. When we returned to hotel the front desk staff was busy checking In guests so I talked to the concierge about trolley to aquarium. She told me they didn’t go there but gave me a card for a “free ride” but would need to tip. I came up to room and called the trolley and found they pick up outside the hotel and drop off 1/2 block from aquarium! This is the second time I have relied on a concierge at a Holiday Inn and did not get correct information. It…

title: Good Hotel.... Slightly outdated but very good location
review: I think my title says it all.... the location is very good. Very nice view of the bay, good restaurants inside the hotel for some good sea food... or to just watch the sunset from the room... the beach area is just 15 min walk away.... with options of food and beverages close by. The room and the hotel is a bit outdated.... but it meets the requirement. Good pool inside the hotel near the beach.... I would stay there again when I go to clearwater.

title: Worst birthday weekend. Room 142 worst!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and taking time to write about your visit.  We're glad you found our resort to meet your needs for location and amenities and do know that your comments will be shared with top management so we can address the issue you brought up.  Ultimately, we're glad you are already thinking about your next visit and we do look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Very good experience
review: Planned weekend for over a month, got to hotel before three. Was told by Ayr that our room was just getting finished. He said he would text. By 4:30, we heard nothing.  When we went back to lobby, other desk employee said they were Very Busy  Then they give me room 142 which smells like an old room in Vegas near a bad showgirl show. It's smells like smoke and is right next to bar. If you want to smoke all night and listen to bar band .. this room is for you

title: Good location but no beach and overpriced
review: Thanks for your comments.   This hotel does not have a Room 142, however.  You may have us confused with another Holiday Inn.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Basic Hotel with Very Friendly Staff
review: My wife and I spent four nights here in mid September '17 - room only basis.  Our third floor room had a terrific view over the Gulf and we witnessed some wonderful sunsets from the balcony.  We ate a dinner, snack and a couple of breakfasts in 'Jimmy's.'  The food was fine though the service in the outdoor dining area was less than satisfactory.  The bar snacks (pulled pork  and mini cheeseburgers) were particularly tasty.  The beautiful white-sand beach (the consistency of powder) is a five-minute walk from the hotel. After 3 pm you can hire a Cabana for $20 until 5 pm.  Local restaurants are very good and competitively priced.  We had a lovely snack in Frenchy's,  breakfast in I-Hop and another nearby in Shephard's Ocean Flame.  We also had a superb buffet dinner (reasonably…

title: Great location and nice hotel
review: Really enjoyed our few days at this hotel. The hotel staff are faultless, friendly and really helpful. The rooms are well appointed and very clean. The hotel is situated 5 minutes walk from the main beach and only a couple of minutes away from restaurants and shops. It has a coffee shop and restaurant on site which was nice for breakfast. The pool area is well maintained with a great little bar and views of the sunset to die for. Only bug bear was the parking fee per day which is a bit unfair when the only way to get here from Orlando is to drive. As I'd booked so early they happily honoured the old parking fee of 12 dollars but nowadays it's 20 dollars per day which is a bit steep.

title: What a wonderful holiday
review: Thank you for sharing compliments on our recent stay with us.  We're so glad you enjoyed the resort, it's amenities, and our close proximity to beautiful Clearwater Beach.  It's the perfect way to unwind after a few days of walking around the Orlando theme parks!  Re: your comment on the parking.  We're sorry we have to charge but space is at such a premium here on the beach.  We do try to keep our rates competitive and affordable.  Yes, we do have many people who drive here.  We hope you left with great memories of Clearwater Beach and will be back with us again. Thanks for being a Holiday Inn customer!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 3 days in Clearwater
review: 7 nights at the Holiday Inn Clearwater, fantastic room overlooking the Gulf of Mexico. Absolutely perfect location for the beaches bars and restaurants. Massive thank you to Gill who looked after us so well.

title: Meh
review: Thank you so much!  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we'll sure pass on your compliment to Gill!  It's nice that you had a whole week to enjoy all that Clearwater Beach has to offer and we hope you'll come back and see us all again.    Thanks for being a valued customer of Holiday Inn!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great value
review: After a full on fortnight spent in Orlando, these three days were to unwind and chill out before going home. The Holiday Inn, is an older hotel and worn in places, but she is doing well for her age!! The staff are really very helpful and so friendly.  It would have been nicer to have a sea view, our balcony overlooked a car park entrance to the hotel next door. The rooms are equipped with tea/coffee making facility, fridge and in the bathroom a hairdryer.  Complimentary toiletries provided.  The room cleaning staff are lovely and make up the beds daily and change sheets every three days. We dined in Jimmy's and toasted in the sunset on our first night which was just amazing.  The hotel is in a good position with a short walk (10-15 mins) to an absolutely beautiful beach! Just…

title: Just okay
review: We purchased a vacation package with an advanced purchase offer. We paid for an upgrade and were guaranteed a room ready for an early arrival. When we did arrive, we were greeted by a young lady who could not accommodate a single one of our requests. Even after I showed her the email that stated our room will be guaranteed ready for an early arrival, she said we do not promise anything. This forced me, and my family, to embarrassingly take our luggage and go change in the public restroom, which was difficult enough considering we were traveling with a toddler. After 12 hours of travel, we wanted nothing more than to be in a bed but they were not helping us out. When we finally arrived to our room, it was a room on the 2nd floor facing a strange alley. We did not have a balcony.…

title: Relaxing Week
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your family's stay with us.  We know traveling with a toddler for that long a time can be tiring and we're so sorry you did not get a great first impression of our resort.  Please know that feedback such as yours is used to share with our top management heads in our efforts to address anything that needs to change or improve, and you've noted several areas which need to improve.  It saddens us to hear you do not plan to return because we have many, many people who have stayed with us year after year.   If you do come this way, please feel free to reach out to me personally.  We really would like the opportunity to make a better impression.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Awesome!
review: Ive just returned to the UK after a 3 week holiday in Orlando and a week in Clearwater! Me and my family had previously booked this trip 2 years ago and it had been paid off.. on arrival they told us we had not got the 3 rooms we paid for and that our family of 8 were all staying in one room! After a 2hr 40 min drive this is not what we wanted to hear! This was not a fault of the hotel and respect to them for sorting this issue! This meant we could enjoy a relaxing week here! Jimmys fishhouse is delicious and the fact my lil sister and brother ate for free was icing on the cake! We loved enjoying a cocktail and having a sunset shot ...spotting dolphins in the ocean! This hotel has a lot to offer and is within walking distance of a supermarket and some nice restaurants if you…

title: Unexpected Visit
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you told us about your Florida holiday and your experience staying with us after Orlando.  You're right  -  8 people in one room would have been a bit crowded!   We're glad our staff was able to sort it out for you and that you went on to enjoy all the beauty and fun of Clearwater Beach.  Please know we'd love to see you back here if you return to the states and Florida.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Not what I expected
review: Ended my family vacation here after Disney and was not disappointed. With two toddlers (2 &1) we had everything we needed here including complimentary crib. A great plus was kids eat free with purchase of adult entree at Jimmy's Fish House ( attached restaurant), we had a great dinner there after playing at the beach(beautiful and worth the 5 min walk). The restaurant is on the water With a great view and good food. We had burgers w/ fries and the kids had pizza w/ fruit and Mac and cheese with carrot and celery sticks. We ate every bite. We had a large 2 bedroom which faced the ocean with a balcony and view of the pool( also a 1 ft kiddie pool which was perfect for my babies to jump and swim while I enjoyed a drink from the bar) The room had 2 bathrooms one very modern and the…

title: Great value and excellent service
review: We booked a last minute trip to Clearwater.  First two nights through Holiday Inn Reservations and the 3rd night through Hotels.com.  When we checked in we explained to Tammy at the front desk, even though we had two different bookings we were hoping to stay in the same room.  Immediately she said, let me see what I could do.  Within minutes she had us taken care of so we were in the same room for all 3 nights.  She was super friendly and helpful..  Also want to say that the staff at the Black/White coffee and waffle café were also super helpful.  Gave me information about the trolley that ran through town as well as menus and locations of the other Jimmy's restaurants nearby that we checked out.  Loved our stay and would definitely stay here again.

title: This is my go-to hotel for Clearwater Beach
review: Thank you!   We're so glad you had opportunity to stay with us for your beach vacation and we certainly appreciation your fine compliment to Tammy.   We'll be sure to pass it along and share with her supervisor.  All of our team members are committed to making each guest enjoy their stay and we're delighted that was a positive part of your experience.  There is always something fun to do in Clearwater and always a reason to come back so we look forward to your next visit - hopefully soon.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: Perfect location - walking distance to all the action, and right next door to happening night life at Sheppard's. Clean, great service. Awesome tiki bar poolside. Right on the water. Quiet for sleeping but right next to all the fun stuff to do in Clearwater Beach.

title: Great Place To Stay
review: Thanks!   We love that saying "your go-to hotel" and hope you'll be back with us soon.  You're right - our location makes it easy to get around to all the parts of Clearwater Beach, yet we have so much to offer right here at the resort.  Thank you so much for taking time to review us!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good location and price. Rooms and space could use some TLC, but decent budget minded hotel.
review: The Holiday Inn in Clearwater is a very nice and friendly hotel. It is very close to the beach and from the pool there is an excellent view over the bay and the Mexican Gulf. It was the second time we visites this hotel and we will chose this one again if we visit Clearwater again.

title: Gulf view
review: Stayed on business and had a very nice view of the gulf and a walk-out area to sit outside. Not directly on the beach, but a very short walk from. Rooms and furnishings seem older, but were clean- walk-in shower was nice. The suites are very generous compared to a lot of similar properties; I got two whole rooms rather than just some extra square footage in a single room. The room blocks are split into two sections and there are separate elevators for each section, so make sure you pay attention or ask which you need to take. Pool was clean. Seemed like they had had live music outside on the restaurant patio most nights. I could hear this in my room even with the windows/door shut, but they stopped playing at around 10pm. The parking setup could be better; the garage is shared…

title: Hidden Fees
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We do hope that during your stay for business that you had a bit of time to enjoy the resort and our beautiful Gulf views.  You are right - our suites are very popular with guests, especially those who stay for more than one night.    Parking is at a premium on Clearwater Beach, so we do utilize the parking space next door now and hope it was not an inconvenience to you.  Please come back again when you can enjoy some real leisure time!    Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Vacation
review: I booked my reservation back in May for a family vacation. At that time the hotel offered the option of valet parking for a fee of $18 per day per car. However upon using the hotel website search engine I filtered free parking hotels only. This hotel did pop up on my list, seeing that the valet was optional I booked. Upon arrival they had 4 front desk people working all busy so I waited in line, noticing most of the customers were up happy and asking what the chargers were for. When I walk up to the counter and get checked in, early even, my rooms are ready and the front desk lady was very nice and apologized that my rooms would be on different floors, no big deal at all. Then she tells me I have to pay a $100 deposit on each room, mind you I have already pre paid for my rooms…

title: Great view of the sunset.
review: Dear Ashley W:  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn and for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience at Holiday Inn CLEARWATER BEACH.  I would like to start by apologizing to you for not meeting your expectations. We strive to make each stay as pleasant and comfortable as possible, and we will use your comments to coach our team, in order to provide a better experience in the future. We do our best to ensure our guest's are completely aware of our parking fees and are sorry for any miscommunication relating to this, but none the less that doesn't excuse the behavior of our Guest Service Team member.    I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your unsatisfactory stay was an exception.   Again, thank you for sharing your comments, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly.    Best Regards Christine Bottger Genenral Manager

title: Great value with gulf views
review: The Holiday Inn and Suites very nice hotel rooms were nice and clean. The hotel had a very nice bar and live music. Enjoy the pool very much. Hotel was close to everything walking distance to shops, stores and restaurants  the only thing I didn't like was the maid service had to ask for towels every day and didn't clean room till late but other than that very nice hotel

title: Pretty Good Stay
review: I was worried after reading some of the older reviews about this hotel, We stayed for a family vacation (2 night, July 23-July 25 2017) We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite. The hotel room was very clean, beds were comfy, the cleaning staff were very polite. The front staff were helpful and friendly. What I did not like was the pool. It was a bit too deep for little ones, the do have a baby pool, but nothing in between for 4 & 5 year olds, Plus the pool is not open till 9 am and when we were there it was closed because of a broken light, they did eventually get it fixed. There is also NO BEACH, its kind of a beach, if you walk a bit around the corner in the back. The hotel restaurant ( Iguana Joes, or something ) was just okay, the waiter was kind of rude! Food was just meh. The price…

title: Family Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review your stay with us.  Please know that guest feedback allows us to improve so that each stay will be superb and memorable, which is our goal.  Point well taken on the pool - your little ones are in-between the kiddie pool and the big pool.  We do hope they did enjoy water fun at one of the pools.    You are right, we do not have a beach and we say that on our website, although the public beach is less than a five minute walk or a Trolley ride away.     We appreciate your compliments to our staff - they work hard to make sure each guest has fun!   Sure hope you'll return soon -- and here's a tip - if you can avoid the higher occupancy seasons and visit when school is in session or not spring break, you will find lower prices!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Holiday inn at Clearwater Beach!
review: My mom & I were there in March for a vacation on the way home from Key West. This hotel was recommended to us from a friend who's lived a mile away from the hotel for 22 years. The hotel was SO awesome and fun, that we've decided to come back the end of July with the family. Can't wait. Great hotel, great staff & great location!!!

title: Average Hotel
review: How wonderful!  We love to hear that guest can't wait to come back - and please thank your friend for recommending us!  We're glad you and your mom had a fabulous time.  There is so much to do at the resort and the nearby beach - and always a special event happening.  We hope you'll come to see us often for more beach memories!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Anniversary weekend getaway
review: Dont be put off by the lack of direct beach access, short walk and killer bay view and ocean views south. Great family hotel with food options galore and great access to a very short sidewalk to beach. Great Stay!

title: Go there!
review: I booked 3 rooms for 1 night. 2 of the rooms were facing the gulf on the 7th floor and had balconies with a fantastic view of the gulf. Even saw a dolphin swim by. Great views of thunderstorms at night time as well. The room i stayed in was a bit noisy at sleep time as the air con would run all the time but if it gets a bit much there is an off switch but it will get very hot! The best of the rooms was 718 which had 2 queen sized beds and a big room with 2 windows. The rooms also have fridge and microwave and cutlery if you want a quick snack. Jimmys bar is right below with a family friendly restaurant and a 'sit at bar' place for the over 21's. I plan on returning for my wife's special birthday but we stay at least at week as you dont need a car there as everything is within…

title: Average Beach Hotel
review: Thank you!   How nice of you to write about your visit with us and we're so glad your group had a great getaway.  You're right - even those thunderstorms have their beauty although the dolphins and sunsets are the most popular!  We'll share your compliments with Jimmy's and our staff -- all of our team wants every guest to have a fabulous experience.  We look forward to having you with us for your wife's birthday.  It means a lot when our guests share special times with us.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Awesome
review: Decent location but not worth the price. Worth it to pay a little more and get beachside newer hotel. Breakfast was a standard Holiday Inn menu though we were told it was restaurant qualilty and selection.  Front desk staff not very friendly.  Rooms were clean.

title: Average, feel like ripped off
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your recent stay.  Also, we thank you for staying with us and providing guest feedback that will help our team improve the customer satisfaction of our guests.  We truly are very competitive in pricing with other beach resorts and keep our prices affordable since we're very much a family property.  As for Jimmy's not being "restaurant quality", we're not certain what that means but you are welcome to share that on their own Trip Advisor page.   We will address the staff friendliness at an upcoming meeting because we want every guest to receive excellent service.  Thanks again for staying with us.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Zenye is great!
review: Right on the water and just a 5 min walk to clearwater beach. Many food possibilities in walking distance. Rooms are up to date and staff is very friendly. Very nice hotel with pool and outside nar as well as Jimmys. Recommend highly

title: its an OK property
review: I do realize its summer time & rooms will be more expensive. However, for the price the living room furniture should have been a little nicer. This furniture was right out of the 70's. Suite did have 2 updated bathrooms that were beautiful!! Pool was nice. Bartenders  were excellent. Food at restaurant was nothing to write home about. Housekeeping was wonderful!! We even got an elephant made out of towels. Kitchenette had little fridge, sink, Keuric coffee pot and some real plates, glasses and silverware. Didn't have 2 burner stove like it said on website.

title: Couldnt Ask For More !!
review: Thank you for staying with us and providing feedback on your visit.  Please know that comments such as yours are shared with top management so we can continue to improve our customer experience.  We're glad you enjoyed the resort in general and our welcoming staff.  Everyone here wants each guest to leave with pleasant memories.  We are in process of updating some of our rooms so if you return, you may well see quite a new look.  We hope you'll be back with us!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Wonderful
review: Just spent Thursday thru Sunday here!!  Not 1 Complaint.. We stayed on 4th floor gulfview.. View was great, room was really clean, beds were very comfortable.  Pool was good. Tiki bar has a great atmosphere. Loved Jimmys Fish House.  Food and service was Excellent... Can't beat there Friday night All You Can Eat Grouper Dinner.. The Grouper was fantastic..A group called " Both Worlds " played both Friday and Saturday evenings and they are beyond GOOD !!  Like I said my husband and I both said you couldnt ask for more.. .

title: Nice but not exactly on the beach
review: How nice to you to share your great experience with us so that other readers can see first-hand what we offer here.  We're pleased you enjoyed your stay and room on the 4th - you're right, the views are pretty amazing.  Sure hope you saw dolphins!  Jimmy's will be pleased to know you enjoyed their fabulous grouper as well.  Thanks!  We'd love to see you back here again for more fun -- there's always something great happening in Clearwater!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great family vacation
review: Bought a package and this was the hotel the service was wonderful food and drinks above average would stay here again.They have a teki bar and a regular bar inside seating and outside eating the very best sunsets and lots of fun.i do have to note one of the bartenders her name was Terri she went above and beyond for all the customers was all over the bar the busy the better and still had a smile on her face she was wonderful.Ps at sunset they give out shots and the live music nightly does the count down very nice!

title: First trip to Tampa - Clearwater Beach area
review: A wonderful hotel - met all expectations and more. Stayed on sixth floor, room 654/A which overlooked the pool and the inlet separating Sand Key. The Staff was friendly and professional. Jill at the front desk provided lot of sightseeing tips and transporation ideas - like using the Jolly Trolley. Brandon was great at the pool. Jimmys Fish House (attached) was great for breakfast and dinner. They alsohad music at night overlooking the water. Lots of dolphin and manatee sightings. Highly recommended.

title: Not a beach hotel!!
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us, and you're right - views from the sixth floor are pretty amazing.    Your compliments to our staff are so appreciated; our entire team wants every one of our guests to have a great stay and we're so glad you had fun.  And...we're glad the dolphins and manatees added to your fun!  There's always something exciting happening in Clearwater and the beach and we hope you'll be back with us soon!  For all of us at Holiday Inns, thank you  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Disappointed
review: This hotel is near the beach, but be aware there is no beach! Also there is no hot tub.(missing my 2 vacation must haves) Also the hotel is currently under construction, so the pricey ($18 a day) surprise parking is limited. Overall I wil survive but I'd never choose to return to Clearwater as this is not my type of relaxing vacation atmosphere. I will stick with the Pensacola/Destin area

title: Bed Bugs
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us.  Of course, we want all our guests to leave with pleasant memories and we're sorry to hear you did not feel that way.  We do not claim to be on the beach; our website clearly states how close we are to the beach however.   You're right; we do not have a hot tub; please know the feedback and suggestions such as yours are reviewed by top management so we can ensure each guest has a top-notch experience.  Pensacaola is beautiful as well but if you do decide to return, feel free to contact me so we can help make your next visit to Clearwater Beach a wonderful experience.  From all of us at Holiday Inn, thank you  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Mehhhhh
review: Our family checked in for one night...the room we originally were given had blowers in them and smelled of mildew. No beach access which I wish had been more clear when reserving. Run down and there was no tub/shower to use for our little ones. Our room had a window with an amazing view but also looked right into next rooms balcony and suite so couldn't even enjoy it. Very disappointing for a quick trip to the beach.

title: Winter breakk
review: Stayed here in jan 2017 was a basic hotel but good .Th e views from the hotel into the Gulf was very nice ,balcony was big with 2 chairs and a table .There is a restaurant on site we didn't eat lunch but had breakfast which was good Staff all seem friendly .There is a countdown clock telling you what time sunset is which was good.Room was clean and tidy

title: Poor Quality with Cleanliness
review: Thanks!   We're glad you took time to write about us and we really appreciate your staff compliments.   Our team works hard so every guest can leave with pleasant memories.  There's always something exciting happening in Clearwater, so we hope you come back soon!   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Family Wedding
review: I have stayed at this Holiday Inn twice now on business travel for a couple of weeks at a time. The first time I stayed in this hotel I had zero problems with my experience. Unfortunately, this was not true for my current stay at this establishment. I am staying here for 2 weeks and have already changed rooms 3 times. The first day I arrived I noticed when I walked in the bathroom that the shower doors were wet, I figured that the cleaning service just finished cleaning my room right before I walked in. After coming back from dinner I noticed that the door was still wet. It turns out the shower head had a constant drip and mold began to surround the bottom lining of the shower. I spoke with the manager on duty about my situation and got changed to a different room. I was not…

title: Great Experience for the weekend start to finish
review: Hi daytonrhymes,  Thanks for choosing the Holiday Inn And Suites Clearwater Beach for your lodging needs, we're always glad to host your stays. Although it's nice to know that you did not encounter problems during your first stay and that you were transferred to two different rooms in an effort to resolve your concerns about the rooms' upkeep, it's disconcerting to learn that we fell below your expectations in terms of cleanliness and WiFi connection. This is certainly not what we expect from and be assured that your valuable feedback as a repeat guest will be shared with the team to help pinpoint areas that need improvement.  Thanks again for taking the time to post a review and do know that I've sent you a private message to obtain additional information.  Kind Regards,  Jillian I Case Manager IHGService

title: Fab 3 night stay
review: Booked the HI and Suites for one night, as we were renewing our wedding vows on the beach. As we travelled with family, we needed a hotel accessible to all members of our party.  Valet parking is the only option at the hotel,  worth noting you have to pay the hotel for parking, and also the valet for bringing your car back on check out. Check in was easy, we had called ahead and requested a room to change in if available, staff were very accommodating and actually had all 5 rooms ready for us. Room was spacious with 2 queen beds and a large bathroom, it also had a small kitchen, most importantly, it was all very clean.  We were heading down to Avalon St beach and reception called us a shuttle to take us all there. This was a great service, the driver just takes tips for payment…

title: Very Nice Stay
review: We stayed at this property on 6/2-6/4.  I had reached out to the General Manager prior to our visit with a request (celebrating anniversary), though she was unable to completely fulfill my request, she did however make up for it with a great room.  We found the hotel staff to be extremely pleasant, check in was a breeze.  Rooms were very clean, comfortable.  Bar staff outside were great, Amy was a great bartender!!!  Food was ok, not great but not bad at all.  We did find the prices of food and drinks to be very reasonable compared to other locations on the beach, so we give major props for that.  I would have to say we had a great weekend at this facility and would certainly recommend it to others.  The only negative I can share is the mandatory $18.00 a day parking, just seems…

title: Great Location!
review: Thanks for taking time to write about your stay with us, and we're honored you chose to be here for your anniversary!  So sorry we couldn't completely accommodate your requests - but we tried!  All guest feedback is shared with our executive team, so we will let them know of your compliments on the room cleanliness, Amy's great service, and staff friendliness.  As far as parking goes, we are competitive with other resorts on the beach and do try and keep it affordable for our guests.  Space is at a premium on the beach so we must have valet service.  We'd love to see you back here again next time you're ready for fun in the sun.  Thank again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A stay literally on the edge of the coast
review: Intercostal on one side 2 blocks from beach and restaurants. Even a CVS and post office a block away. Staff was nice, check in fast, room was large and clean. 2 downsides my room was on the inside and any noise echoed loudly. Ask for an outside quiet room if you're a light sleeper. Also there are steep steps to the front desk. If you have heavy luggage take the elevator from the parking lot below.  I would stay here again.

title: Wonderful Hotel !!!!!!!
review: Thank you so much for writing a review.  We think you meant to review our sister property in Indian Rocks, the Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites - Clearwater Beach South.    Ultimately, we're glad you enjoyed had a wonderful vacation here on Florida's beautiful west coast.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Comfortable and Great Location
review: I was looking for an affordable place to stay in Clearwater for Memorial Day weekend. I originally chose this location due to the fact it was available and was in a price range I was willing to pay. The hotel was in great shape and we had a poolside room. It was refreshing to not only have a room with a mini-fridge and microwave, but also a small sink, cabinets, silverware, plates, and other items to a least sufficiently reheat food and eat in the room. The pool, deck, and restaurant are right up against the sea wall. The view of the sunset from the deck in wonderful. To me, the only downside to the hotel is that valet parking is mandatory. I am just a person who does not like others driving my car or handling my bags and prefer to do it all myself. However, our stay was…

title: Standard room in a great place
review: We got a non-ocean view (room 604) booked for a business trip. Perhaps in the past there were more views from here, but the Edge Hotel next door blocks things now. It was a typical American hotel room with 2 queen beds, across from ice machine and elevator, which during our 5 days wasn't very noisy.  Our balcony view of the city even had a glimpse of Clearwater Beach because we were so high up (there are 7 floors total).  The room was clean, a bit dated as people have mentioned.  The hotel is on the water but not the beach - more like rocks lining the Intercoastal waterway.  Nice views from the pool.  It seems like a good deal (we got conference rates so it's hard for me to judge).  I'd stay here again.  Tip:  The AC unit vents onto the balcony, so if you want to sit out there…

title: Love it here
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience with us.  First off, we have to say -- we're impressed!  You walked all the way to the Clearwater Marine Aquarium -- and that's a hike (but worth it to see Winter & Hope dolphins!)  We appreciate your compliments and tips so that others can know what to expect.  Yes, we do continue to have valet parking since parking here on the beach is at a premium.  We do keep our rates as affordable as possible for our guests.  Please think about coming back for pleasure instead of business next time -- there's always something fun happening on Clearwater Beach!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Stay
review: Second year staying at this hotel! Clean, friendly, well kept. Absolutely love the view we have to the gulf. Short walk to the beach. Great with 2 young kids. Hotel is in convenient location. Paying for parking is no big deal. It ensures a place to park in the busy area. Valet guys always friendly. This is definitely our choice hotel for our Clearwater vacation! Price isn't off the charts! Even with the suit room we chose this year! Thanks for another cozy stay for the week! You guys did not disappoint!!

title: Great views, conveniently located
review: Thank you!   We're thrilled you and your family had a great time with us -- for the second time!   It's fun for us to see families returning with kids and see them grow up....so many of them experience the beach, dolphin watching and sunsets for the first time and that's what we're all about!  We appreciate your compliments on the valet staff and will share them.  The entire team here is committed to making every guest happy.   We do hope you're planning your third visit already!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Wow, what a great place to stay
review: This hotel has everything you could ask for if you are looking for a beach holiday it is a very good choice. Only a 3/4minute walk before you hit the sands of clearwater beach and 10/15 walk mins to Pier 60. Loads of restaurants in walking distance and the Jolley  trolley stops right outside the hotel which takes you up and down the beaches for a few dollars unlimited use per day . Jimmys fish house on site is great we had quite a few meals all good and music on the deck every night. The hotel itself offers good sized rooms lovely comfortable beds and good size bathroom . When the check in recognised I was a platinum elite member We were lucky enough to be given a complimentary upgrade to an ocean view suite which was lovely. We watched dolphins swimming by daily and the sunsets…

title: Too many pool rules
review: This hotel is situated right on the water and if you have that room view I bet it's an amazing view. We looked over the road, which we weren't that bothered about to be honest so it's not a negative. The room was lovely and big, we stayed 3 nights. Of our recent trip to the states this was by far the best room for air con. The first night (Saturday) we were woken up by "party people" coming back to their rooms. It felt like a party was going on in one of the rooms which was really annoying. When we went down to the pool area the next day, which is a great pool and we nabbed a sun lounger on the front of by the sea front, I noticed lots of signs. With lots of Do Nots up. Which I wanted to say get a life to. Somehow it annoyed me. We had a couple of beers from the pool bar $8 for…

title: Beautiful View
review: Thank you for taking time to share feedback on your recent stay.  We know you traveled a long way for your beach holiday and be assured that we wanted all aspects of it to be exceptional.  It is after the fact, but do know that the situation on the pool deck will be shared with management from Jimmy Guana's (separately run from the hotel).  Customer service is crucial to all of us and let me apologize that you did not receive what is the norm for our entire resort.  We do thank you again for staying with us and hope you left with good memories of plenty of dolphins jumping in the Gulf and gorgeous sunsets.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Just Returned From An Awesome Family Vacation!
review: Let's talk about the good things. Internet worked great. View was gorgeous. Trolley service picked us up close to the hotel and it was handicap accessible. Room was huge. Two hotel rooms hooked together. So you get not only a nice bedroom with a private balcony but another room with a living room and table with chairs. Two bathrooms! Two TVs. Fridge. Microwave. Very nice. Restaurant in the hotel had good food. Even though we paid for parking looks like you have to everywhere so it's understood.  Now the bad. The TVs in our room didn't allow us to switch the HDMI so no watching our traveling Roku. The people at the front desk were never helpful. Every question I asked they didn't really know. I wanted help with the local trolley system and they just said Oh I don't know. I think…

title: Outstanding visit!!!
review: First off, we thank you for staying with us and appreciate the comments you shared. Feedback is always welcomed because we really want each and every guest to have a superb experience.  We're glad you enjoyed the spaciousness of the two rooms and amenities and we'll share your comments with management of Jimmy's restaurant.  Regarding the less than exceptional service you received, we're very sorry.   Your questions should have been answered with knowledge and courtesy.  We will be addressing this with the department manager.  We sincerely regret that you were given less than exceptional service.   We do hope you'll be back with us again and thank you for being a valued Holiday Inn customer.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Trip Ruined
review: We were a bit concerned about our stay at Holiday Inn and Suites, Clearwater after having read some negative reviews. We are thankful that not only did we have not one negative experience, but we had a wonderful time. My kids (2, 7, 11) have already asked when we can go back. Valet parking is not an option, and you do have to pay both a valet fee, and a daily parking fee. The service worked without any problem at all. The attendants were all friendly. Check-in was a breeze as well. We stayed on the 7th floor in a king family suite right next to the elevator. No noise at all! The suite was great and had two bathrooms, a microwave, kitchen utensils,  refrigerator, coffee maker, a kids room with  bunk beds attached to the main bedroom, and a great balcony. The Kids Eat Free worked…

title: Poor communication
review: Arrived last night to some very polite guys ready to park the car. Check in was easy and although we had booked a night months ago we decided to stay another night and this was sorted out with no problem. Paying $12 per night for the car was not really an issue. The room is fine, bathroom a bit tired and the air con very noisy.  The main issue was the breakfast this morning. We booked breakfast (as we do in all hotels we stay at) but when we had finished we were charged an extra $20. As we only had cereal, orange juice and pancakes this was very disappointing. When querying this we were told we had ordered the refillable orange (we were asked if we wanted orange, tea, water, nothing about a refillable deal, and any way, in other hotels you can go and help yourself to drinks as…

title: Anniversary
review: We do apologize for the incident that occurred with Jimmy's Fish House.  Please know they are managed separately from the Holiday Inn and they do have their own Trip Advisor page.    We can understand your concerns and that there definitely seemed to be a miscommunication on the part of Jimmy's staff.   Please know we will address this with our management team but you are more than welcome to post your concerns on their page.  Please, sincerely, know that we in Holiday Inn value you as a customer.  Our goal is that each and every customer receive excellent service and leave with pleasant memories of their holiday.   We do hope you will consider staying with us again, and you are welcome to contact me directly if I can assist.  On behalf of Holiday Inn, thank you.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Wonderful experience
review: Very beautiful place. The service was excellent. And the restaurant's around are excellent. The view is beautiful. We will go back. And it is close to Tampa and Clearwater and St Petersbur g. And they are so much to vist.

title: A hotel with everything you need
review: We're so pleased. you enjoyed staying with us recently and appreciate that you took time to write a review.  We will share your compliments with our staff.  Every one of our team works hard to ensure our guests have a pleasant stay.  We certainly hope you'll come back again to enjoy another stay.   Here's a tip - we have a fabulous Clearwater Jazz Holiday each October!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location, great everything!
review: In February we spent several days there for my son's wedding. We had a terrific time. Every person we came in contact with had our best interest at heart.  It was a great vacation. My wife and I really enjoyed the restaurant, our waiter John, the pool area, and of course the wedding. Many thanks for an awesome experience. We will be back!

title: Great Location, Views, pool
review: Just returned from 3 nights at the Holiday Inn- Clearwater Beach.  Overally, it was a great stay.  Loved the location. (Its a super easy, quick  walk to the beautiful beaches, don't let the location put you off).  We paid for view of Gulf as well as a 2 Queen Bed suite. Beautiful views. Plenty of room for the family- the kids loved having their own bathroom and separate sitting room (with pull-out).  Great value for the $$.  Staff was friendly, pool was clean, towels provided for beach (no chairs- but you can rent by the day on the beach).  Jimmy's (the onsite restaurant) food, scenery and countdown to sunset was great. Fun atmosphere and great live singers.    My one big complaint was the interaction between Jimmy's restaurant and the hotel.  We were told more than once that…

title: Good Food, Restaurant Not Enclosed
review: We're sorry!  You are so right - although the restaurant and resort are managed separately, there was definitely a kink in the system when it came to what you experienced and you should not have been inconvenienced or had issues with the Holiday Inn Kids Eat Free program.  Please know - sincerely - that guest feedback is addressed with top management so that our customer satisfaction is always our priority.    Ultimately, we thank you for the comments on our resort itself and are glad you and your family enjoyed fun times on Clearwater Beach.  We do hope you will return again and feel confident that your experience will be as you expect.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Excellent
review: Great view of the ocean, with excellent food, especially their steaks.  Their Restaurant is indoors but opens to the outdoors, so you can not even feel the AC.  Staff was nice, rooms are nice, but the pool was always crowded.  They have a kiddie pool for families.

title: Bad first impression! 2hrs early for Checkin.
review: Thank you for staying with us and taking time to write about your experience.  You did come during a heavy booking time and our pool is very popular.  We appreciate your compliments to our staff (we will share them) and the beautiful Gulf views -- we hope you saw dolphins jumping!  We'll also pass along your compliments to Jimmy's Fish House staff -- glad you enjoyed your dining experience.  Hope to see you again soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Loved the pool area with live music
review: Very good hotel. Rooms are spacious all have balconies, fridge, microwave and coffee machine. Swimming pool is perfect with views of the ocean. Jimmys bar and restaurant is a good place to hang out of an evening, The only downfall I have is the $20 per day parking. Tip: free parking behind Subway near opposite the hotel. Staff are very helpful and friendly both in the hotel and restaurant. LISA our waitress was lovely. Lovely place for families couples or singles. Will be returning

title: Nice stay, but no beach access
review: This hotel was nice.  Beds were comfortable, and 2 choices of pillows, soft or firm.  Room was good size, not cramped.  Right on the Gulf, beautiful view, short walk to the Pier, decently priced.  My only complaint was that it did not have direct beach access.  We only stayed 1 night.  It only has valet parking.

title: Island Hotel WIYHOUT a View
review: Thank you for staying with us and sharing comments on your experience.  Yes, we are on the Gulf but not on the beach, but within five minutes (or a quick trolley-ride), our guests will be enjoying world-famous Clearwater Beach.  Parking space is a premium for all the resorts on the beach so valet is the only option we have.    We do hope you left with wonderful memories of Clearwater Beach and that you'll return again soon.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Valet parking
review: This was our first visit to Clearwater Beach.  We were celebrating a friend's 50th birthday with a day of festivities.  We were surprised to find we couldn't check in until 4:00pm so we had to find parking elsewhere and interrupt our day to check-in.  Since we were on an island, we were excited to see our room.  Imagine our surprise when we opened the curtains in room 704A and found a solid wall (see picture).   Additionally, our room seemed warm so we turned the AC down to 65° before we headed back out to reconnect with our friends.  When we returned hours later, the room was only at 74°.
