The service and reservations went very well...The staff was very helpful and everything was in place when we checked in...The staff was very nice as I mentioned Tim was special...I would recommend this Hotel but we…

title: A better location on Clearwater Beach is hard to imagine
review: My wife and I chose this hotel for our one night stay for it's location and specifically asked for a room with a Gulf view. We got the view but our room which was expensive as it was also Easter weekend did not meet our expectations, it was tired, with scruffy furniture and an AC which precluded sleep as it was so noisy. I did not raise our disappointment at checkout as they had a line around reception so I emailed the manager, Christopher Williams upon our return home. He responded a couple of days later and apologized for the state of the room explaining that the rooms are due an update and offered a partial rebate on the cost of the room. As with the service customer relations are excellent, I would not deter anyone from using this hotel just be aware that room comfort may…

title: Love love !!
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your experience here at our resort.  We're glad you two enjoyed your stay and especially the view.     You are correct, you did come at the height of tourist season so we were especially busy, so we appreciate your comments on our customer service.  As was explained to you, rooms are on the list for renovations and we regret the room assigned to you didn't quite meet your expectations.  Thanks again for your good words and we do hope you'll be joining us again for more Florida fun on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Unexpected excellence
review: Clean rooms. Pool area was great. Loved the attached restaurant- food was very good close to everything. Beautiful view. Many dolphin sightings. No beach front but only 1 1/2 blocks away. Friendly staff.

title: March 2015 Visit
review: Thanks!  Sure appreciate your kind words following your recent stay with us.   We're so pleased you and your family had a great trip and loved what we have to offer here, with our pool, resort amenities, close proximity to the beach -- and even those beautiful dolphins (well, we can't actually take credit for them -- but they're fun to watch!)  We do hope you'll return for more fun on Clearwater Beach.  Stay in touch with us on Facebook for deals, events and things to do.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Quiet and Lovely Couples Vacation
review: We walked into this Hotel after bailing on the horrid Gulfview (see review). Luckily they were able to accomodate us. After politely listening to our tale of woe, Joanie told the other desk clerk to put us up on a higher floor, so it would be quieter. That's the sort of courtesy I came to expect from this hotel.   The Carpets were clean and vacuumed every day, the beds were comfy, the employees/associates were uniformly nice.   The Hotel itself boasts a large fitness center, a large pool, a game room for the kiddies. For the grownups there is a place to get a massage, a facial, a haircut. There is a bar outside near the pool (Jimmy's "Iguana Bar").   The pool closes at 11pm every night. Kinda nice if grownups want to take a dip late. But Kids pretty much rule it all day.   While…

title: Just OK on this trip...
review: So, I was here at this hotel a month earlier and had a pretty decent room at a reasonable rate. This time when I checked in I was told that the room that I had requested was no longer available and that I was now going to be charged $40 more per night. After discussing it with the desk person, I agreed. When we went up to the room, it was HALF the size (ok, really two-thirds of the size) of the room from last month. AND WAY MORE MONEY? I called down to the front desk and got a really nice person (Joan) and she switched us to a different room (same, higher rate of $300 per night!). At least the room was bigger. Too bad that it was right over the bar! Not the best thing for business meetings. Why the planners chose this area during Spring Break is beyond me! The staff was…

title: Always stay there when in Clearwater Beach
review: Thanks for taking time to write about your stays with us.    You are correct - you visited right at the height of season and this entire area is very busy.  Rates are reflected upon the season and that would have been one reason for the rate differential.    We're pleased that Joan was able to assist you with moving to a different room, even though it was not the one you liked so much on an earlier visit.    Please know that all comments are shared with appropriate department heads so we can continue to improve customer service.  We want everyone to have a pleasant stay, whether it be for business or leisure.  There are many reasons to come back to Clearwater during the year, when it is not so busy.  We hope you'll visit us again and enjoy all the area has to offer.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good Hotel, Good Location
review: Located on the Southern end of Clearwater beach.  Only short walking distance to the beach.  Same goes for most of the restaurants in that area.  If you are there for spring training, they really make Phillies fans feel at home, including having a local Philly band play downstairs a night at the restaurant.  Hotel staff is very friendly, just about all of them greeted me as a Platinum IHG rewards member.  Suite was clean and promptly serviced daily.  Staff often leave an elephant or turtle made of wash clothes on your bed, that my wife always talks about.  Our Suite overlooked the harbor way, Sand Key Park, and the Gulf.   Along with the pool and restaurant in the hotel.  Nice views any time of the day.  Especially in morning or the evening watching the sun.  We often spend time…

title: Ask for Room 314!
review: Thanks so much for writing such wonderful words about your stay with us.  You're right -- we do love our Phillies fans!     We appreciate the comments about our friendly staff, cleanliness of the resort, and our location with its awesome views.  Glad you saw those beautiful dolphins!   Your tip about Gulf View rooms is excellent - guests love sitting on the terrace enjoying the scenery!  Thank you again and we hope to see you next year.  In the meantime, Go Phillies!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice place!
review: The hotel is conveniently located a short stroll from end of Clearwater Beach, with nice ocean views and sunsets from the balcony. The suites are good sized, basically two rooms, with one set up as a living/dining room. The hotel bar is a fun place to hang out and seems to attract folks from adjacent hotels, so I'm assuming it's better than the bars there. Restaurant is a typical breakfast buffet/sports bar dining. Won't blow anyone away, but decent. I found the front desk folks to be less than typically friendly. One word of note, access to Clearwater Beach is getting really crazy these days. The Sunday drive to the hotel took over an hour to go about 8 miles. That's not the hotel's fault, but it does make it tough to plan trips to Clearwater or Tampa.

title: Expensive for what you get
review: When I booked my long weekend in Clearwater I didn't realize it was during "Spring Break".  I paid $320.88 (including taxes) per night for a "standard room", 2 queen beds, no couch, that overlooked the parking lot.  The room did have a tiny fridge & microwave.  The room was clean and odor free which is important to me.  Beds were comfortable.  The pool was warm and had plenty of lounge chairs.  The staff at Jimmy's Fish House needs some serious training from it's Management.  I waited 45 min. one day for an order of Chicken Wings.  The bartenders are very unfriendly (except for "Amazing Amy") and you're glass can remain empty for quite especially if you are sitting at the Tiki Bar.  I was finished with my buffet breakfast before my son's french toast order was ready and that…

title: Ok hotel in great location
review: Thank you for taking time to share comments on your family's recent stay with us during spring break.  It was a busy time for us all on the beach and we hope you enjoyed all the resort had to offer and our close proximity to the beach and other activities.  All guest comments are distributed to appropriate managers and we will be sure to pass yours on to Jimmy's manager.  We're sorry you found the service less that what you would rightly expect at a resort such as ours.  Your room tip is correct - our gulf view rooms with views are spectacular, and we do hope you'll return and enjoy one yourself.  Thanks again and kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great place
review: I was here on business. The hotel was ok. It was clean, however the carpet and furniture were a bit  worn. My balcony door was also bolted closed.  restaurant and bar area again were ok, again nothing special.     Good side.  Great location,beautiful setting and close to beaches, night clubs and restaurants.

title: Wouldn't stay anywhere else on Clearwater Beach!!
review: Thanks for taking time to write to us about your stay here for business.  We're pleased you were here and appreciate your comments on our location and proximity to beaches and area activities.  All guest comments are passed along to appropriate parties, so we will share what you've mentioned as we strive to meet all expectations for value and resort experience.  Many of our business guests return for pleasure, and we hope you'll come back again for fun in Clearwater.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: I was kinda worried...which was for nothing!
review: Stayed here for 1 night only, but enough to share my great experience.  Hotel is awesome, with great wi-fi connection. To me, all rooms from Holiday Inn look pretty much the same, regardless of where you are. But this one has a super nice bathroom and a nice balcony, where you can see the beautiful sunset.  I also recommend the hotel's restaurant, where you can get some nice appetizers and a nice cold beer.   The only negative point is price paid (around USD230), but it seems that all hotels located in Clearwater Beach are overpriced.

title: Day trip
review: This is the second time we have visited this location, it is really one of the best Holiday Inn locations around this area. Pool is great , pool bar awesome great view. Jimmy's fish house, well what can be said great food and great sunsets. I have read a lot of the reviews I feel bad for those who don't feel like their stay was what they expected. I assume many expect a 5 star stay at a 2 star price . For the money we paid this was an excellent location. Christie the GM goes out of her way to help when she can. It's a hotel, on a beach in Florida, it's warm and sunny..........get outside enjoy it. I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to enjoy all the above!

title: Not very impressed
review: Thank you!   We're so glad you and your friends came back for another visit and had a great time.  We're pleased that you had fun at the pool, enjoyed the sunsets and location central to all the action.  Thank you for the personal compliment -- it's actually our entire team that works together towards your great customer service!  We look forward to your next visit - and hopefully you're staying in touch with us on Facebook for reasons to return!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Gulf View
review: We arrived on March 2nd 2015 and stayed 10 days, while the weather was absolutely beautiful, our stay at the hotel was not so great. We had booked a room with an ocean view and a king bed with the hotel contractor ( Expedia) , only to find out when we arrived we had a street view room with an queen bed. After staying in the room one night the hotel did change our room to a king , but still had the street view. The first morning  we were there, we awoke to traffic and the noise of a leaf blower for more than an hour. Needless to say, the traffic was so heavy with noisy motorcycles and loud stereos. There was construction of two new buildings not far from the hotel and we could hear the noise from the machines and drills, etc. The fourth night we see there someone knocked loudly…

title: Best friends vacation
review: Thank you for taking time to review your 10-day stay with us.  Please know we value all feedback from our guests as we strive for excellent customer satisfaction.  We regret that you were inconvenienced over the room change and that you did not receive the gulf view room you had expected.  Because we are in high season, unfortunately we were unable to move you to the view you preferred.   We're also sorry you were disturbed by noise from other guests and the sound of construction in the distance.  We totally agree that you have the desire to feel secure and safe and for that reason the Clearwater police are on hand during the beach's heaviest seasons to insure no incidents occur.  Your comments are shared with appropriate department heads, so please know we will pass along your restaurant comments to the manager.  We are, however, glad you were able to meet our friend George.  We have guests who come back time and again just because of him! Also, we thank you for compliments to our service staff and housekeeping.  They love hearing they have met their expectations for customer service.  You may have a different impression of the beach if you come off-season, which would be post-Easter and before school lets out, and then again in the fall.  Excellent rates are available then also.  Thank you again for commenting and we do hope you left with some good memories, all in all.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great stay!
review: We arrived in Orlando for business last Sunday, we decided to head west for a couple of days. Had originally booked a Marioitt but once we arrived we decided to go the rest of the way to Clearwater Beach. This property gets a lot of use but is in good shape. I read some negative reviews about the location we the pool and the lounge area overlooking the water, and no sand that's a bonus. We walked the beach and found some great places to eat. Great stay.

title: Clearwater beach to relax
review: The wife and I stayed at the Clearwater beach holiday inn and were so impressed with everything. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was amazing and the view, wow. I'd highly recommend staying there for anything from business to pleasure, you won't be disappointed.

title: Location and Service
review: Thanks so much for taking time to write about your stay with us.  We're so pleased you and your wife enjoyed your time on Clearwater Beach and all the resort amenities.  We'll be sure to relay your compliments to our staff - they really work hard so that every guest can have a memorable experience.  Thanks again and hope to see you back here soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Ok place to stay - ideally located
review: We stayed for 6 nights with two teens. Our gulf-front suite overlooked the pool and had a balcony. We sat out there every morning drinking our coffee, and every night with a cocktail. We saw dolphins almost every day. The suite had two queens in one room and a kitchen/living room with a pull-out sofa. There was a bathroom and television in each room. The space was typical Holiday Inn, and it was clean.  The hotel has a beautiful pool area, and the pool is heated. The restaurant was great, and we ended up eating here 5 of our 6 nights! The food was good, and the prices very reasonable. There is outdoor seating, and music each night. There is also a small coffe shop that is open each day until one. The coffe was good, and the girls really enjoyed the smoothies.  The property is…

title: Great view outside, not so great inside
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your stay with your family.  We're so glad you enjoyed the suite overlooking the pool -- you are right ----- the views are spectacular and the dolphins are always so much fun to watch.  We appreciate your comments about the pool, dining opportunities and beach access.  Also, we'll be sure to let Tim know of your compliment.  All our staff, as you can see, wants everyone to leave with great memories.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook and learn about more reasons to come back!  Thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Simply perfect
review: Let me start by saying that the hotel staff was wonderful.  Check in and check out was smooth and everything in between was covered.  There is a $12 per day parking.  The building itself is your typical old style Holiday Inn.  Walls are thin and noises carry everywhere.  I had to run the AC fan all night to drown out the noises.  The hotel is on the water but it is not on the beach.  The beach is a short block and half away though.  The room free WIFI did not work in my room on any of my 3 devices.  I never did call the support group.  I simply used my personal hotspot.

title: Visiting
review: This was our first time visiting the "west coast" of Florida. My partner and I were very pleased with the location; it was only a short walk to the beach,  restaurants and Trolley stops. The king size room itself with the balcony was clean, neat and an adequate size for two people, though the bathroom counter space was a little small for all my stuff😄. We ate breakfast at Jimmys and it was very good but when we returned for dinner, the food and sevice was rushed and mediocre. The first couple days of our stay, the pool was under maintenance which wasn't a big inconvenience. Overall, my partner and I would most likely return. The sunsets were truly amazing.

title: Great Stay
review: We're so pleased you made a trip to our beautiful west coast and decided to pay us a visit.    Thank you for your kind words on our cleanliness, resort amenities and great location close to all the activities of Clearwater Beach.  We've shared your comments on Jimmy's with their management staff since 100% customer satisfaction is our goal.   We're sorry the pool was undergoing regular maintenance during part of your stay but we're glad you did find time to enjoy it.  And you are right, sunset viewing is awesome!  We hope you will return for more beach fun - we love our repeat guests!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Over priced and well worn
review: Very nice hotel. The waterfront bar was a few steps away and thier food was very good. I would definitely stay here again.  Rooms were clean and had coffee, with fridge and microwave. Breakfast included was not an option.

title: All in all...Very nice place!
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay here during your business trip.  We appreciate your comments on cleanliness and other resort amenities.  We have many guests who find us from a business trip or conference and return at a later date for pleasure, so we hope you'll come back for complete enjoyment on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: recent stay
review: I travel and stay at an ocean front hotel between 30 and 40 nights a year so I am familiar with costs and quality of the beach hotel venues.  The Holiday Inn was priced at the high end of the range but the quality of the venue was at the low end. As an example I only stayed one night and then I moved over to the Sheraton which was less costly and a much higher quality venue.  The room was pretty well worn out. Holes in the walls, wall paper torn, spots on the carpet, etc. it was generally clean however.  The staff was a bright spot. Everyone was helpful and courteous. They were friendly and had a smile on their face.  The view out the window was the parking lot.

title: Suite dreams !
review: We have recently returned from staying at this hotel. We were fortunate to be upgraded to a two queen bed gulf view suite on the 8th floor. Every member of hotel staff we encountered were very pleasant and helpful, from Christine GM, reception, housekeeping,to groundsman, all fell into this category. Alas, the same cannot be said for all the staff we met in Jimmy's fish restaurant, as some were very offhand and quite disinterested, not all, but the majority we are sad to say. We do wonder if this restaurant is run by separate management, as the difference in the attitude of the staff was noticeable! Our rooms were very comfortable and kept very clean. Maria, our usual lovely chambermaid was a gem. She soon knew that we left our room early, and as a result, cleaned our place at…

title: Loved it!! Cant wait to come back!
review: Thank you!   First off, let us say we're delighted you chose to stay with us after such a long trip from Scotland - and secondly, we're delighted that you enjoyed your stay.  We so appreciate the comments you made to our staff and for certain, we will let them know.  Maria, Tim, Miranda and all the others really try hard to make our guest's stay a wonderful memory.  As well, we will advice Jimmy's Restaurant of your concerns on waitstaff.  You're right - our suites and the views are just spectacular, and it's always fun to watch the dolphins play and the beautiful sunsets.  And being so close to the public beach makes it easy to enjoy all of the fun in Clearwater.  Thanks again - and for certain, we do look forward to your next visit.  Stay in touch with us on our Facebook page!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: not up to my expectations
review: We were in the Tampa area for a soccer tournament and wanted to stay a couple extra days before heading back home. We always wanted to check out the Clearwater area so we booked this hotel for 2 nights.  We have a family of 5 and booked the room that had a kids room (bunk beds), another bedroom for the parents, 2 bathrooms and a living room (had sofa, table, small kitchen area) - it was awesome. So nice and clean - so much room! Its hard staying in normal hotel rooms with 5 people (1 being a baby) so this was definitely worth the extra $!. Front desk people were really nice - they helped us book our day trip to Busch Gardens, always polite and greeted us. The restaurant at the hotel was great too!  Waking up to have breakfast right by the water - it was awesome. The only thing I…

title: Worst front desk service ever!
review: Thanks for writing us!  We're so glad you decided to stay a few extra days and enjoy all that Clearwater has to offer - and we're honored you chose to stay with us!  That's great that your family took advantage of our family suites with bunk beds - kids love them, and parents love the spaciousness.   We also appreciate your comments on staff - and are glad you had time to enjoy Busch Gardens.    Sorry our weather didn't prove to be perfect - it's been an unusual winter for us - and all of the U.S.! But we're delighted you hope to return for another visit and look forward to having you.  All best wishes,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Tired old hotel
review: First of all I have stayed here before and though not great it was doable. My first disappointment was when I came in to check in and said to the gentleman had the desk' Hi my name is ..'.and his reply was I need a credit card and drivers license with no greeting . My room should not have been rented the ceiling needed to be replaced half of it was without stucco and no paint. Room number 457 if Holiday Inn reads these. The room was clean but when I got up during the night a roach scampered across the floor which I reported before I left. It is waterfront but no beach you have to go to the crowed Clearwater Beach to swim in the Gulf.

title: Package Trip
review: We chose this hotel as part of an air/car/hotel package offered by RFD/Allegiant Air. The location is fantastic, but no beach. It's a very short walk to the beach area so this did not bother us too much. We paid for an ocean front room and of course, they placed us directly over the pool pumps which ran all night long. The view from the balcony however was spectacular. Disappointed that as a club member they did not give us a better location as the hotel was certainly not sold out or even close to being fully occupied. Room service was a bit odd as they came and made the beds up in the morning but took until late afternoon to come back and do the towels and bathroom. Also parking was extra which was a surprise.

title: Not a good stay
review: Thanks for taking time to write about your experience at the hotel.  We're pleased you were able to come visit beautiful Clearwater Beach and honored that you chose to stay with us.  We're glad you enjoyed the balcony views - whether early in the morning, daytime views of the dolphins jumping, or sunsets, they truly are spectacular.  Please know that your comments are reviewed with our department heads and will help us to improve our customer service experience.  We appreciate your candor.  As for parking, most resorts on the beach do charge because parking is at a premium.  We try and keep rates as low as possible.  Thanks so much again and we hope you and your family will return for more beach memories soon.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: All in all... not bad
review: Very disappointed with our stay here. The facilities were fine, the view was beautiful (that's all the good I can find).   Our room was noisy beside the vending machine, it took forever for my son to fall asleep and then the fire alarm goes off (not fault if the hotel- but it still sucks)  I finally get him back to sleep, I turn out the lights and the roaches come out. I spent the rest of the time I should have been sleeping closing up everything paranoid they were going to get into my bag.   Never again :(.

title: Just OK
review: Dear Rum_RunnerOttawa:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us  We are deeply disappointed to hear you stay was not memorable or enjoyable.  We apologize dearly for the fire alarm going off and for the uninvited guests you witnessed.  We are working with our Pest Control Company to resolve this issue.  Feedback whether positive or negative is important to the  overall success of our business and we greatly appreciate you sharing this with us.    All of us are delighted to hear that you enjoyed most of our facilities and the view.  Again, thank you for your business and for your valuable feedback.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Best Hotel Stay EVER!
review: This is an older property that could use some TLC, in fairness these kind of places take a beating from families and such. The property was clean and well maintained. Staff was good. Furniture in the room was ok although the kitchen cabinets were dated.  One thing I found really odd was in a two floor suite, no bathroom on the first level.

title: Wonderful Stay at Beautiful Area
review: We had a room on the top floor with a balcony facing the water.  It was wonderful.  We watched the dolphins swimming from our balcony. We ate at the hotel restaurant which had a great singer performing while you were dining.  Only complaint would have been our waitress.  If you want a hotel with a beach in front of it, this is not the place for you but if you don't mind walking or driving to the beach, it's a great place.  Very short walk to beach.

title: Second time around and we like it here
review: Thank you!   How nice of you to share your experience that you and your family had while here.  You are right, we are close to everything, and an easy walk or trolley ride to the beach.  We're glad you loved the terrace views and were able to see those beautiful dolphins swimming by.   Thanks also for your comments on Jimmy's.  We do share all guest comments with department heads so we can continue to improve the customer experience.  We do hope you'll be back again for more fun on Clearwater Beach and another stay with us.  Please follow us on our Facebook page for ideas, deals and beautiful photos.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Average.
review: We stayed in this hotel about 10 years ago.  We decided to go back to it on our way home.  We had done Cocoa Beach then Key West and this was our last hotel before heading home.  Well we liked it 10 years ago and we like it just as much now.  It is in a good place and while it is hard to swim here (due to rocks), the pool is great.  The people who work there all are so nice and friendly from the ones at the desk all the way to the guys who do maintenance work or who work out at the pool.  We had a room next to the elevator and for being an elevator it really wasn't at all noisy.  We would hear the mechanics of it but still not loud.  They must have extra insulation in the walls or something.  The room was clean. The only thing we got spoiled on was that the other hotels in on…

title: Nice enough, but not on beach
review: Thank you!  Nothing pleases us more than to have repeat guests, and we're so glad you were able to return and stay with us again for a little beach fun.   We really do appreciate your nice comments on our staff because customer service is so important to all of us here - we want you to feel completely at home and leave with great memories.  With all the activity going on in Clearwater Beach, there is always reasons to return.  And remember, the shuttle stops right in front of the resort and can get you to the public beach quickly.   Hope to see you again!  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Awesome place to stay with awesome views!
review: We didn't pay extra for a room with a view so looking outside at the street was nothing special. The room was fine. Nothing out of the ordinary. The food at the restaurant was average, not spectacular. We spent a bunch of time at the pool. Pretty decent pool with a lot of chairs to lay out. We walked to Clearwater Beach which was a kind of far walk. If we were carrying a bunch of beach stuff it would have been annoying. We would stay here again if we got a deal and a cheap price compared to other Clearwater hotels.

title: Great stay. No complaints
review: Stayed here in January for 4 days. We originally had a room out looking the parking and got upgraded to king suite out looking the gulf which was awesome. After being upgraded I would recommend paying for the view. No complaints. Great pool and tiki bar. Jimmy's restaurant is great. We didn't rent a car and got around walking just fine. There is also a free cab that works off tips to take you back and down the island.

title: Great place!
review: Thanks for taking time to write about your stay with us!  We have lots of guests from Chicago and pleased to know that you enjoyed your visit and all there is in the area.  Thank you for your compliments on the king suite, our pool and bar area.  We want to offer our guests the very best experience at affordable rates and we're glad you enjoyed it.  You're so right - it is easy to get around without a car, and there is so much to do!  Have a great 2015 and hope you'll be back to see us soon.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Relaxing with Beautiful Views
review: We have stayed here many times and was never let down. We stayed here New Year's Eve 2014/2015 and was able to walk everywhere and never crank the vehicle up for three days. Rooms are clean and over all staff is very friendly. By far the best bloody Mary I have ever had. I work in Tampa on business trips sometimes and drive over to stay here because it is so awesome.

title: Great place for some sun after Christmas
review: Thank you!  How nice of you to take time to write about your NYE stay with us.  Glad you rang in 2015 in style!  We're also pleased that you noted the cleanliness of our facilities and the friendliness of our staff.  We do try to ensure all our customers have an awesome experience (and we'll pass on your compliments on the Bloody Mary's too!"  Whether it's business or pleasure, we'll look forward to having you return.  We thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location and hotel with lots of amenities
review: We recently spent a weekend at this hotel while attending a beachside  family wedding.  We were so happy we chose the Holiday Inn insteaad of the hotel next door where the reception was held. This hotel is your standard Holiday Inn with all the amenities you would expect.  However, we were so pleasantly surprised by our room on the seventh floor with a wonderful view of the inlet, Gulf and  Sand Key Beach park.  The view from our balcony at sunset was spectacular!  As lifelong Floridians we have seen many Gulf sunsets.  These were probably the best ones we've ever seen.    Our two room suite was nicely equiped, and could sleep up to six people.  There was a little kitchen area with, micro, refrigerator and a few dishes and silverware.  This would be a perfect place for a family…

title: NOT ON THE BEACH!
review: I called ahead and asked if the hotel was on the beach and was told yes. The hotel is adjacent to the water but has no beach. So disappointing. You have to walk five blocks to a packed public beach. For the money they charged, I felt ripped off. Plus,  the guy at the front desk was annoyed we booked through expedia. The restaurant on property has a great sunset view, but the service is bad or nonexistent. We were sat next to a group of employees that had finished a shift for the day and we're approaching being over served - loud and rude!  We moved to the wyndham on our third night and were very pleased. Beach, chairs, umbrellas, nice restaurant,  great service.

title: Beautiful suites
review: Thank you for taking time to write about your recent stay with us.  Comments and feedback are always appreciated.  We're sorry you felt we misrepresented about being on Clearwater Beach.  Nowhere in our promotional materials do we say we are beachfront and our staff is taught never to say we are.  Some confusion comes because we are on the community of Clearwater Beach.     As for your other comments, we can only refer you to so many others who have written and enjoyed our resort and friendly staff, so we're sorry you did not have the experience you expected, but we're pleased you did enjoy some time on Clearwater Beach.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Three nights in Clearwater beach
review: Great hotel with wonderful views.  Spent six days here in November and loved to sit on our balcony overlooking the pool and the gulf.  Lots of good photo opportunities at sunset.  We enjoyed the spaciousness of our suite and would love to return for a longer stay.  All of the staff at the front desk and Jimmy's Fish House were very kind.   We had a package that included breakfast daily.   It was nice to be able to go downstairs for the nightly entertainment or just listen to the music from our balcony.  Hotel is in a good location within walking distance of many restaurants and shops and close to Pier 60.  There is a trolley service at frequent intervals. We went to Sand Key and Johns Pass which were both not too far from the hotel.  You will not be disappointed if you stay at…

title: Nice place to stay
review: Thanks so much for giving us feedback on your recent stay.  We are so glad that you both enjoyed your vacation and found us to fit your needs.  We're pleased your accommodations were what you expected and glad you found everything around the resort to be easily accessible.  We agree - the sunset viewing from our dock and Gulf front rooms is amazing!   Thanks also for commenting on Jimmy's - we'll share your compliment.  If you're on Facebook, please stay in touch with us for reasons to come back - deals, special events and offers.  There's always a reason to return to Clearwater.  Happy New Year,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice rooms
review: Three nights in Clearwater   Front desk service very good  Checked into room late but was not a problem room was well stocked with your daily needs and clean and everything worked as it should   Bar / restaurant at the back of the hotel was open late and had band playing not bad  The second and last night for some reason the door lock card had to be reprogrammed would  not unlock the door   Close to a lot of things to do and see  Parking lot needs to have some work done on it (resurfacing)   Would retrun

title: Great hotel and staff
review: Beautiful hotel on gulf...awesome view.  Jimmy's Fish House in the hotel convenient and great food.  Awesome sunset party.  Rooms were large and clean.  Cons:   Not really a con, not on the white sandy beach...five minute walk and you're there (helps burn off umbrella drinks).

title: Good holiday
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you and your friends stayed with us for your Clearwater Beach vacation!  We appreciate your comments that our rooms were clean and spacious and you enjoyed being close to the beach.  We'll pass along your compliments to Jimmy's as well, since we all strive to make our guests' stay a pleasant one.  Hopefully you'll be returning to Clearwater for more fun and we'd love to have you stay with us again, so we invite you to stay in touch with us on our website or Facebook page.  Best wishes for 2015!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Grea Stay
review: We came during the Christmas holiday & had a good stay. We were in a room with a gulf view. The balcony privacy wasn't what I hoped (room overlooking) but was ok, there is no beach with this property, plus the $12 per day parking fee was a surprising disappointment, otherwise we had an overall good stay. Jimmy's restaurant  is very good for all meals. Not overpriced. Excellent food & service. One of the highlights to our stay.

title: Great View, Great Price!
review: We're so glad you two enjoyed your stay with us during your Clearwater Beach vacation.  Thank you for telling us about your experience and that you found our location to be great for all the beach fun.  Glad you found our rooms clean, comfortable and spacious.  We want your experience to be a positive one!  There is always something fun going on in Clearwater and we hope you'll stay in touch with us for more reasons to come back.  In the meantime, we send very best wishes for a great 2015!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: What a view!
review: Driving down the beach, we saw the motel.  Stopped an checked with trip advisor. Went is and booked the room. Staff very nice. The room was clean. Good location, near everything we walked to the pier about 1/4 mile.  The only complaint I have the wet bar needs better lighting. Great motel !!!

title: Great One Night Stay
review: This was our one night stop after driving for for 22 straight hours and we were very pleased with our choice. While there is no beach, it is just a short walk down the street. Our room was spacious with a wet bar, refrigerator, and microwave. The kids loved the pool and I enjoyed sitting on the deck watching the boats pass by. We ate breakfast on site since kids eat free and I was pleasantly surprised by their prices. Very reasonable. Our service was great as well as the food. Neither my nine or six year old could finish their entire breakfast. I would stay here again.

title: great location for kids
review: Thank you!  So glad you escaped for the one-night stay and chose us!  We appreciate the compliments on our friendly staff, the cleanliness of the rooms and the overall resort amenities.  We want every guest to leave with pleasant memories, and look to that time when they can return again - for a longer stay!  All the best for 2015,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Beautfil view
review: while not on the beach it was just a short walk away. the restaurant was not the best but we had the family suite and for a family of 6 it was just right. Parking is extra. The room was clean and the price was reasonable.

title: Disgraceful attitude to theft
review: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us.  We're pleased you chose to stay with us for your family - and glad to hear you enjoyed the spaciousness and comfort of the family suite.  Thanks also for commenting on our cleanliness and affordability.  We try to keep prices as affordable as possible for our guests.   You're right - while we are not on the beach, we are on the water, and the beach is just a short walk  -- or trolley ride away.    Sorry to hear your disappointment in Jimmy's.  Please know that all review comments are forward to appropriate managers so they can continue to improve on our customer service.  There are always new things happening in Clearwater and we hope you'll return again for more fun.    Happy Holidays and best wishes for 2015  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Dolphins Out the Window
review: My room was obviously new and done nicely. The staff at the desk were so helpful and nice. I had a luncheon in the restaurant and they did a great job for us.. Clearwater beach has free taxi service all over the island which was really nice especially for a visitor who doesn't know the area..had a great time at Clearwater and really enjoyed the hotel. The view from my room was magnificent and the sunset breathtaking. Thanks to the helpful staff

title: Beautiful hotel, terrible restaurant service
review: Loved this hotel and the pool at night. It's on the water and you have access to the gulf. We stayed one night here with friends and the kids. They were very accommodating and gave us adjoining rooms for the kids, etc. the restaurant is not very good. I suggest eating off site. The food wasn't so bad but the service was terrible! I recommend the hotel but not the restaurant. The pool closes rather early but we still hung out in the gulf until nearly 3am. If your quiet no one will bother you. Overall we had an awesome weekend!

title: Wonderful Hotel, Great Service, and even better Views!
review: We appreciate that you took time to comment on the stay you had here with your friends and children.  We're glad you found the resort great for your needs and that the adjoining rooms made it easy for you to spread out and still be close together.  We're very sorry to hear that the service and food in Jimmy's was less not what you expected.  Please know that your comments will be shared with their management team so that we can improve our customer satisfaction level.   We want everyone's experience here to be 100% what they expect.  Thanks again for telling us you had an "awesome" experience and we hope you'll be coming back for more fun in the future.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Poor Service, Outdated, and Terrible Stay
review: Great Holiday Inn!  One of the best I've been too. We had a King Suite with a balcony on the top floor with great views of Clearwater Beach.  Wonderful Pool area with a great Tiki Bar.  The deck at the edge of the gulf was amazing, with views that cannot be beat.  The restaurant attached had live music during the day and we enjoyed it from our pool chairs.  Within walking distance to everything, food, the beach, drinks, bike rentals, etc.  We came for a last minute weekend getaway, and were very happy with our choice.  Our suite was great, everything was very clean and comfortable.

title: Fabulous service here
review: Thank you for taking time to tell us about your recent stay with us.  We're glad you two enjoyed your quick getaway and found us as a great location here on Clearwater Beach - close to all the fun!  Thanks for the compliments on the spaciousness of our suites, Jimmy's restaurant, our pool and deck area and other resort amenities.    And....hopefully you caught a few of our famous sunsets!  We'd love to see you come back again for more fun.  If you're on Facebook, please keep in touch with us for special deals and promotions.....there's always something fun to come back for!  Season's best greetings,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Amazing stay!
review: We stayed here for a friends wedding over Labor Day weekend 2014. The staff were so rude and unprofessional, even to my friends who had booked their wedding at the hotel during that weekend!  I would not stay at this hotel if someone paid me to!   When you're paying $200 per night, you expect to get decent service and no attitude from the staff!   This hotel is a waste of money, so spend your vacation dollars somewhere else where you will be an appreciated guest!

title: Great place to stay
review: Had a real pleasant stay here. I like that it was in a quieter area but still a close walk to a lot of places. The rooms are clean and roomy, albeit a little out dated but that's ok.  Loved the sunset view.  Although there was no beach, it was a short walk to the beach.  The pool area was real nice. Jimmy's Fish House on site was great! And unlike some reviews, it didn't bother us one bit that we could sit on our porch and listen to the music at the restaurant! My only complaint was that the vent for the AC was on the bottom wall on the porch. If the AC was on, it blew hot air on the porch making it impossible to sit on. But, no prob, Nov. temps were mid 70s low 80s so it wasn't a problem to just turn off the AC! There is a 12$ parking fee, but most places charge a 20$ resort…

title: Very Nice
review: Thank you for telling us about your recent stay - and we're so pleased you enjoyed all we have to offer, including the resort amenities, closeness to the beach, and Jimmy's Fish House.  We'd love to have you return again - there is always something fun to do in Clearwater, so please stay in touch with us on Facebook for ideas and special events!  Happy Holidays to you and thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Pool and Personal Space - Two P's You Want/Need
review: Hotel is older, but very well kept.  Atmosphere was so nice and it was a quiet hotel.  Of course we went end of September.  Beautiful water and surrounding areas.  Fun time at Jimmy Iguanas at night listening to the music. I would definitely go back.

title: Great Hotel, View, Food, Entertainment
review: Thank you!  We are glad you chose to stay with us on your Clearwater holiday and are glad we met your expectations for a fun resort with lots of activities.  There is always something new and exciting happening on Clearwater Beach, so please stay in touch with us and visit again.  Happy Holidays,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great stay, perfect location
review: I don't normally stay at Holiday Inns but my friend and I (early 30's) took a shot on this property given its proximity to Shephard's during Memorial Day weekend.  Shephard's was our main focus as we had tickets to a music festival there.  I was able to secure a suite at the Holiday Inn and it turned out to be a great decision.  We flew from ORD to TPA and drove to CB.  The Holiday Inn charges for parking but it was cheaper to drive/park then roundtrip cabfare.  Given the great location of the Holiday Inn, we didn't use the car at all other than to/from TPA.     Check-in was a breeze... the first sign that I booked the right hotel/suite came when I received keys to room 957 AND 957A.  The suite was essentially two normal adjoining hotel rooms but one of them had the beds taken…

title: Great Stay
review: This was a great stay! It did not have a beach.. Not a far walk to the beach or downtown clearwater! I liked the location being next door to Shepards.. As they have a great night life! Jimmy's closed fairly early each night.. Which was fine if you wanted to have a quite night! Loved hanging by the tiki bar during the day! All the staff at Holiday Inn and Jimmy's were wonderful!

title: october vacation
review: Thank you!   We appreciate that you took the time to comment on your recent stay.   So glad you found us to your liking and close to places you wanted to visit.  Your comments on our friendly staff will be shared with our team - every one of our staff works hard to make your experience a memorable one.  We do hope you'll be back to see us - there is always something fun to do in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice
review: The hotel was nice and clean, had a good restaurant on site Jimmy's Iguana bar, a game room and a gym.   There was a small beach next to the pool but had construction going on, so no beach now, but the clearwater beach is a very short walk. Only thing i didn't like was there was a parking fee for all guests. it was more than what I paid at the airport , $12 a Day.

title: Gulf view suite is a must
review: Thanks for writing to us about your recent stay.   We're honored that you chose us for your getaway and were pleased to hear that you two enjoyed the resort, access to the public beach, and common areas.     Since space is so limited on the beach, we - like most resorts here - do have to charge a fee for parking but we try to keep it nominal.  We do hope we'll have the pleasure of seeing you return.  Stay in touch with us on Facebook!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Didn't stay long enough
review: Nice hotel Different location We thought it was on beach  And it is kind a Yes there is a beach But it is from a canal not the gulf Room very spacious Staff outstandingly helpful Huge bonus there is a IHOP attached and the manager nancy I think was her name runs a great place and she goes extra mile for her guest

title: Not on beach but worth a look
review: This hotel requires a short walk to the beach but I have stayed here a couple of times.  This time I was upgraded to two room suite which was two hotel rooms with one as a living room and the other the bedroom.  It did serve our purpose and was quiet.  I understand that beach properties tend to get abused and worn due to the familes and sand.  So while it isn't perfect, it was clean. The pool area is nice, with a kiddie pool which our grandson who is 3, enjoyed.  The deck is connected to the bar area and they have good entertainment.  Beaware of parking charge.   I will stay here again

title: Great Experience
review: Thank you so much for sharing comments on your recent visit here.  We're pleased you and your family came back to see us again!  We're glad you were able to relax and enjoy the resort's amenities and that your grandson had such a good time - how wonderful you were able to make great memories here!  Thanks again and we'll look to when you can return yet again.  Kind regards  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Cool
review: From check-in to check out the experience was great The staff was warm and friendly taking time to chat and smile. Jimmys was an experience. From the crane on the deck to Suzie's exceptional service always quick and with a smile

title: Beachfront Fun and a Room With a View...
review: Thank you!  We're so pleased that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  You came a long way to get here!  We appreciate that you found us to have the accommodations, amenities and friendly staff that made your stay a pleasant one.  That's exactly how we want our customers to feel, and do hope you'll come back and see us again if you come this way!  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Stopped in for an afternoon evening
review: Very big rooms, clean and friendly staff. Just one night but felt very confortable there. Had a great sleep there! :-) We would like to stay there another nigth, but unfortunately they have been fully booked.

title: Oct. 2014 visit to Clearwater Beach
review: Another enjoyable experience at the Holiday Inn and Suites, Clearwater Beach from the very hospitable check-in clerk to our departure 6 days later.  Highly recommend the Gulf Front 2 room Suites with balconies that overlook the pool and the Gulf of Mexico. As well, this visit, our 5th, we took advantage of the "Discover Florida" rate package which provided a $20 voucher for breakfast each day, a late check-out, if required and the rate was still very competitive with other discount rates, e.g. AAA.  Similarly, being an IHG rewards member and being recognized as such had it's benefits.  Suite was as comfortable and clean with all the amenities that could expect.  Excellent trip and will be returning in November for a slightly longer visit. Any and all requests were responded to…

title: REVIEW OF DUVAL BALLROOM AND CATERING ONLY
review: Wow!  We love it when our visitors return time and time again, and thanks for the review on your fifth visit to us!  We're so glad you took advantage of IGH's Discover Florida package and also the Rewards program.  Great deals!     You're right - our gulf front suites offer so much spaciousness and comfort!  We'll look forward to having you back in November.  Stay in touch with us on Facebook for more updates and ideas - there's always something new to do in Clearwater! Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 2nd Stay
review: Provided extremely good event venue for wedding.  The ballroom opens onto a wraparound veranda with amazing views of the Gulf.  Buffet service was excellent and food exceptional.  Event manager kept close eye on the event and even offered help for the smallest requests.  Would definitely recommend.

title: Beautiful Gulf View
review: Thank you!   We appreciate your compliments on the service and event function held in our Duval Conference Center.   Our staff will be pleased to hear that we provided good food and great attention to detail that went to make your event a success.  We'll look forward to having you stay with us at the hotel sometime - there's always fun things to do in Clearwater!  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Clearwater bch one night stay.
review: We just stayed at Holiday Inn and Suites for a second time. This place is amazing! Its more like a resort…Jimmy Fishouse, location, staff, cleanliness, comfort…all A++++++++!!!!!! ALready looking into booking our 3rd trip back in the spring time. Keep up the amazing work! Highly recommended!

title: Refreshing
review: Me and my boyfriend took at short trip to Clearwater, FL. I must say it was very refreshing. Check in process was quick and easy. We were provided with a map of the beach that showed differnt attractions. We stayed in room 252 on the 2nd floor. The room was very clean. No bugs, no stains, beds and pillows were very comfy, no issues with the cable, the bathroom was nice as well, no issues with water pressure. Our room was facing the pool and water front. Very beautiful view. It wasn't loud at all. We did not have direct access to the beach but it wasnt a ar walk. It was a block away walking distance. Never felt the need to go to the front desk and complain about anything!!! I'm big on customer service and the customer service from beginning to end was 100%!!!! We will be staying…

title: "Best Holiday Inn anywhere"
review: Thank you for letting us know you and your boyfriend enjoyed your recent stay with us.  We're so pleased you found the location ideal and that the resort satisfied your needs in cleanliness, amenities and exterior grounds including our beautiful pool.  We're delighted you hope to return to see us, and until that time, if you're on Facebook, stay in touch with us for news and updates.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Just About Perfect!
review: I have stayed at several HolidayInn hotels in the US and this is my favorite. It is located on the Gulf of Mexico with views like no other. The rooms are clean and well kept and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The Gulf view is a must you will see the most amazing sunsets, dolphins and even manatees right off your balcony. The restaurant located downstairs was excellent and even found great coffee at the coffee shop located across from the front desk. It's location is perfect if you don't have a car, you can use the Jolly Trolley or the cute little mini golf carts that take you wherever you need to go on the beach. They have free internet and washers/dryers for the long visits. It's a family hotel with 2 swimming pools, one for kids only, and an arcade. You can even rent…

title: Great place for family
review: We're so pleased that you and your family had a wonderful vacation with us recently, and thank you for taking time to write a review so that others can know what we offer.  We appreciate your comments on the hotel's cleanliness and friendly staff, and that you enjoyed the rooms and other amenities of the resort -- including watching those graceful dolphin swim in the Gulf.  Please come back and stay with us again.  There is always something new to do in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good hotel in a lovely place
review: Loved staying at this hotel while we were in Clearwater. I had read reviews and researched the property before booking, so I was aware that there was no beach access directly from this property. I can see how this would bother some patrons. It's not at all a long walk to the beach, five to ten minutes. Having said that, it is right on the water, the restaurant's patio is directly on the water and the perfect place to view Clearwater's famous sunsets. The staff ensures that you don't miss a thing. Gorgeous!   We were upgraded to a suite upon our arrival, which had a balcony overlooking the water. The room was exceptionally clean, with plenty of towels etc., and a small kitchenette. I only stayed two days, but I can certainly envision staying a week here. The staff was wonderful,…

title: Spacious sunsets and great service too!
review: I stayed at this hotel in 2010, and since I'm planning on coming back to Clearwater Beach soon, I'm looking at hotels again. The sunset views, and the service were awesome! The location is very convenient, and it just gives you that "I've been on vacation," feeling when you get home!  Looking forward to coming back to Clearwater Beach, my favorite beach location!

title: Look no further!
review: Thank  you for posting about your 2010 stay with us - and we're excited to learn you are planning another visit here.  You'll see a number of changes (improvements!) because we're always looking for ways to improve our guest's experience.  You're right - the sunsets are just spectacular, and the views overlooking the Gulf with the boats and the dolphins are just so special.  Can't wait for you to get back!  Please stay in touch with us on our Facebook page for updates, specials and reasons to come back!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Best hotel on location
review: This hotel is an amazing value.  The staff was extremely friendly and explained the views of the rooms in detail so we opted for a partial oceanfront view since oceanfront was sold out. The view was spectacular off the balcony!  Kids 12 & under eat for free, and the portions were huge.  They also have a game room poolside which offers tickets that can be turned in for prizes.

title: Big corporations taken over!
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased you took time to let us know you enjoyed your stay with us!  We're glad you found us a great place for a family getaway and hope you'll be back often!  So happy your youngsters enjoyed themselves, even having fun in our game room.  And we appreciate the comment on "good value" - our goal is to make this an affordable resort everyone can enjoy.  Thanks again - stay in touch on our Facebook page - we'll provide lots of reasons to come back!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A Room With A View And More
review: My husband and I just recently visited Clearwater for the first time earlier this month. (We fell in love with Clearwater and plan on moving there.) Our friend referred us to the Holiday Inn and I'm so grateful she did. Our room over looked the gulf and it was very clean and beautiful. We paid extra for the Discover Florida package and had an amazing breakfast each morning from the restaurant downstairs. Our view was excellent, and the sunset was unforgettable. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The tiki bar by the pool and balcony over the gulf are amazing.  We enjoy having fun and making memories and this hotel most definitely made our vacation just that. We highly recommend it.

title: Sunset views
review: Stayed here on vacation August 2014. Was upgraded at the front desk to a suite which had separate living areas, fantastic. Rooms clean, balconies are nice overlooking the pool and the sunset views are fantastic, especially when down viewed down at the bar with a beer. Pool area was OK but it seemed permanently over-run with screaming kids, which is fine, but if you want to chill-out, there is a quieter area near the seafront which has some sunbeds (and a better view). I'd recommend jumping the sea wall to go for a relaxing swim/lounge in the shallow waters, its so relaxing. Just a shame you have to leap the wall and climb over the jagged rocks to do this, be nice if the hotel put in some cheap stairs for this? Anyway, good hotel, good location. Slight downsides is the parking…

title: Family Suite
review: Thank you for taking time to review your stay with us -- we love our international guests!   We're pleased you enjoyed the view, location, bar area and even had chance to go for a swim.   You're so right - the sunsets are amazing and we throw those in for free!  We'd love to see you come back again - please stay in touch with us on our Facebook page deals, specials and ideas.  Many thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Location, location
review: I was disappointed with the family suite main living area. The pull out sofa bed was terrible. There was to much furniture in the room. The furniture and carpet were in poor condition and the air conditioning sounded like a freight train. The bathroom was clean and remodeled in good condition. The other room was fine and the bunk beds were awesome. (same problem with air conditioning) The pool and outside bar was excellent. The restaurant was good with average service. No direct beach access was annoying!

title: Our Passengers Always enjoy the Holiday Inn Clearwater beach
review: Dear WaterLover 16:  Thank you for sharing your experience during your visit with our resort.  We are glad you enjoyed our bunk beds, pool and outside bar.     We will work closely with our Engineering Team to address the issues you experienced with the Air Conditioning units in your suite, along with furniture and carpet.   Guest feedback is so vital to the success of any business and we value your input.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your comments and thank you for your business.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: Stayed her for three nights on business. Hotel is clean and conveniently located to everything on the beach. Nice pool and deck area with Jimmy's right there makes for a festive area. Rooms are no frills but clean.  Staff were helpful and friendly. I would stay here again.

title: Will be my go to place in Clearwater Beach!
review: My girlfriends and I booked this hotel for a Thurs - Sun girls getaway.  From the moment we stepped in the door we were impressed.  Joan at the front desk is super personable, helpful, knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with!   We arrived 3 hours prior to the check-in time and decided to upgrade to a gulf-front room.  Joan called housekeeping, the room was ready and we were able to head straight up!  Due to our late afternoon flight, we also requested a late checkout and because of the IHG membership were granted that as well!  The room was beautiful, the beds were comfortable and the sunset views...simply breathtaking.  We had a room on the 4th floor in the corner which gave us a glimpse of the pool and a nice view of the live band in the evenings.   For those who have…

title: Good location, typical Holiday Inn standard
review: What a great review - thank you!  How fun that you had a gal-pal weekend at the beach!   We're honored you chose to stay with us and delighted to know we met your expectations and were able to provide you a great gulf view room.  We appreciate your compliment to Joan.  We're so fortunate to have such great staff - and we'll be sure to pass along your comments.  Glad to hear you'll be back with us this year.  If it's for pleasure, make sure you ask about special events and concerts going on while you're here.  There's always something exciting going on in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger

title: Good times in Clearwater
review: I have stayed in several dozen IHG properties in several countries from the basic (Express) to Intercontinental standard so have a pretty good view of the standards for each 'brand' level.  Is this the best HI I have been in....no...is it the worst...also no. This is a good decent HI hotel, nothing special but nothing bad either. Rooms are a decent size with a balcony, furniture and room decor are dated but room was clean...I was not expecting Maldives luxury villa standards! Liked the empty fridge, microwave and crockery/cutlery.   Reception staff efficient enough. Coffee shop and separate restaurant on site (Jimmy Fish House...see separate review for that...) with outside dining/drinking space. This also serves as room service provider.  All in all...what I was expecting for…

title: Nice location
review: Thank you for coming all the way from Glasgow to visit Clearwater Beach!   We are pleased you chose to stay with us and appreciate the comments you left regarding your stay.  As far as parking is concerned, we're sorry you were inconvenienced....that rarely does happen to our guests that they have problems finding a space.  As for the fees, many of the beach hotels do charge for parking simply because space is such a scarcity.  We're glad you found the rest of the resort to your liking and hopefully enjoyed all the surroundings and things to do.   We would like to have you return if you come back this way.  Clearwater always has a lot of excitement and events.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Weekend Getaway
review: Stayed in the Holiday inn this summer for a few days with the wife and teenage kids. The hotel rooms were a good size for our needs. The pool area was fine with good views of the ocean front. We ate in the Iguana bar which was nice food. The high point of the Hotel has to be the staff who are friendly and welcoming, Irish guy and Princess get a special mention. Good ameneties around the hotel also. Dropped into Shepard's next door for a late night drink, nice but a bit on the expensive side.

title: Great stay
review: We stayed here for 4 nights in August 2014.  Our flight was early so room wasn't ready and that was fine.  We went and ate and returned got in room around  330. Room was clean but furniture a bit dated.  Maid service was good and prompt. Found an elephant made out of towels with 2 bottles of waters and ocean wave sounds on radio when we returned to room. Employees were friendly especially maintenance and  pool employees. Did miss staying on beach but short walk.  Great  sunset countdown.  Pool filled with kids so great family place.

title: Great Breakfast
review: Thank you for sharing your recent experience on your stay.  We're so pleased you had a few nights to enjoy the resort and all we have to offer.   Glad our sunsets topped off your experience!    We appreciated your comments on our staff - and our housekeeping staff will be pleased you enjoyed their towel handicraft.  Hopefully we'll see you back here in the near future - there is always something fun going on in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great service, great experience!
review: Hotel was perfect.  Clean, convenient, comfy beds, cozy, beautiful ocean and sunset views from pool and restaurant.  Breakfast was such a plus. We could choose off a breakfast menu each morning so it never got boring. Potatoes were so delicious.  Friendly wait staff in Restaurant.

title: Roach Hotel
review: Thank you!  We're pleased to hear that your experience with us was a memorable one for you and your family.  We're glad you enjoyed all our resort has to offer and that our staff impressed you with their friendliness.     Also, we'll pass along your compliments to Jimmy's for the breakfast you enjoyed so much.  That's definitely the way to start a good day!  Hopefully we'll see you back here in the near future - there is always something fun going on in Clearwater!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good value for family travel
review: We enjoyed our stay immensely! Tim at the front desk got us a preferred check out, found a ride to the airport for us and also printed directions to an event in the area. The view is amazing too! We'll definitely be back!

title: Wonderful place to stay!
review: My husband and I and his adult son had a gulf view suite the two rooms made it the perfect place for us to all have a great weekend get away!  We had the bedroom and he had the sofa in the other room which both rooms have bathrooms so it gave everyone some privacy!  The pool and tiki bar are also very well kept the grounds are well cared for.  The hotel staff very accommodating.  The only downfall is that there literally is no beach access directly on the property it overlooks the gulf but no actual beach.  Overall the stay was wonderful and I would not hesitate to go back again and again.

title: great girl vaca
review: Thanks for sharing your experience - we're so glad you visited us and that it worked well for you to have the two rooms.    We appreciate your compliments of our staff - they all work hard to accommodate.  And, we're glad you enjoyed the views of the Gulf, the resort amenities, and the pool.  Most of all, we're happy you are thinking of returning.  Please stay in touch with us on our Facebook page since we offer lots of suggestions.  Thanks again  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: glutton for punishment
review: We had great service, easy check in and out. We had a well stocked kitchenette we used each morning. Breakfast is not included. We rinsed our dishes before setting off for the beach and were very surprised that the cleaning crew even did our dishes! The room was big, clean and welcoming. Not much of a view but we did not come to Florida to look out the windows. We walked and played on the awesome Clearwater Beaches. Remember to take in the beautiful sunsets before listening to some great live music. We are already planning to return!

title: If you are looking for Beach access this hotel is not for you!
review: Thanks for taking time to review our resort following your stay here.  We're so glad you and your friends enjoyed all we had to offer including the live musical entertainment under the stars.   You are right, rooms with kitchenettes do offer a little extra comfort for those of our guests staying for a few days.  We'd love to have you return and hope you will stay in touch with us on our Facebook page, since we offer lots of suggestions.  Thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Right on inlet to gulf
review: Holiday Inn continues to dissapoint and I continue to give 2nd and 3rd chances. Stayed in Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach August 4th-6th. Upon arrival , staff was friendly enough , points for that. Room was what was expected , ok... When using facilities , such as the pool , eating at restaurant , seemed there was absolutely no , non smoking areas throughout the outdoor areas. Guests smoked freely near the pool , the outdoor restaurant area etc , with , what seemed , no limits..  No signs explaining what was or wasnt non smoking. I have young children who were exposed to people smoking cigars near  the pool , as well in outdoor area of restaurant.  Pool was fun , And im not about alot of rules , but it seemed like a pool toy "free for all" in the  pool. I had a hard time keeping an…

title: Awesome stay!
review: This was our second stay at this hotel,  both stays were great. Being a platinum rewards member,  our room was upgraded to a suite with a gulf view. The salt water pool was great for the kids and adults with a tiki bar poolside. Not to mention the AMAZING sunsets!

title: We loved it so much, we didn't want to leave!
review: Thank you!   We're pleased you and your family came back to see us and had another great visit to Clearwater.   We appreciate your positive comments about the resort and are so glad we met and exceeded your expectations.  Our great location and all the amenities make us an easy place to use as a central location for all the fun things in Clearwater.  And....those sunsets are really spectacular, aren't they?  We do hope you'll stay in touch with us - perhaps on Facebook - and look to returning for more adventures in Clearwater.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: First floor poolside was a must!
review: We came to stay at this hotel for our visit to Clearwater Beach. We had initially booked a room with 2 Queen sized beds, but found upon check-in that we had been upgraded to a King suite! This is the best room we could have possibly had, as it gave my boyfriend and myself our own room, and my sister had one to herself (pull out sleeper sofa). Our room overlooked the city, and it was an amazing view. I think we spent the whole night out on the balcony, enjoying the scenery and listening to the waves. One of the biggest bonuses to this suite is that it has an adjoining door but also a separate outer door for the 'living room' portion of the suite. So, my sister could come and go as she pleases without interrupting us and vice versa. The gentleman who checked us in (I so wish I…

title: Would Probably Stay There Again
review: How nice of you to take time to share your experience during your stay with us - thank you so much and we're thrilled you and you all enjoyed your holiday.   You are right, our suites are very spacious and are perfect for sharing and privacy.    So glad you enjoyed the beautiful views from the balcony, and all the resort features.  And thanks for your compliment on our front desk staff.  It just might have been Tim who you spoke with, although we have a number of great reservationists.  Excellent customer service is our main goal!  We do hope you'll stay in touch with us - perhaps on Facebook - and look to returning for more adventures in Clearwater.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Clean and comfortable!
review: Stayed with a friend and his nine year old son who was visiting from out of town. All and all it provided a great view and location. Daily sunsets from the pool deck and the tiki bar left a great memory and offset the average lobby and service. The idea of being waterside for a front row view of all the water traffic on Clearwater pass was amazing. Also, having a first floor, pool side room helped with our children wanting to play in the pool constantly. I would certainly return and continue to suggest it to friends visiting the area.

title: Good location, but shabby.
review: This run down property is disappointing for everything but the location. Grubby, Motel 6-quality amenities. The pool wasn't even open for the first day of our stay. The lobby is tiny and dingy. The elevator was broken as well, taking us to the 4th floor when we chose 3, then not responding to any of the buttons after that.  We took the stairs from then on.  That being said, the location is good and it has a nice big pool deck with lots of chairs.  The ocean (not the beach) is literally a few feet away from the failing.  Lots of parking too.

title: Great Stay!!
review: Dear Erin J:   Thank you for taking time to share your most recent experience with our resort.  We are happy to hear that you found our location convenient.  We do get a lot of compliments about our location and our pool deck area.    We are disappointed to hear our lobby and decor was not quite what you expected.  We are always welcome our guests suggestions and comments as a tool for improvement.  We do apologize for the inconvenience of the pool not being opened on Monday.  We worked tirelessly with two separate pool companies to get it opened as quickly as possible.  The fix took longer than anyone antciipated.  We hope that you were able to enjoy the pool area on Tuesday.    Again thank you for sharing your comments with us.  We  greatly appreciate the feedback.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: READ THIS BEFORE BOOKING!!!
review: We loved this hotel. It was our first time there and the service and staff were friendly and courteous.  The room was clean and they kept it clean and stocked for our whole 4 day trip. The lobby and other parts of the hotel itself were also well kept. The beach was only a 5 minute walk from the hotel and we were also able to walk to Pier 60 and other restaurants and shops.  Jimmy's Fish House is the restaurant attached to the Hotel and had great food and friendly staff! We sat out every morning to a beautiful view before starting our day.  We will definitely return again! Great place for family vacation.

title: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach 2014
review: Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay and found our location and resort amenities to your liking.  We do have a lot - and there are lots more reasons to come back - so we hope you'll stay in touch and come visit us soon.  "Like" us on Facebook and stay tuned that way!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Hotel
review: I hope that in telling our experience here we will save others from the same thing.  We were traveling with family and after booking the hotel immediately called this hotel to specify the necessity to have adjoining rooms.  The person on the phone was very accommodating, informing us there would be "no problem."  Upon arrival, no adjoining room.  We then went through numerous customer service people at the desk who, one by one gave us the "Sure! No problem!!"  phrase to only discover that was their key phrase....one shift did not talk to the others, nor was there any sense of responsibility in following through with promises.  My advice if you end up staying here? Demand instant results...get names, and see a manager (if that person is on.)  Unfortunately for us, there never…

title: Great Service at the Tiki Bar
review: We meet a few of our friends for drinks this weekend and we ended up at the Tiki Bar watching the sunset.  Our bartender Awesome Amy was the bomb!  She made sure our drinks were fresh at all times and was fun to talk to. We ordered dinner at the bar as well and her suggestions were yummy and hit the spot!  We live locally and will definitely come back to see Awesome Amy!

title: Never a disappointment! BEST OF CLEARWATER
review: Thanks so much for sharing your experience at Jimmy's!     We agree - Amy certainly is "Awesome" and we'll let her know that you'll be back just because of her. So glad you had a fun experience and that you're local enough to come back often.  You might want to ask about their birthday club when you want to celebrate your or a friend's next big day.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger

title: Great location and plenty of room for a small family in the suites
review: Have been staying at this Holiday Inn for nearly a decade and it has yet to disappoint. Most if not all the rooms have spectacular views. The pool is medium in size however, the deck that sits right up against the Gulf makes for another opportune spot to dip. Plus dabble in  snorkeling a bit.
