This place isn't five star, maybe just barely 4, it's a relaxing place that is meant to do the job it is supposed to: allow you to relax, sit next to a pool/beach, and eat/drink what you want. It doesn't try to be anything else, simplicity is best in these neck of the woods (or ocean...). Food, Music, Beach, Tan, maybe jet ski if you'd like.   The staff is always very kind and helpful. There is a gas station and some stores that sit just across the street, often very convenient. But it's…

title: We want to go back NOW
review: We love to hear customer reviews - but what makes us happiest is those who are repeat customers, like you, and who come back year after year because you feel comfortable here and love the experience.  Thanks so much for sharing some great tips with other readers of Trip Advisor, and we do hope you'll continue to visit us as often as you can.  We'll keep those sunsets waitng for you!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Can't wait to go back!
review: We stayed at this hotel for just one evening ... Was pleasantly surprised at the location, size of the rooms, and amenities this hotel offered.  It's within an easy walking distance to the Pier area and numerous restaurants.  It does not sit right on a beach area, but it is a very short walk away.

title: RESORT FEEL...AWESOME FAMILY VACATION!!
review: This place was AWESOME!!! We upgraded our room to a suite..and WOW!! We overlooked the pool and not to mention the beautiful ocean. The sunset from this hotel..words can not describe! We ate at Jimmy's every day and sometimes twice a day..the kids eat free coupon ROCKED!!! The public beach and pier 60 is a very short walk. The over all atmosphere of this place was great! The entire staff was excellent and went above and beyond to help. We have now decided that this family of 5 will be traveling to this resort feel hotel every year!!!

title: Nice hotel but needs work
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you were blown away by your vacation stay with us - and let us say that we're honored you chose us and that we lived up to your expectations!  Glad your family had fun both in the resort and in the area - there is so much to do here, plus, lots of ways to just do nothing at all but enjoy nature's best.    If you'd like to keep in touch on our Facebook page, we'll give you reasons to come back and many choices of things to do.  Thanks again and enjoy your summer.  Christine Bottget General Manager

title: lovely customer service
review: Our stay here was pleasant .  Clean room with friendly staff.  We have stayed here several times over the last few years and could tell it had went down some.  Mostly the landscaping was in need of some work.  There were no flowers in the planters and the pergola was missing a few boards.  One big palm tree was dead and the others needed trimming up. Since a lot of time was spent outdoors I noticed these things immediately.  Nice place but could use a little updating.

title: This will be our last stay at this hotel
review: Thank you for taking time to share your recent experience while staying with us.  First off, we thank you for being a repeat customer.  We value your loyalty and are pleased you've enjoyed your stays, plus our central location.  We do appreciate your comments on the landscaping areas, and do know that we share all guest comments with appropriate department heads.  It is our goal to provide a top experience each and every time and this type of feedback will indeed get attention.  Please think of us for the next time you need a vacation stay - there is always something new to do in Clearwater.  And, we invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page for even more reasons.  Thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Not on the Beach
review: I recently stayed at this hotel for a conference in Clearwater.  My room was clean and the staff especially a kind gentleman named Tim H was especially wonderful. It was a busy season and he always remembered my name and asked if I needed a cab to the conference venue.had a great time. Thanks so much.

title: Excellent
review: The hotel was nice! We were there for business and pleasure. We arrived 8 hours before check in. Guest Service Rep.Joan C allowed us to check into our room early and she extended our check out time. I give the hotel 5 stars because of the hospitality and family friendliness.  However you should know that the hotel is not directly on the beach. It is an ocean view hotel, but there is no real access to the beach from the hotel. To gain access to the beach we walked approximately 1 block to the beach, which was good enough for us. Highly recommend  and I will be returning with my family. Thank you again Joan C. ( guest services)!!!

title: Pleasant stay
review: Thank you for reviewing your recent stay here.   We're so pleased you enjoyed the resort, amenities, and its easy location to the public beach.  We'll be certain to let Joan know of your compliments.  She is an outstanding employee and typifies the guest satisfaction standards we set for everyone.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook for updates and reasons to come back.  We hope you'll find time to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great place to stay, close to the beach
review: We stayed in a suite that was very comfortable.  There was a large living room, with kitchen area with microwave and fridge.  Having two bathrooms was helpful with 3 adults and two children.  One of the bathrooms had a large shower, the other a bath/shower.  The balconies have a safety lock which we appreciated traveling with a 2 yr old who figured out the latch quickly.  Towels were changed daily.    The pool was great and open late in the evening.  There is a second small shallow pool for kids.  The hotel provides towels for the pool area.  The only drawback to the trip was no crib  for a full day which was ordered well in advance of the trip.  They apologized when we called, but we didn't get the crib until late the second day.  It was difficult sleeping the first night with…

title: Nice vacation
review: Thank you for taking time to review your stay.   We are so glad your family enjoyed a bit of vacation time here on Clearwater Beach.  We're pleased you enjoyed the spaciousness of the suite; they are popular since they allow a bit more room for people to spread out.  Please accept our apologies for the delay on the crib delivery.   Please know that all comments received through reviews are passed on directly to the appropriate department head so that we can continue to improve our customer service standards.  We hope you'll continue to visit with your family and enjoy all the fun the area has to offer. We invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page for updates, deals, and ideas.  Thank you again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Very nice experience at the Holiday Inn
review: My husband and I stayed here for three nights during our visit to Florida and were extremely  satisfied with many of the amenities. We actually arrived several hours before check-in time due to a very early flight, but were able to check in early. We were thrilled! While we were getting checked in, there was refreshing fruit-infused water to drink, so that was a nice welcome to hot Florida.  We asked to upgrade to a Gulf view room, but there were none available. However, our city view room was actually on the side of the building, so we did have a partial water view from our balcony. The room was clean and comfortable, with a microwave and refrigerator.  Cannot complain at all about our accommodations. The only disappointment was that there was no in-room safe. I would expect…

title: You're just a number
review: First of all would have given higher rating because the room itself was very nice.....however, when you pull into the parking lot and given a hard time because they don't believe you are staying there because they are SELLING parking spaces to beach tourists for $25.00!! So after a half hour of searching for a spot finally someone left and I grabbed spot only to be charged $12.00 by the hotel! The hotel smelled damp, and busy with tourists walking in and out.  No personal service that I expect from Holiday Inn. You are just a number.  The restaurant Jimmy's was the Pitts. That's another review.  I would never stay here again.

title: Great place to take your family!
review: Thank you for your review of your recent stay.  We're sorry you felt disappointment at the service, especially the parking fees.  Since your profile says you live in Clearwater, you surely realize that charging for parking is quite common along the beach because space is at a premium.  You are right - this is a busy time for all of us on the beach, so people coming and going in the hotel would be the norm.     We do thank you for staying with us and hopefully you left with some good memories.  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Little Older but GREAT stay!
review: I stayed at this hotel for an entire week with four teenagers. We got the two room suite and it was fantastic! The boys took the living are with pull out couch and the girls had the bedroom. I was very happy that both rooms had their own bathroom so each set of teenagers had privacy and didn't have to go I to each other's rooms. We were able to bring our own food and drinks to put in the kitchen in the room, so the only expense was dinner. The kids loved the location and the pool. They were able to walk to the pier at night for the evening activities. The boys loved the arcade. You can rent jet skis right by the hotel. My friends and I were able to walk next door to Shephards for great live music but then return to a quiet hotel to sleep. The only issue was that my sons…

title: A great visit
review: Thank you!   What a wonderful review, and we love it when guests give hints to those who read reviews of what to expect.  You described the room perfectly for your teenagers and we're glad it worked out for you.    We also appreciate the compliments on the resort amenities, staff, and location.  Hope you saw some dolphins!  Please join us on our Facebook page and stay in touch...and if you have photos of your stay to share, we'd welcome them!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 3rd stay. NEVER disappointed.
review: The hotel was a little older, but the location was excellent.  Literally right across from the beach made it a little less inexpensive, but worth it.  The chairs and umbrellas came in perfectly, and even though its not directly on the beach.... It was a hop,skip and jump away- closer to the beach than other "on the beach" hotels we have stayed at.  Quick walk to downtown eating and shopping made this the perfect weekend getaway.  Again, location was superior - I would stay here again for sure!

title: Loved it!
review: My husband and I had the Gulf Lodge Room. It was an Ocean Front view with a huge balcony!  The view was awesome!! Very clean and comfortable. The staff and cleaning service was on point. Easy access to the beach.. would stay again.

title: Nice Hotel
review: We're so glad you and your husband had a nice little vacation here  - you certainly chose a great room!  Thanks for taking time to let us know you enjoyed your stay.  We'd love to have you return again for more memories, so please stay in touch....we do have a Facebook page and give you lots of reasons to return.  Sincerely  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location and hotel.
review: Stayed here for five nights in May 2013.  The room though a bit dated, was a good size and the beds and pillows very comfortable. The bathroom was also a good size and the shower was fine.  The  room faced the front of the hotel so it was fairly quiet and we also saw gorgeous sunrises.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The food we ate in the restaurant (breakfast and apps) were good  but I especially enjoyed the music on weekends.  The pool and pool area were on the small side but adequate.  Initially I booked this hotel because I thought it was on the beach, it's not,  but the walk wasn't to far.  I loved the sunset countdown near the front desk.  All in all it was an enjoyable stay.

title: Poor customer service
review: Thanks so much for telling us about your stay here last year.  We're hoping you can make it back again this year, or in the near future, for another vacation memory.  So glad you enjoyed the resort, location, and amenities.  We really are centrally located, whether you walk or take the trolley.  Please stay in touch with us on our Facebook page!  Sincerely,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: We are well traveled and...
review: I had some hesitation about the hotel.  Its not right on the beach which I didn't realize until after I booked our non refundable weekend stay. One site (I can't remember which) claimed it was on the beach.  No matter...we didn't even go to the beach.  The pool never got too crowded or noisy.    Our room was on the 7th floor and was an ocean view.  We looked at the ocean as well as the side of the other tower. It was clean and well appointed.  The only strange design is that the room next door had a window onto our balcony. Very other room is like that.  And that room has control over the blinds. Luckily the room next to us was vacant.  It would have been weird to be hanging out on our balcony and having someone looking out their window at the view right next to us.  The room…

title: Beautiful, comfortable, and enjoyable!
review: Just got home from a 3 night stay and I can't stop talking about what an outstanding experience we had!  I have been to Clearwater Beach more times than I can count but have never stayed at the Holiday Inn and boy was I missing out!  The front desk service from check in to check out was great! Joan was especially fantastic!!  The room was clean and comfortable.  The employees at the coffee shop were always smiling and eager to help us out!  We mainly stayed at the hotel because we didn't feel like we needed anything more.  The food at Jimmy's was great didn't eat one thing I didn't like- everything was exceptional!  The bar staff was friendly and fun!  (Pittsburgh) Jason and Irish Dude Jay are great! There's live music every night and a big sunset party which was a good time! …

title: Don't stay here read my review
review: Wow!   Thank you so much for sharing your thoughts about your stay.  It's easy to see you had a great time....and for sure, that is our goal, to make every customer leave with great memories and a positive experience.   Our staff will be pleased you enjoyed them - and we'll say "hi" for you!  We're so glad you enjoyed the resort so much you stayed here for most of the time....and that gives you a reason to come back and explore other parts of Clearwater.  There are so many fun things to do here!  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook and know we'll look forward to your next visit.  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A Tropical Paradise!
review: My wife and I stayed here for four days from the 20th may to the 24th May and did not enjoy any part of this hotel one little bit. I'll start with the 12 dollars to park every night which is a rip off as anyone visiting Clearwater can do the same. The reception staff need training in manners and politeness as they are very miserable. The rooms are dated and a little scruffy for 4 star. We upgraded to a suite overlooking the gulf which was beautifull for 60 dollars per night but they neglected to say it was over the noisy pool area the noisy bar and the really noisy entertainment for the fish bar and goes on until 11pm every night and the fish bar is open until 2am. The most dangerous part is the security or lack of it. People can walk into the pool area from a unlocked gate of…

title: Tired Old Hotel- Ok beach location
review: Dear Micky49UK:  Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  It is unfortunate your interactions with our Guest Service Team and Restaurant Team  were unfavorable and prevented you from enjoying your stay with us.    The safety and security of our guests are a top priority for our entire team, which is why you will find our pool staff monitoring the pool area and parking area as well as our Security team consistently walking the property.    We will share your comments with our Management and Staff so we can review our policies and procedures and we are confident that if need be, necessary adjustments will be made to ensure complete guest satisfaction.    Thank you again for your comments.  Feedback is always welcomed and important to our success.    Best Regards,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Was a very nice experience
review: Now, a vacation in a wonderful place like Clearwater Beach deserves the perfect hotel pairing.  The Holiday Inn & Suites is located right on the sparkling Gulf of Mexico, and it is just waiting to welcome you with its comfortable rooms and seemingly never ending amenities.   This Mediterranean styled property is literally bursting at the seams with everything a traveler could possibly want or need in their "home away from home".  Th accommodations range from poolside or Gulf-view guestrooms that can comfortably sleep a couple or a family of four.  However, if you have something a little different in mind, it also offers suites with a full living room and kitchen area.  And for a real getaway, stay in a family suite, complete with a separate space for the kids, with their own…

title: Nice hotel but there is no beach
review: We stayed over Memorial Day Weekend.  Our gulf front king room, 514, was great.   Perfect view, private balcony, comfy bed and pillows.  There was a wet bar, fridge, and micro as well.   The entertainment from the restaurant was right below us...gave us something to listen too while hanging.    All the staff was very friendly as well as the bartenders at the tiki bar.   South of the hotel are the following: Hess Express IHOP Rubeeze sports bar and  grill Cesares Italian Restaurant.  the food was excellent, much of the pasta was homemade.     I have two comments a little less positive.  1.  There is no beach.  The pool area is nice as well as the deck they have that makes you fell like you are on the water.  There was never issues with enough chairs.   The pool towels were very…

title: maria
review: Thank you so much for commenting on your recent stay.  We're thankful that your time with us was a pleasant one and that all in all you enjoyed our facilities.  As to having no beach, you are correct, and hopefully you realized that we are on the water before you came, because we do promote that the beach is a short distance away.  Having trolley service also makes that easy for our guests to come and go.  As for the pool drink order, we can appreciate what you said and we do share all these comments with appropriate department heads.  Our goal is for our customers to enjoy all aspects of their stay.  Hopefully we'll see you again - there is always reason to return to Clearwater.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A Great Place on the Ocean
review: great place to stay,friendly staff,great food,fantastic sea views,lots of dolphin and manatee swimming past daily,will be going back,can highly recommend this hotel only a short walk to the beach,and shops.

title: I love this place.
review: Thanks so much for taking time to compliment us about your recent stay.  We're so glad you enjoyed the resort, the views - and the dolphin sightings!  Please stay in touch with us via Facebook for more reasons to return - there is always something new going on in Clearwater.  Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: We felt we were treated differently!
review: I stayed here while on business, arriving on a Friday evening. Being by the ocean had me in the mood for grouper. I lucked out, since Friday night is all-you-can-eat grouper night. They had several different varieties to choose from. At sunset, they pass around shots of Sex on the Beach for everyone. The bar and restaurant, called Jimmy's Fish House and Iguana Bar, opens right out onto the water and has an outdoor area with a stage featuring live music. You can easily charge your drinks and meals to your room if you want.  I had the breakfast buffet on Sunday morning, which was good. Also, I made use of the pool and laundry facilities while I was there. Parking was $12 a night, but I didn't mind that. It is nice to be able to park there and not have to worry about your car.…

title: Heading down June 8th and can't wait!
review: We are visiting the week of June 8th and am so excited.  We stayed last year and can't say enough about the hotel, the location and the people!  We are again booked for one of the lovely suites that faces the gulf and hope to see dolphins again.  I really don't understand the bad reviews I have read because last year the staff couldn't have been more helpful and pleasant.  The pool is awesome and well maintained.  The beach is literally a 5 minute walk (and that's with a 2 year old).  Can't wait to return and we can't wait to visit with George again!  24 days and counting!  See you soon!

title: Lack of Customer Service
review: Thanks for commenting on your last year's stay - and please know we'll let George know you'll be arriving soon!  We're glad you and your family had such fun last year - and we bet the dolphins will once again be on hand to amuse your toddler.    Thanks for comments on how easy it is to reach the beach -- we have lots of guest comments on how centrally located we area.  We'll see you soon - and remember to ask the front desk what is going on in the area while you are here - there's always something!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Excellent value!
review: The most unhelpful front desk staff I have encountered anywhere. Very frustrating checkin experience, followed by lots of "I don't knows", "that is in our book?", etc. If you stay here, Google is your friend and bring you own pool towels. Also, hotel is not on the beach, that is not very clearly advertised

title: Perfect location, nice staff
review: Dear cntrygal71,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay.  It is unfortunate your interactions with the staff prevented you from fully enjoying your time at the hotel.  We are confident the necessary adjustments will be made, in order to achieve complete guest satisfaction.   Thank you again for your comments, we look forward to serving you in the future.   Sincerely,  Ben J Case Manager IHGCare

title: Good value, great sunsets
review: We are here for a work-related visit.  Hotel is clean, staff is wonderful, beds are comfy...Nice little coffee shop on premises, pool is beautiful.  Lounging by the Gulf is not to be missed!  Saw manatees and dolphins during first lunch!  Really convenient to get to beach, and trolley access is right out front if you don't want to walk.  Will gladly return in future, and we're thankful we still have a couple days left of our trip!  Only negative I can think of is that the AC units are a bit on the loud side--certainly not enough to deter us!

title: Pretty fantastic location
review: Stayed here for one night and on the water was our criteria.  Although it is not on the beach, this hotel is still waterfront and we did get to see Dolphins from the pool area.  Beach is a 5 minute walk down the road which was easy. Spent most of our time at the beach and had the pleasure of having 6 Manatee's swimming with us.  Very fun.  The hotel provides beach towels to take to the beach, and pool towels to use at the pool.  You do have to pay for parking but I think you end up paying for parking where you go around the beach area.  The staff at this hotel are friendly and helpful, we especially liked the free lemon water in the lobby.   Would stay again simply based on the location and the close proximity to everything.

title: Really nice hotel
review: Thank you for visiting us - and writing such a nice review.  We're so glad you returned - we love to see our repeat customers and know they can make more memories here.  We appreciate your comments on our affordable rates, clean resort, and amenities such as restaurant, pool and deck.  Remember, there is always something happening in Clearwater and we hope you'll stay in touch with us on Facebook to give you ideas.  Thanks again and kind regards,  Christine Bottger

title: Service not the best
review: Second time coming here.  Very nice & clean.  Rates are very reasonable. Helpful staff.  On the water butt not on a beach (about a 5 minute walk).  Jimmy's restaurant & beach bar is a huge plus. Nice pool but no hot tub.  Definite recommend it for a reasonable beach trip to Clearwater.

title: Nice hotel, good value
review: How nice of you to write about your stay here.  We're glad you packed so much in for a short stay and hope you can return again longer next time, now that you know all we have to offer.  So glad you enjoyed the views and resort amenities.  Our sunsets and views of the dolphins and manatees only add to the memories.  Please stay in touch with us on Facebook and we'll keep you updated with more reasons to come back.  Thanks again and kind regards,  Christine Bottger

title: I love this hotel
review: The hotel for the most part was great. However, I Valle to ask for the water to be more than lukewarm and was told it came from one central source and there was nothing that could be done. If you desire a hot bath or shower, stay elsewhere.

title: Great choice
review: My husband and I chose this hotel because I really wanted to be able to sit on a balcony and enjoy my morning coffee. We made the perfect choice. This hotel is not beach front, but it is water front and a very short walk to the beach. There have chaise lounge chairs that look right over the water that make you feel like you're sitting on the beach, but without the messy sand. The hotel restaurant is located right on the water also, and they have nightly entertainment, happy hour and a sunset celebration each night which makes for a great way to spend the evening. We even sat on our balcony in the evenings and watched the entertainment from the privacy of our own room. The staff was top notch and very helpful.

title: Beautiful Sunsets
review: So glad you felt you made a "great choice" by staying with us - we would have to agree!  We enjoyed having you and are glad you had some great down time and enjoyed all the resort features.   Our staff will thank you for the compliments - they want your stay to be memorable as well.  We do hope you can return again soon - and until that time - please stay up to date with us on our Facebook page.  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger

title: Great hotel, great staff, great stay
review: Our two day stay in Clearwater was perfect!  Once we parked our car, everything we could ever want was within walking distance.  The hotel offered all we were looking for, great beds, music, perfectly blended drinks, amazing sunsets, beach feeling, gorgous swimpool, and friendly staff.

title: No beach
review: You are so right- our sunsets are spectacular!   We're so glad you chose the room that you did because there's nothing quite like sitting on your balcony at day's end watching the sun's orb turn into vibrant colors.  Hopefully you'll see us again soon -  and please stay up to date with us on our Facebook page.  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger

title: Best breakfast views!!
review: This was my 2nd stay at this hotel this year and I can't wait to return.  Our first stay in January was with my wife and two young children.  This time, it was just my wife and I for a long weekend getaway.  We were checked in by very helpful, knowledgeable front desk staff and were surprisingly upgraded to a poolside room which was a nice surprise.  Our room was extremely clean and comfortable and overlooked the pool area which is amazing.  We took advantage of the on site restaurant Jimmy's and had a great meal along with great drinks.  The prices are very reasonable and they have a large patio outside which over looks and is right on the inter coastal waterway.  Holiday Inn, although not on the beach is a very short walk to the beach (under five minutes).  It also has a very,…

title: Paradise!!!
review: I mean to write a review a whole lot sooner but been so busy.  My fiancé and I stayed for about a week here overlooking the gulf view! It is very costly but we wanted to splurge. If you don't deem it necessary to spend a vast amount of money on a view, don't! However, waking up to the sounds of the ocean crashing into the rocks and the smell in the air and the sounds of birds is appealing to you, then by all means: splurge!!  The restaurant at the hotel was excellent!! We ate there almost every night and I must say I was impressed that the prices weren't that bad! The live entertainment and staff were outstanding and always made us feel welcomed.  The location is wonderful for a nice getaway and would definitely stay here again. They only thing that was slightly disappointing…

title: The best choice for our trip
review: Thank you!   We're so pleased you took time to review your stay with us last May.  Since you're only in central Florida, we do hope you'll be able to take another beach getaway this year as well.  Customer service is very important to us, and please know we take each comment to the respective department head, so your mention on the front desk will be addressed.    As you said, that did not tarnish the enjoyment you had, and we're pleased you enjoyed your room, our facilities, the pool and the beautiful views.  We hope you'll stay in touch with us (follow us on Facebook) and return again as soon as you have time.  Thanks again and kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Holiday Inn a Great Place
review: When it comes to choosing travel accommodations, I try to look at the big picture. In most cases, you aren't going to find a property that meets every single requirement. For Clearwater Beach, the Holiday Inn was the best choice overall for our family. We stayed in two hotels there during our stay, the other being the Hilton. When you factor in price, beach proximity, space and affordable dining, the Holiday Inn wins.  Pros: -Most reasonable pricing I found for a waterfront hotel. -Had a kids' suite that was awesome for our family! We'd originally wanted a condo, but that didn't work out. The little kitchenette, dining area and alcove with bunk beds was fantastic and gave everyone the space they needed. -Kids eat free at Jimmy's Fish House. That was big for us. -The front desk…

title: Perfectly sufficient!
review: Thank you for taking time to review your stay with us.  We're so pleased you enjoyed the resort, the friendliness of our staff, and the beautiful views.  As far as other restaurants are concerned, perhaps you didn't realize we have trolley service that takes our guests up and down the beach to hop on and hop off at so many great spots for dining and sightseeing.  Please consider it next time.  We're glad you found the public beach easily accessible.  There is always something new to do in Clearwater, so we hope you'll stay in touch with us (follow us on Facebook) and return again in the future.  Thanks again and kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great for Families with Children
review: Such friendly people, great pool, good location.   From the first day we got there switching from another hotel we felt very welcomed. Everyone at the front desk was terrific. The game room though a bit older offered a nice break during some of the rainy days. The pool area was awesome and the water very warm. Kids were able to swim even on the cooler windy days.  We stayed at the hyatt last year and obviously that was terrific but we had just as good a stay at the Holiday Inn for those looking for a little less pricey option. We traveled with another family and shared a two bedroom suite. Worked out extremely well.  Thank you to all the staff who helped make a great stay!

title: Very Nice Place To Stay
review: The hotel is nice but not fancy. I had a very relaxing and comfortable stay.The rooms are modern and clean. Every staff member I talked to was kind and friendly. It is just a short walk to the beach but it is a waterfront property. I loved viewing the gorgeous sunsets of Clearwater Beach from here. Nice pool with a tiki bar. The restaurant-Jimmy's Fish House and Iguana Bar is excellent for meal, snacks, and drinks.Many good resaurants are close by. It was a nice getaway for me to relax but it is also perfect for families.

title: Worst experience ever - Minority families beware!
review: Thanks so much for taking time to review your stay with us.   We appreciate your kind words because pleasing our guests is what our entire staff strives for.     We're glad you found the resort to have comfortable, clean rooms and amenities.   You're correct -  Jimmy's is a lot of fun and hopefully you met some new friends while here.       Of course those sunsets are always spectacular - glad you enjoyed them.    Thanks again - please stay in touch on our Facebook page.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great hotel, great location
review: I will update this review once I hear back from upper management and corporate; however here is a brief overview of our stay.   After driving 9 hours, I called to ensure our double bed room was ready, was told I requested a king bed. I explained I was traveling with my children and absolutely did NOT request a king bed. The manager on duty said the system has what I requested and we'll have to pay an additional charge for the double bed room. Frustrated and angry, we agreed to pay the up charge because the room was fully paid for in advance for two nights. That was at 8pm.   A few hours later, 2am to be exact with my husband and children sleeping, I heard 3 very large bangs on our door. My husband said through the door "May I help you?" The person on the otherside of the door…

title: Another Great Visit
review: Dear 123FletcherZ:  Thank you for taking the time share your experience.  All of us here at the Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach greatly appreciate it.  We are deeply saddened to hear that your stay was negatively impacted by another guest and his comments.  While we can never forsee an incident such as this happening, we can sympathize with how you felt.  It is never our intent to have our guests terrified for their safety.    Our behalf of the entire staff, we would like to apologize for the inconvenience and terror you felt and as discussed on the phone earlier this week, a full refund has been issued to the booking agent..   Should you need to discuss your stay further, please contact me at cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com   Best Regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice place to stay
review: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights, having cashed in our Priority Club points. The check in was quick and efficient. We were upgraded to a two room suite, which was spacious and had a great view over the pool and Gulf. Its a fairly typical Holiday Inn... its got everything you need - not luxurious, but all round good value.  The location is great with many bars and restaurants around. Strongly suggest you try Jimmy's Fish House and Iguana Bar, which is in the hotel. Great food and great location on the Gulf, with fantastic views of the sunset.  Its about a 10 min walk to the nearby Pier 60, around which there a numerous restaurants and bars. Worth a visit.

title: Favorite hotel on Clearwater Beach!
review: We just returned from our 5th stay at the Clearwater Beach Holiday Inn & Suites and it's definitely one of our favorite hotels. It's not your typical Holiday Inn! Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Nothing is ever a problem. If you have an issue with something, they are there right away to take care of it for you! Front desk staff are very attentive and there to help you with any questions. It's well worth the money to upgrade to an gulf front room! The views are amazing! Jimmy's Fish House is right on site which is a fun place to go with good food at reasonable prices. Service at the bar is top of the line. Bartenders & waiters/waitresses are very attentive and do a great job. Pool area and tiki bar are a plus! Beach is approximately a 5 minute walk with easy access. Very…

title: Nice!
review: Thanks so much for such a nice review!   We enjoyed having you and your friends here and glad you had fun.  You're correct - the gulf front views from the 5th floor are so spectacular!  Hopefully you saw a few dolphins!    Thanks for the compliments on our staff.  Everyone here does try to ensure each guest has a memorable and enjoyable experience.  Please stay in touch with us on our Facebook page and hopefully we can entice you with reasons to return.  Hoping good weather comes to PA soon for you!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Excellent Location
review: The rooms are very spacious & clean & the beds & pillows are comfortable. Some of the living room furniture is looking a bit dated but not bad. We had a suite overlooking the Gulf & there were dolphins visible most of the time. There is a very nice pool & pool area, and although it's right on the water, there is no beach here. Clearwater Beach is just a couple of minutes away (walking) & there are several little shops & restaurants in walking distance. A bit pricey, but I guess with the location it's to be expected!

title: Relaxing Stay as part of a holiday in Florida
review: Thank you!  We're so glad you had fun during your stay with us.  We're pleased you found our rooms spacious and comfortable, and do know that each guest comment is reviewed with the proper department so that we can continue to improve.  There are lots more events and reasons to return again to Clearwater Beach, and we invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page to stay current.  Enjoy your spring and thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Where's The Beach?
review: The location was great , walking distance to the beach. Right on the trolley/busline. The hotels restaurant was great. The sunset views are just amazing from the pool and restaraunt patio. We would stay there again!

title: Loved it!
review: It was our first stay at this hotel and we were very impressed.  We got upgraded to a king suite because we are IHG Platinum members.  The room was 3 rooms.  One room had twin bunk-beds, and was adjoined to a shared sink area and a full bathroom.  The king bedroom was also adjoined to the full bathroom and had a big balcony, and we had a living room area with a wet bar and dining table with another full bathroom.  In all there were 3 TV's and 4 sinks.  We had more than enough room!! The hotel manager also checked on us to make sure we were happy.    The pool area is very nice and we loved Jimmy's Fish House.  Great food at good prices.   We loved this place and would definitely recommend to all! Only downfall is it is not directly on the beach.  It's a short walk.

title: No Beachfront to be found here !
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review your stay here!     So glad you enjoyed the king suite - it really does give you lots of space to unwind, plus the balcony is a great place to hang out.  Happy you enjoyed dining at Jimmy's and our other resort amenities.  And, we are a short walk to the beach, but guests love having the Gulf come right up close to our deck, perfect for dolphin watching.  Sure hope you'll come back and visit again.  Stay in touch on our Facebook page for more reasons to visit.    Finally, hoping your harsh winter comes to a close soon!  All the best from Christine Bottger

title: Awesome hotel stay
review: Well, I have to admit that I am spoiled when it comes to staying in nice properties while vacationing, and that my daughter and I arrived to this Holiday Inn on the heels of staying at the Sandpearl Resort on the north end of Clearwater Beach earlier in the week, prior to renting a car (at Budget/Avis on Cleveland Street - Thanks to Ricardo and David there !) and traveling down to Marco Island Beach Resort and Spa and staying there for two nights before heading back north to Clearwater in preparation for flying out of Tampa the following day.  The Holiday Inn is , I suppose, a typical older property - with no "sex appeal" upon entering the lobby, though front desk personnel were kind and friendly (enough).  Though the young man told me that he didn't have any upgrades for me…

title: Will be good when refurbishment is complete
review: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay here.  From reading your comments, it does appear that you enjoyed the gulf view room, the comfortable beds, and were pleased with the cleanliness.  And, as you noted, there was no noise from the bar area, making for a relaxing stay.  Thanks for the compliments on our staff, especially Tim.  We all try hard to make your experience pleasurable.    You are correct, we are gulf side but not beach side, yet the beach is so easily accessible by foot or trolley.  Sorry you felt disappointed on this part of your stay.  As for the crows...we're not alone; others have similar occurrences but for the most part guests are able to ignore them.    We're glad you chose Clearwater Beach for part of your holiday experience and hope the remainder of 2014 is a good one.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: No where near a 4 star rating
review: I was hesitant per SOME of the reviews but let me tell you, we have zero complaints! Clean, comfy beds, awesome city view (could still see the water) and wonderful restaurant with a beautiful sunset view. We loved the pool, chairs were great size, pool towels, service from Jimmy's was very nice also. We enjoyed ordering drinks from our chair. Front desk people and actually all workers we saw were friendly! We had massages in Lou's inside the hotel and she did one of the best massages I ever had!  Thank you for having us and we will come back again for sure! Would love to try your hotel in Milwaukee sometime.  Jenny and Brittany Oshkosh Wi

title: lovely location
review: really recommend this hotel.right on the beach. rooms very modern and clean.the most professional and friendly staff, who always go the extra mile.there was construction in progress, but however, the area was cordoned off and apart from the banter between the workforce, (which was very amusing) it caused no problem.  only complaint was 12 dollar a day parking, bit extortionate.

title: Many much better options in this area!!
review: Thank you for taking time time to post about your stay with us.    We're sorry you were inconvenienced by the construction, and we do hope you'll be able to return to see all the new improvements.  Glad you enjoyed our location, which is so close to everything.  And we're pleased you enjoyed the resort overall.  There's always reasons to come back, and we invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook Page for news and updates.  Have a nice year and thanks again!  Christine Bottger

title: Stay somewhere else
review: Was really looking forward to our stay here based on pictures, location, and other reviews on Trip Advisor.  Unfortunately this was a big disappointment.  Big surprise was the entire waterfront side of the hotel north tower was under construction.  Tried to relax and enjoy the pool on our first days there, but no way with this construction.  (No mention of major renovation when booking hotel). Workers were VERY noisy- shouting all day and banging stuff around.  Pool was full of small styrofoam (BB size) pellets!!!!  We were covered in them as we would step out of the pool.  Internet was intermittent.  Front desk said this was because they were in the process of switching Internet providers during the construction and not all the wiring is hooked up yet- this was very…

title: Beautiful hotel and far better than the average Holiday Inn
review: SenatorMcCain:  Thank you for your feedback regarding  your recent experience at your resort.  We are terribly disappointed you were unable to enjoy your visit with us due to our renovation.  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced due to the one elevator going down for a length of time and for the internet issues.  We are in the process of upgrading our Wireless Access including increasing our access points and service provider.  We would love to welcome you back once the renovations and upgrades are complete so you can truly experience all our resort has to offer.  If you wish to discuss your stay further, please contact me directly at cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com.  Again, please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay.    Best Regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Nice place, but not 5 star
review: Yes, it is a nice location but we wouldn't stay here again.  From the 2 broken elevators, to the unhelpful and unapologetic staff, and poor service in the restaurant the first night we were here, we recommend going somewhere else.  The rooms were okay but don't plan on getting comfortable in the suite living room.  The couch we had was as stiff and hard as sitting on rocks.  We are not even here during the busiest time of the year (next week apparently when spring training starts, it's supposed to be crazy here).  Try getting up and down to the 7th floor on a busy day with only one elevator operating and the only set of stairs is outside?  Not conveniently off the lobby like any sensible place would have them.  When we went outside to swim, there were bird feathers collected in…

title: Disappointed with view
review: When we booked this stay we requested a room with an ocean view on a top floor, and was promised such. However, after a 15 hour driving trip and arrival there our check-in was full of surprise. We were not given the promised ocean view suite. Supposedly those rooms were fully booked and occupied. We had to settle for a suite facing another hotel. Wow....what a view.  Management stated they would not be able to give us a room with ocean view.......bummer! However, we discovered many of the 8th floor rooms with ocean view were not fully occupied, but were being renovated.   Management of this hotel.........just be honest and tell the truth. It would have made the experience much more palatable.   Had we known an ocean view room would not be available, we would have booked at a…

title: Horrible sleep
review: Dear dafcct:  Thank you for sharing your thoughts regarding your most recent visit with us.  We greatly appreciate your  feedback.  We are terribly disappointed to hear that we failed to meet your expectations and that you felt misled.  I would love to discuss your booking experience and stay experience in further detail so we can try and determine where the breakdown where the process failed.  You may reach me at cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com or (727) 683-1370.    Again we greatly appreciate your valuable feedback and your business.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: 3rd stay - love this place!
review: Buyer beware. The cost for this place isn't worth it. There is a $12.84 fee just to park in an open lot. There is no access to the beach from the hotels back doors, you must walk down the road a ways. The worst part of my stay was that that I couldn't sleep. The air conditioning that had controls on the window unit wouldn't work until I found the thermostat. This was never told to me by the staff at check in. Also it was very loud right by the road. I heard drunk people and cars all night. During the day there was construction on the pool side facing the water. Debris from construction was in the pool. The towels were also poor quality, small and rough. We didn't have enough towels in the room for 4 people even though the room was for 4 people. Also there were no trash bags in…

title: Pleasantly surprised and beyond
review: Dear SwoleSavage:  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent experience with our establishment.  We are deeply disappointed to hear you were unable to enjoy your stay with us.  I would love the opportunity to speak to you further regarding your experience.  I will also meet with our Front Office Team about advising our guests about the location of the thermostats, in order to avoid frustration.  Should you wish to discuss your stay further please feel free to contact me directly at cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com.    Thank you for your review and your business.  We greatly appreciate it.    Christine Bottger  General Manager

title: Great Hotel on Water
review: We stayed for 8 nights in October. We've stayed here 3 years in a row. We absolutely love the location but mostly the service! From front desk staff to housekeeping to Jimmy's - every staff member is super friendly and can't do enough for you. The rooms are lovely and the view can't be beat - highly recommend paying the extra for a gulf view. We had a perfect view of the stage in Jimmy's from our deck so we could sit out at night and listen to the wonderful entertainment and enjoy a drink together.  We loved sitting at the bar in Jimmy's as we'll. the bartenders are superb and remember you and make you feel like family there after just a visit or two.  The food is also excellent. The seafood bisque is especially amazing!  You can not ask for a better vibe than you get at…

title: Best view on the beach!
review: I was skeptical after reading a couple of bad reviews on here, but after my stay I had to ask myself what these people were thinking.  We had a room on the eighth floor overlooking the city (to save $), but the view was still beautiful.  There were renovations going on while we were there, but it did not affect our trip.  Every hotel should renovate their premises, and the winter season is the most convenient time for them to do so.  If I had the choice to do it all over, I would still choose Holiday Inn. We viewed the sunset from the pool deck, and I must say other than being on the beach our hotel had the most amazing view of the sunset. The location is great, only a few blocks from the beach. Every staff member we spoke to was friendly and accommodating. The cashier in the…

title: New Year
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review our resort following your stay here.  We're so pleased you enjoyed your holiday!   You are right, the views are spectacular - even on the city side where the lights sparkle at night.  And we're so glad you experienced some of our extraordinary sunsets - which just recently won the award for best sunset on USA Today.  Hopefully we'll get you to come back - and thanks again for complimenting our staff.  They work hard to make your stay memorable.  Please join us on Facebook if you haven't done so already and stay in touch!  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Poolside of hotel is under construction
review: Fantastic stay in a lovely hotel. Amazing suite which was nearly as big as my house!!!!! Although we had a city view we could still see the sea from our balcony Staff on site were great from the lady in the gift shop (forgot her name...sorry) to the guys in the salon (excellent massage). Swimming pool was warm and good fun.....The hotels website did publicise the building work but this didnt dampen our stay. I only wish our travel company had told us about this. Special mention goes to Jimmys fish house (on site) The food was so good we didnt eat anywhere else!!!!!!!!! Recommend the grouper sandwich

title: Poor internet service
review: Thanks so much for reviewing your stay with us!  We're glad you loved that big spacious suite to enjoy, and had time to explore the resort, use the pool, dine at Jimmy's, and catch our sunsets! Our staff appreciate that they made your stay memorable - they do try hard!  Love to see you back here as return guests.  Please join us on Facebook if you haven't done so already and find reasons to return, hopefully soon!  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger  General Manager

title: I left this hotel covered in bug bites this morning.
review: This hotel looked very nice but unfortunately the whole of the back of the hotel overlooking the pool and bar is under construction. I am very annoyed that this information was not given to me when I booked. We turned up and there was banging and crashing of materials being dropped down the chute, the whole side of the hotel was covered in a tarp but there was dust all over the loungers and it was not a relaxing place to be. We had to make expensive calls back to the UK to cancel our booking and find somewhere else. So be warned, you will be sitting sunning yourself on a construction site!

title: Very good waterfront property
review: I recently stayed at this hotel for three nights over the weekend with family.  This hotel is directly on the water and has gorgeous sunsets that can be seen every night.  I was in a suite on the sixth floor that was a partial ocean view.  The view actually was pretty good, but we took advantage of the beautiful sunsets downstairs on the back patio and at the restaurant Jimmy's, which was great by the way.    The suite was very nice.  There were four of us and there was plenty of space with two full bathrooms, two queen beds, two TVs, a dining area, a large balcony, and a microwave and fridge.  There is also a large sofa bed that I slept on which is not the most comfortable, but I slept good on it anyway.  I was disappointed with the HDTVs, the picture was awful, but yet, the…

title: Beachfront hotel
review: Thanks for taking time to review your stay with us.  So glad  you and your family were able to travel from D.C. and enjoy a bit of beach time.     We're pleased you liked your suite and found it clean and comfortable...and happy you were able to enjoy a meal or two at Jimmy's.  We have to agree - our sunsets are pretty memorable!  Best wishes for a great 2014 and hope to see you back this year!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Good beachfront hotel.
review: First of all, I enjoy the Florida Gulf coast and wish to come here more often. Hope to head to Clearwater, Fl more often in the future. The hotel was pretty busy for a winter day, however had great amenities. it is ocean front, we didn't have a good view and no balcony but we were not there long anyways. Beds were great and the hotel seem to be pretty clean. Would recommend this to families as it had a little bit of room even for a standard two queen bed room. Staff was nice and helpful.

title: New Years Eve!
review: We do appreciate that you took time to review your recent stay.  Thanks for traveling from S.C. with your family and choosing Clearwater Beach - and us - for your getaway!    We're glad you found our staff welcoming and the rooms and resort amenities and facilities to your liking.  We really do want each guest to enjoy a memorable stay - and hope they become regulars!  All the best to you in 2014 and hope to see you soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Enjoyed the stay...
review: I've stayed at this Hotel, a couple of times (Oct. 2012, Oct. 2013) for 1 week, both for business. The hotel is wonderfully located closed to the beach. On 2012, I got a room with a view to the beach, and I was able to enjoy beautiful sunsets. On 2013, I got a room with a view to the parking lot, so my blinds were pretty much closed the entire time as I was able to see my room from the parking lot every time I came back from work. Room every time was very clean, large, comfortable bed and pillows. There was wifi, which worked perfectly so I could call home every night to talk to my husband (Costa Rica). Only once did we ever had a meal at their Restaurant. Food was very good in both quality and quantity. I do think it was a little pricey, but overall the food was very good.…

title: We will not be staying there again.
review: A family member had a late flight into Clearwater airport, so we decided to book a hotel and make the next day a beach day. The location was not perfect- a blocked beach view but no beach access.  Upon arrival, check in was easy, however, we were greeted in our room by a bug (roach) on the bed.  When we called the front desk, another crawled out from under the phone.  Then as we exited the room, saw a third in the corner near the door.  Had it not been so late, we would have left the premises. I tried not to cause a scene and went to the front desk. We were booked into another room two floors up which looked like it had been recently remodeled- newer carpet and bathroom cabinetry. Luckily, we saw no further critters, but the stay was not as pleasant as it might have been. Some…

title: Worst bed ever!  Food not worth cost.
review: Dear Nancy M:  Thank you for taking the time to review your most recent visit with our hotel  We value your feedback.  We rely on you, our guests, to tell how we are doing and how we can improve.  We will be reviewing your comments with our team to devise a course of action to prevent this from happening again.    Our team strives to be the leader in our area in accommodations and services and we are disappointed we failed in this instance.  Our apologies for not allowing you to experience a comfortable, relaxing night in our facility.  Should you wish to discuss your stay further, please contact me at cbottger@clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com   Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

title: Loved it and would go again!
review: Spent $100 for frozen seafood at their restaurant. Not good at all. Liked our suite. Large and clean. But absolutely could NOT sleep on sofa bed. Felt every wire and spring. Put mattress on the floor but it was no better. Trying to sleep on two cushions pushed together.

title: Good value Hotel
review: Dear DTAshley:  Thank you for taking the time to share you recent experience with our hotel.   We are disappointed you were unable to enjoy your time with us.Feedback such as yours, allows us to point to areas of opportunity for improvement.    We strive to be the leader in excellence in accommodations and services and are saddened to hear we failed in this instance.  Should you wish to discuss your stay in further detail, please contact me at cbottger@clearwaterbeachholidayinn.com.   Again, thank you for the  valuable feedback.

title: Nice weekend trip
review: Great hotel! Had no problems with our room or stay! We got the family suite and the kids loved it! Very spacious! The view was amazing and it was a quick walk to everything! Breakfast buffet was very good too! Would definitely return!

title: Room is OK--Beach area is awful!
review: We had a wonderful room at his "Resort" but when we got to the beach is was extra money for a chair/chaise and umbrella.  Additionally, much of the beach is reserved for the people who pay extra for these things.  However, just across the "sky" bridge there is a public beach that is wonderful.  All in all WHEN I go back to Clearwater I will stay somewhere else besides the Holiday Inn!!

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We're sorry if you were disappointed that we are not directly on the beach....however, we're glad you found the beautiful Sand Key Park and hope you also were able to take the short walk to Clearwater Public Beach.  Most resorts in the area do charge for chaises and chairs on the beach, so sorry that disappointed you as well.  We are glad you enjoyed the room and were able to get away for a short couples vacation.  Although there are many fine properties on Clearwater Beach, we do hope you'll consider returning to stay with us again.  Best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Very clean and the staff was very helpful!
review: My husband and I stayed at the Holiday Inn & Suites on Saturday December 7th.  It was a very pretty place with a great bar and pool area.  As a Director of Sales for an IHG property I was very impressed with the hospitable staff, as well as the customer service in the food outlets.  This hotel is located on beautiful Clearwater Beach.  The view is lovely, and the cost is extremely affordable.  Would absolutely stay here again.  My favorite employee is Tim who provides a great, jovial, welcome and is very knowledgable in the area's attractions and amenities.  AWESOME PLACE!

title: A great location to enjoy beautiful Clearwater
review: Thank you so much for your kind words regarding your recent stay with us.  We're so glad you had a fine time!  We appreciate that, as a family member of IHG, we met or exceeded the standards you know we are famous for.  If we get to your area, we do hope we have the pleasure of staying at your property.  Tim will appreciate your kind words.  He really, really tries to make everyone's stay special, as do all of our staff.  Hopefully the "white stuff" isn't too deep up there now - we've been watching the weather reports.  You may need a winter getaway - and we hope it will be back here.    Until then, please stay in touch on our Facebook page.  All the best for a fine Holiday Season!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: really great hotel
review: Staff was on top of everything. Call twice to make sure everything was up to our satisfaction. Loved the location. Only draw back was no beach at hotel, but it is water front. Just had to walk a few mins to beach.

title: Excellent location
review: Stayed at the hotel for 2 nights with my wife, the Hotel is in an excellent location, we had a room with a gulf view which was well worth it fantastic sunsets ans see the motorboats pass early morning was also fantastic plus we had our own dolphin show. The room was very large with a very comfortable bed and a spacious living area. It doe not have its own beach but the sun terrace and pool is wonderful as the sea laps against the terrace wall. We went to the beach a 2 minute walk away so there was no problem by not having it on our door step.

title: Roaches in Room
review: We really appreciate that you took time to review your recent stay with us - we're so pleased you enjoyed the resort and it's easy accessibility to beautiful Clearwater Beach.  Hopefully you'll be able to return to see us again - there is always something new going on in Clearwater.  We wish you happy holidays and hope you'll return to see us soon.   Happy Holidays!  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Do you like sunsets?
review: Upon entering the hotel things appear great; however, my three night stay was horrible because of ROACHES in my room.  On the first night, there was a roach trying to crawl out of the electrical socket in the bathroom.  I reported the incident to the front desk and they said they would take care of the situation.  Still unsettled about the thoughts of a roach being in the wall trying to get out, I was even more bothered on day two when roach was crawling on the tv stand.  I again reported the situation and was told they would have my room sprayed while I was out.  I would have left on the first sight of roaches but I was with a group and it would have been difficult to find lodging for everyone so I stuck it out making sure to keep all my personal bags zipped and lights on.  On…

title: Great hotel
review: Ms. Stacy N:  Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding your stay with us.  We are terribly sorry to hear that your experience with our hotel was less than desirable.  I am disappointed that we were unable to address your concerns with you while you were our guest.  I would love the opportunity to discuss your stay further.  If you could kindly reach me to at cbottger@ClearwaterBeachHI.com, I would greatly appreciate it.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great hotel in a good location
review: This is an upscale Holiday Inn. This hotel is good if you want to sit on your balcony and look at the Gulf of Mexico. There is no beach but the view of the inlet and all the boat activity is fun and relaxing. It sits directly on the water. Our room was 762, high enough for a great view and not much noise from the pool and bar. Sunsets were spectacular. Unfortunately,being at the end of the building, Internet access was scarce at best and often nonexistent. I also didn't appreciate spending $24 for continental breakfast and carafe of coffee for one via room service. Also, be prepared to pay $12/ day for parking.

title: Great value and view comes with it
review: We stayed 4 nights at the property on a vacation trip. As priority club members, we got into the room early; Beds very comfortable, view of the gulf beautiful. Beach is 5-10 minute walk, ample public access. A big plus is that you can walk to many restaurants, and to the pier for boat excursions. Few shops within walking distance tough. Free USA today and local papers. Would be nice to have free coffee in the morning in the lobby as many hotels do. Service very good; scheduled rooming cleaning was always on time.  Travelers with rental cars returning to Tampa airport should be aware that there are no gas stations after you cross the bridge. Would be great if hotel knew and shared this info since we got directions to the airport. We were stuck for a huge gas bill because there…

title: Great mini-escape
review: How nice of you to write about your recent stay with us.     We're so grateful you chose our property for your four-day getaway..  Thanks for the compliments that we met our expectations and enjoyed the resort and our great staff.  .  And...we thank you for the suggestion on the rental car gas situation.  We'll be brining this up at a future staff meeting.  We'd love to have you come back again and look forward to that time.  Please stay in touch on our Facebook page and we'll give you lots more reasons to return!  All the best from  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: we blundered into this good place!
review: We visited the Holiday Inn & Suites for the weekend after attending a concert at the Fairgrounds on Thursday night, we drove to the Holiday Inn on Friday morning, and stayed for two nights.  Upon arrival, we were impressed with the grounds and the lobby,  our room was ready at noon, which was a plus.  We headed up to our oceanfront deluxe king on the 5th floor overlooking the outdoor terrace of Jimmy's restaurant.  It was a beautiful view, the room was spacious and clean and included a mini-kitchen area.  Left our luggage and headed straight to the pool and outdoor bar.  Ordered drinks and lunch at the bar.  Our first impression when our food came was not a great one.  For a hotel that promotes trying to save the environment, and conserving water, why would they serve food…

title: Relaxing and fun
review: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us.   We're glad you were able to take a few days to enjoy the beautiful scenery in Florida, and thank you for saying that your overall experience was a favorable one.  We do take comments seriously and hold regular update meetings to voice customer concerns, and we will address the noise issue.  As for the plastic plates and cups, yes...that is because of the deck area; inside diners have regular place settings.  Please know we would welcome your return if you come back this way.  Clearwater has so many things to do.  Were you able to hop on the trolley to go to Pier 60?  It's so easy and right outside our door.  Best wishes - and one more thing - congrats on being World Series Champs!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great place to stay
review: Following a professional conference near Kissimmee, we (an S. C. couple in our 60s) targeted Clearwater Beach for a two-night stay. This place was a lucky find. Sunset views are excellent & with a nice deck and free live music (for tips). No immediate beach. Good restaurant. Free wifi. A neat icecream and snacks shop. If in that area again, we will stay here.

title: Loud music
review: Had a great water view but unknown to us at check in the hotel had musicians playing loud music each and every night for hours ending at 10 pm or later.  This was right outside our balcony to which we couldn't sit out and enjoy.  Even the closed balcony door didn't soften the music.    On top of this we had to pay parking to stay in their hotel.  They were selling their parking places to beach goers.  After a couple of days we moved to another quieter hotel to enjoy the rest of our vacation.

title: Another great stay
review: Dear KYfan224   Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your most recent stay with us.  Providing our guests with the best in accommodations and service is our goal, and we are saddened to hear we failed in this instance.  We do apologize that live entertainment disrupted your stay.  If you would like to discuss your stay further, please email me at cbottger@clearwaterbeachHI.com.  Thank your for sharing your comments and thank you for being our guest.

title: Well worth the money
review: We stayed at this hotel back in the spring and were looking forward to coming back.  Excellent service at check-in, terrific views, wonderful pool.  Restaurant is good, not great but very convienent and staff is friendly.  Walk to the parties at neigboring hotels or take the Jolly Trolley or Free Shuttles (just tip) uptown.  Beach is a short walk but we barely ever left the pool.  The Gulf front suites are effectively two rooms which worked out great for us and the sunsets are perfect.

title: Good hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review your recent stay with us.    We're so pleased you enjoyed your staff and the resort in general.  You are right - the views are pretty spectacular, and our staff appreciate your compliments since customer service is very important to us.    Glad you enjoyed the trolley and were able to explore beautiful Clearwater a bit.  Love to have you come back soon!  Thanks and best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: left me feeling lukewarm
review: We had stayed at the hotel 13 years ago  and promised ourselves that we would go back for our 30th anniversary.  Arriving at the hotel on the 22 Sept 13 we were greeted by a very friendly receptionist. We had been booked through virgin holidays into a city view room, but found when we entered the room and went on to the balcony  that she had upgraded us to a sea view room on the seventh floor.  What a brilliant way to start a 2 week holiday. Room was spotless, air con as in many hotels was noisy but with the view we had from the balcony more than made up for it. Staff were very friendly and the food in Jimmy's was great. Can't wait to go back it was the best holiday ever . Thanks to all the staff for making us feel welcome.

title: Not worth the money.
review: I didn't feel like the staff was friendly. I am a priority club member and stay at many Holiday Inn property. Usually they greet me with a smile and a welcome me with a bottle water. I didn't get either one. I am really disappointed with price I had paid and didn't get what I expected.

title: amazing service
review: Dear Applebottomjean,   Thank you for being an IHG Rewards Club member and for leaving us a feedback.  I am deeply sorry for the unacceptable service you have received from our staff. I assure you that this is not the norm you should expect from our hotel. The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas and take the necessary actions to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future.  Once again, thank you for staying and we all hope to have an opportunity to serve you again on your next future visit.  Sincerely,   Janice A Case Manager  IHGCare

title: Balcony view of gulf and pool with perfect sunsets.
review: The service was amazing, especially awesome Amy and Tom.  The pool area was beautiful with plenty of seating.  Great view of the gulf without a beachfront we were bumped, however it was a very short walk to the beach.

title: It's like being home again
review: Thanks for taking time to review your stay.  We let Tom and Amy know you were pleased with their service!  Glad you enjoyed the resort, our pool, nearness to beach, and stunning views.  Hopefully, these add up to reasons to return soon!  Thanks again and have a great fall.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Beachfront Hotel in Clearwater
review: I had a long weekend to spend with my sister and I chose this hotel to try something different from the Quality Hotel a couple hotels away( wish I loved a month earlier). The room was on 9th floor with a fantastic view. I was surprised that we had an adjoining room with a kitchen, living room and another bathroom. We didn't need that room but the bathroom came in handy! The first night I couldn't sleep so my sister switched beds with me do I could sleep, but then she couldn't. The one bed was like sleeping on the floor!    The hotel isn't on the beach, but its a short walk to beach and pretty close to everything we wanted to do, including Pier 60 and shopping.    It was nice having Jimmy's Fish House right there with live entertainment. The trio appetizer was yummy and the blue…

title: Good Time
review: Very polite and friendly front desk. Our room was great and as we had family staying there also we had a fantastic time poolside with children, grandchildren and other friends and  family !!  Ate on premises several times and food was good. Only bad part of 3 night stay was first night several fire alarms were pulled and my husband and I had to walk down and then back up 6 flights of stairs with 3 grandchildren ( 1, 3 and 7 years old  ) at 3 in the morning. Hotel needs more security perhaps more cameras on each floor would help as guilty parties were not found!!

title: Always relaxing
review: Thanks for taking time to review your September stay.  So glad you were able to enjoy your vacation on Clearwater Beach.  We're happy you enjoyed the family-friendly atmosphere here, plus the resort amenities.  So sorry for the inconvenience of the fire alarm.  That doesn't happen often!  Hopefully you'll be able to join us again, and we invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page.  All the best,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location and very enjoyable stay!
review: Stay last week at Holiday Inn for our third time. Always treated well there and location is great. Just a short walk from Pier 60 on Clearwater Beach. Great pool, tiki bar, gulf side bar & restaurant. Live entertainment.Be sure to get a room with gulf view and balcony. Be prepared for $12/day parking fee. Only complaints we had is every time we stay there seems to be a fire alarm going off. This time it was on our first night luckily at 8PM. Last stay it was at 3AM! By the time we got evacuated we turned around & went back in? Carpet is due for replacement in room & hallways. Would be nice to have a small refrigerator in all rooms. We would highly recommend this hotel. If possible go to the marina and go out on the Seascreamer. It's a very large speedboat that the dolphins love…

title: They forgot to tell me about the $12 fee to park
review: Thanks for taking time to review your September holiday with us.  We're glad you enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere and the resort amenities including the pool, tiki bar and restaurant.   So sorry for the inconvenience of the fire alarm.  That doesn't happen often!  Hopefully you'll be able to join us again, and we invite you to stay in touch on our Facebook page.  All the best,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Clean and attractive
review: We booked this hotel at the last minute as we were actually booked into a HI express over by Busch gardens and their water pipe burst so we checked out. Because of these probelms my husband negotiated a very favourable rate for three nights on a two bedroomed suite for us and our two boys aged 14 and 12. The4 hotel did everything we wanted, from our balcony we had an amazing view4 over the water way and beach. Paying the extra for the beach view rather than the road is well worth it!  They hotel has a great resturant which is run by a seperate company but the food is very good and very large so order much less than you think you need. They also do a great breakfast here too. The sunset is amazing from the bar and they hand out free of charge sunset shots for customers at this…

title: Great trip!
review: We enjoyed our stay very much.  The room was fantastic!  We had a pool side cabana - which is the way we will go for now on!  The room and resort is one you would expect at a high end, much more expensive resort.

title: Relaxing stay
review: Thanks for reviewing your July stay with us.  We're so glad our resort offered you a great place to relax and unwind and that you enjoyed all our features, including the pool and cabanas.  Hopefully you saw a few of our famous sunsets.  Did you know that USA Today reader poll just awarded us #1Place to Watch a Sunset?  Hope you can come back soon.  And...we invite you to stay in touch with us on our Facebook page.  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Amazing views, great location!
review: After a week in Orlando, we drove over to Clearwater Beach to stay at the Holiday Inn.  The greeting at the car park entrance was a little odd with a "wotcha up to", but the receptionist who checked us in was very friendly and gave us the option of which floor we wished to be on.  We opted for the top floor which had a 'city view', but at that height, I had no complaints, with views of the beach, pier and marina.  The room was very clean and well equipped, plug sockets were the only thing that were a little difficult to access particularly when using adapters, but we managed without having to pull the room apart too much.  The pool area was kept immaculate and there were always plenty of sunbeds available near the pool or directly overlooking the bay.  We ate several times at…

title: Incredible Waterfront Property!
review: Thanks for staying with us in August.  We love our U.K. guests!     So glad you were able to visit after Orlando - a lot of our visitors find us the perfect way to unwind and just enjoy the beauty of nature.  We're happy you found us to be in a great location and enjoyed the pool, Jimmy's, and the city view.  Love to have you come back!  In the meantime, please stay in touch on Facebook for reasons to come back!  Kind regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Very clean!
review: We stayed at this hotel for some relaxation time after a very busy week in Orlando. This hotel didn't disappoint! We had a 2 room suit on the top floor (9th) with gulf view. Watching the sunset from the balcony is amazing. We saw wild manatee's, stingray's & dolphin's swim past. Jimmy's is great we are there most nights. Staff were all very friendly. Loved listening to the music round the pool! It hasn't got direct beach access but we never minded walking 5 minutes down the road. We also went up to the pier to watch the sunset from there. Great atmosphere! All in all we would definately recommend this place & we will without doubt be staying here again!

title: Greatest Hotel in Clear Water
review: Beautiful hotel,stuff ,that working there always helpful,always with a smile,rooms clean,cool,,in the lobby they have very tasty complimentary cold lemon water,I fall in love with Florida.I would be the happiest person if I could stay there for the rest aff my life

title: 5 Star Resort!
review: How nice of you to write such a nice review.   We're SO pleased you two enjoyed your getaway from NYC and loved our area.
