The only con is that there isn't direct beach access from the hotel, but it is a short walk away down the road :)  Be sure to try the Bloody Mary from the hotel's restaurant!

title: Holiday Inn
review: Stayed for a few days pre-cruise.  Lovely hotel and made an ideal start to our holiday. The pool is right by the water and very relaxing.  Great food and drinks in Jimmy Iguanas. Would definitely stay here again

title: Really a 4 plus
review: Check in was flawless and I was upgraded to a suite as a priority club member. The setting is beautiful as is the pool and restaurant deck.  Only a very short walk to be on the beach.  No complaints. I would not hesitate to stay again.

title: Yet another fantastic stay!
review: We stayed here from November 23rd and checked on November 25th.  We were greeted by Judy(from Manhattan, NY) at the front desk.  Her superb attitude started that stay on the right foot.  She gave us all kinds of great tips places to eat, along with coupons for same.  We are regulars and she acknowledged that immediately.  We are regulars for a reason.  The TLC that we receive from everyone from front desk personnel to housekeeping personnel and everyone in between is why we keep coming back! The property is well cared for inside and out.  The rooms are excellent and the extra little touches that the housekeeping personnel provide always amaze us and put smiles on our faces.  Checking out was a breeze with Joan and Vilma!  We have our week vacation already booked to stay here…

title: Good location
review: Good hotel with all standard room facilities including wi fi fridge and microwave iron and hair dryer ! In a good location with bars and restraints within walking distance !  No direct access onto the beach but a nice pool area facing to gulf sea!  Lobby bar with outdoor terrace and happy hour 4-7 offering different drinks offers and cocktails and food available is a fantastic place to watch the amazing sunsets !  The beach is within walking distance though with s pure white sandy beach and beds with cabanas !

title: Even Better the Second Time
review: We stayed at this Hotel about 10 years ago and at the time it was pretty good but the rooms, beds and bathrooms were a bit dated. On our recent  trip from Orlando to Miami we decided to do the beach thing with the kids at this hotel, to our surprise it was updated beyond expectations, the rooms were modern including bathroom renovations... "everything was like new". The only big surprise was the small beach at the back was no longer there... it was washed away by one of the hurricames a few years back. That is not a big deal as the best beach in Clear water is within walking distance and the hotel supplies free beach towels at the front desk. This hotel has a great bar where you can relax and have a few drinks while watching the spetacular sunset. Priority Club Members receive a…

title: Great stay at the Holiday Inn
review: We're so pleased you took time to review your recent stay with us - and to learn you were pleasantly surprised after your last visit ten years ago!  Indeed, we have gone under quite a transformation and are always on the lookout to improve the customer experience.  We love our Canadian friends and look forward to having you return again - hopefully not waiting for another 10 years!    Happy Holidays from all of us here...  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: No Cookies
review: we had a gulf view room on the 4th floor it was great.. beautiful sunsets and the music of an evening from Jimmy's fish house was easy listening when sitting on balcony  later in the evening . staff was very friendly and helpful .would definatley go back .

title: Excellent staff, very clean, will be back!!
review: So nice of you to review your recent stay here.  We especially love our international guests and want their experience to be very special after such a long trip!  Glad you were able to have a high-level room and take in the sunsets and gorgeous views.  Our staff will be pleased to hear you found their service to your liking - it's what they really work hard for!  All the best Holiday greetings and hope to see you soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Relaxing stay and Great Customer Service
review: Ok...it is the Holiday Inn.  I didn't expect a five star hotel, but it was just average. Sometimes some fresh baked cookies in the lobby can make even the average hotel great!  But, I will say the staff were great!   Bed was average, but it is time to change the carpets in the rooms.

title: Great stay at the Holiday Inn
review: This was our first stay at the Holiday Inn as we couldn't get into the hotel we usually stay in on Sand Key.   First impressions were good and we were able to check in at 13.00! We had a two room Gulf View suite and couldn't have asked for anything nicer. The suite was very big and comprised a lounge with kitchen area, two bathrooms, two areas for hanging clothes and storing cases and one bedroom with two double beds. We also had a good size balcony with two chairs and a small table. The room was very clean and there were plenty of towels and toiletries provided. The only complaint that we had was that the air con was very noisy and therefore we could not have it on at night. We just cooled the room down as much as we could before going to sleep!  The pool area was large with…

title: FRIENDLY
review: Friendly atmosphere.  Good location with an excellent gulf front view set back off the water by maybe 75 yards. The property runs right up to the water. There is no beach access. You will have to walk about five minutes to get to the white sand beaches through the public access. Nice fitness center. Pool was large and clean. The evening dinner cam with complimentary music every night from 6/7 to 10/11PM. Great time.

title: Great hotel, not beachfront though
review: Thanks so much for taking time to review our resort.  We're glad you found the resort and our staff to your liking - customer satisfaction is so important to us!  Since you live in Jacksonville, hopefully you can make that easy drive back next year for more fun on the west coast - love to have you!  Holiday best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: A Holiday Inn with its own unique flavor.
review: We stayed at this hotel for one night and as priority club platinum members we were upgraded to a 2 room suite. The room faced the street, with a balcony in the bedroom area, and a large picture window in the livingroom area. The room was very nice and included 2 full baths and a little kitchenette. The resort is nice, with a nice pool area, and a good restaurant right on the water. The food was above average and fairly priced for sandwiches. There is no beach on property... it is a 5 minute walk on a sidewalk to a nice public beach. Not sure I would pay 200+ for the room, but it was a nice clean hotel.

title: Great rooms, lots of fun, just awesome
review: Before I can compliment this place, I have to put in a disclaimer that if you're looking for a hotel directly on the beach, this is not the place for you.  The public beaches are a short walk away and directly next door is a pay-only private tiny strip of a beach at Shephard's Beach Resort which offers jet skis and other fun rides.  This hotel is actually on the bay entrance where boats come in and out from the Clearwater docks.  I would not stay here unless you have a view of that bay.  The hotel is literally just a few feet away from the bay's shore and sitting on the balcony enjoying the music from the outdoors restaurant below and watching the water along with the small boats and yachts that enter and leave the bay is about as relaxing as it gets.  I've been here twice and…

title: absolutely amazing - cannot wait to go back
review: amazing hotel - our gulfview suite was beautifull and the view was amazing - staff and cleanliness astounding and the location of the hotel is really good - overlooking the gulf.  Housekeepin are spot on - lovely towel animals for our return each day. Bar/resteraunt - staff very friendly and reasonably  priced - the view and the rooms were awesome and I will definately be saving my pennies to return there hopefully next year.

title: Great hotel great location
review: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us.  We're so glad  you enjoyed the spacious gulfview suite - and the view!  You're right - the towel animals are a big hit!  We certainly review all suggestions to try and improve customer service.  We want your stay to be a positive one!  So pleased you found our staff friendly and efficient and the amenities of the hotel to your liking.  Thanks again and we'll look forward to having you back some day.  Best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Best place for the price on Clearwater Beach!
review: Stayed at hotel 9/16/2012. Excellent front of house service and housekeeping - top notch. The hotel was right on the waterfront and only a short walk to the beach and local seafront bars and restaurants. There was a happy hour 4 to 7 everyday during our stay which was really good. Only two drawbacks - no in room safe and there was a charge of 11 dollars a day + tax for parking.

title: Three's Company
review: Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us.  We do love our U.K. visitors!  We certainly review all suggestions to try and improve customer service.  We want your stay to be a positive one!  So pleased you found our staff friendly and efficient and the amenities of the hotel to your liking.  Thanks again and we'll look forward to having you back some day.  Best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Average hotel with average amenities
review: Just spent 9/22 - 9/24 here in room 714. The location is perfect. Short walk to everything. gulf front balcony was incredible! Service at the hotel is great. The restaraunt is very good and reasonably priced. Tiki bar, pool both great. For a reasonably priced hotel on the water, this is the place! Loved every minute here and will return in the future. The only negative thing during our stay was the door to our room could use a little work. It did not close all of the way by itself. You just had to make sure to close it all of the way each time. Simple fix for maintenance.

title: Great Position
review: On arrival we were given a very warm welcome.  After checking in we went to our room.  Very clean and spacious. Well equipped. Opened the curtains and Wow, what a veiw.  Swimming pool, Palm trees then the sea.   We spent the afternoon on a sunlounger about three feet from the sea watching the Pelicans dive in front of us and then a Pod of Dolphins swim past. Nice bar by the pool which is quite reasonable. Jimmy's restuarant offers a good menu. Hotel is well placed for exploring. The beach is just around the corner from the hotel. My only gripe - having to pay $12.00 dollars a day to leave your car in the hotel car park.  This is a major complaint with most of the guest's

title: Nice ocean view - large rooms with lots of space
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review your recent stay with us.    We're so pleased you enjoyed your visit!  Customer satisfaction is high on our list, so it is nice to hear you found our staff to be helpful and friendly and our resort and amenities to your liking.  Your feedback is very welcomed - we understand that having to charge a parking fee is something of a concern to some of our guests.   Of course, we'd love to have you return soon!  Until then, we invite you to stay in touch with us on our Facebook page:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites, Clearwater Beach.  Best regards,  Christine Bottget

title: Wonderful 25th anniversary
review: We had a gulfview suite with a large balcony. The clean rooms (living room, seperate bed room, 2 baths) were really large and we felt very comfortable. As Priority Club member WLAN was complimentary. Nice pool area, but no direct access to the beach. Within walking distance you can find several restaurants, the beachwalk (in our case with a exhibition of dozens of dolphin sculptures). We would recommend this hotel.

title: Great Accommodations!
review: My husband and I decided to treat ourselves to a more expensive hotel at Clearwater Beach, one of our favorite destinations.  We had a king non-smoking gulfview room with a balcony.  It was wonderful!  The room was beautifully decorated, the bathroom had granite countertops and expensive looking tile and cabinetry and the everything was wonderfully clean.  We loved waking up to the gulfview and the balcony overlooked the pool area ( the pool changed colors at night.)  We enjoyed spectacular sunsets every night, good music in the bar area and a nice restaurant with good food and awesome pina coladas.  The only 2 drawbacks to me were that the bed was pretty hard and we had to pay $12 a night for parking and some nights when we came back to the hotel we had a hard time getting a…

title: Great hotel in excellent location
review: Our first time on the south end of the beach and thoroughly enjoyed it.  Hotel is in a great location,  within walking distance to beach, shops, restaurants, beachwalk and pier.  Hotel is clean and well maintained.  The pool area is great for kids and adults--amazing views--great to see the sunset.  Enjoyed the breakfast buffet--service was excellent.

title: Great Accommodations, Impressed
review: I was very impressed with the Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach. The location was fantastic, right on the water. It was a nice walk to "downtown" Clearwater Beach, and was ideal after having a big seafood meal! The rooms were very clean and updated, the pool area was beautiful and the in-hotel restaurant had excellent fare. The front desk staff was helpful with restaurant and bar recommendations, arranging for cabs, and providing information on airport transportation. I highly recommend this hotel for your next trip to the beach!

title: Nice hotel with fantastic view
review: Thanks ever so much for taking time to review your stay with us!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your stay here from Maryland and thank you for choosing us.  We do have a number of guests who love us because of our central location, just as you have.  And we're pleased you enjoyed the pool, dining and friendly staff.  We hope you'll return again for more fun on Clearwater Beach!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: RNC hotel - Great job!
review: We stayed at this hotel over labour day weekend - the first 2 nights where busy and the 3rd night the hotel was empty!!  We definitely preferred the last night  The hotel staff were ok on arrival,  we paid for an upgrade to a gulf front suite and glad we did - the view was stunning and it was nice to escape up to our balcony for sunset drinks.  The suite was a good size with a good kitchen- beds where very comfy as well. The room was spotless as well.  The pool area was lovely and even when the hotel was full there was plenty of sun loungers. Although not a beach front hotel it was on to the gulf and you could go in swimming from the hotel which was a nice change to the pool.  Everything was within easy walking distance of the hotel which was handy  Parking was 12 dollars a day…

title: We were SO pleased...not one complaint (and we usually stay at fancier places).
review: Thanks for taking time to review your recent stay!  We're honored that you chose us for your holiday and pleased to know you you enjoyed your stay.    Our gulf front suites are very popular and you are right, the views are spectacular.  Thanks for the compliments on our cleanliness - we pride ourselves on making the customer experience as perfect as possible.  Love to see you back again on your next trip to Florida -- in the meantime, very best regards.  Christine Bottger Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach

title: We loved it!!!
review: We stayed 6 nights in this hotel as part of the Republican National Convention and they did a superb job.  The security was tight which always causes issues, but even then everyone was very friendly and helpful.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  Everything was efficient and well-done.  Rooms were very comfortable.  Just can't say enough good things about the whole experience.  The Tampa Bay RNC volunteers were just great.  The restaurant was good and very relaxing - good food.  We had a problem with our tv one night and there was a technician at our door within minutes.

title: very nice hotel, great location
review: First thing you notice is the hotels location, perfect right next to the beach.  Pool was really good to and all the staff very friendly. Parking on hotel free.  Rooms and the rest of the hotel really clean. We were at the front of the hotel and had no noise at all. Thought for the price we paid for a family of 4 we got a very good deal. would recommend.

title: Average Hotel In A Nice Location!
review: So pleased you took time to review your recent stay here and to learn you enjoyed your stay.  We do have a very nice location, making it easy to experience all that Clearwater Beach has to offer.    Glad your family enjoyed the pool, accommodations, and friendly staff - we strive to make your vacation a true memory!  Hope to see you back again,  Very best regards  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: very nice hotel.
review: Stayed here on the 20/08 to 25/08/12 as we have previously stayed at this hotel and knew what to expect. Not as classy as the Hyatt but then you ae not paying the high prices although if you look around , you may find a good deal and pay just a little more than the Holiday Inn! This hotel is much better than the motels you see in the area, inside and out! Nothing dramatic has changed, Double room is fresh & clean although bed this time a little uncomfatable and air conditioning noisy! Pool area is clean and by the water front which is good if you just want to just chill out and relax and look out to the sea. Unfortunately this hotel still continues to charge for parking which is bizarre as you need to park there to stay there if travelling by car!

title: Excellent Again!
review: Thanks so much for reviewing your stay here.  We look at each review and it gives us insights as to how we can continue to improve our guests' experience.  Thanks for the compliments on our location, affordability and cleanliness....our staff will be pleased to hear they met your expectations.  We do hope you'll find time to return again and we are happy to give you lots of reasons to return!  Best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great views
review: We stay here on a recent trip to Florida. When we arrived The gentelman at the front desk up graded me to a poolside room for being a priority club member. That room had an awesome view of the ocean. Nice pool and the staff was very friendly.

title: Views and location fantastic
review: This hotel has great suites separated by a door, almost like having two rooms except the second room is just a living space with microwave, fridge, sofa bed, twble and chairs, second bathroom etc. Really great for a family. The beds, pillows, linens etc were new and nice. Bathrooms seemed to have been renovated quite recently. Nice sized balcony off the bedroom side. The only complaint Is that the sofa bed was very worn looking and not clean enough for me. We didn't even consider opening it so don't know about the quality of the bed in it. The rest of the suite seemed very clean.   The staff in the restaurant and bar were all very friendly and efficient. I loved the Crane who hung out in the restaurant at breakfast, although not everyone would! The food was just okay. Best Pina…

title: "it was just ok"
review: Needed a place to stay in Clearwater Beach for 1 night (August 11th)and found this Holiday Inn to have a room at a reasonable price.  We are members of the priority club and when we checked in we were upgraded to a suite.  The person at the front desk (I don't remember his name) was not welcoming or friendly at all.    The rsuite they gave us was with the standard furniture, we had 2 microwaves & 2 refrigerators, 2 flat screen TV's which was very nice.  However,  the air conditioning in room with the couch & table was great - kept that room cool.  In the bedroom, it was so loud and the air hardly came out it.  Terrible nights sleep because of it.  It was HOT in that room.  This hotel definitely needs a renovation - but, it was clean and the bed was very comfy.  Went to the pool…

title: Worst stay ever, my vacation was ruined.
review: Our room was charged 3 times if it weren't for the fact that our bank sends us notifications they would not have corrected their mistake. When we asked to speak to the manager that authorized the extra chargers he had no explanation and wouldn't even look us in the face. They offered no apology nor did they seem to care at how outraged I was. There's other hotels here in the same price range choose any other one or even pay more and spare yourself the headache.

title: Great Deal
review: Dear Bajanas,  Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We’re sorry about the billing confusion which was unacceptable. I assure you the feedback of our hotel will be reviewed and most certainly forwarded to the appropriate departments. We take  the confidence our guests place in us very seriously and work diligently to rectify any unsatisfactory experiences. Thank you again for your comments.   We hope you give us a chance in the future to show you how great our hotel is.  Sincerely,  Orlando A. Case Manager IHGCare

title: Mom & Daughter Trip
review: My boyfriend and I are 23 and 25 years old. We booked our stay here through Allegiant and got the hotel, air plane tickets and rental car as a package. I was very pleased. The hotel staff was very informative about places to go and things to do. She told us about Florida Free Rides, which was awesome. We used them every day! The room was nice. We were on the 7th floor and had a balcony. Off in the distance you could see the ocean. It was still very nice. The air conditioner was VERY loud when it came on. I was expecting that after reading other reviews.  The pool was awesome...beautiful views. We spent a lot of time down there. We never had trouble finding lounge chairs or a spot at the tiki bar. The bar tenders were all very nice and sociable. We did however stay Sunday through…

title: Amazing Property!  Great Value!
review: From the time of our arrival we knew that this was going to be a great stay!  During check in we asked if we could have a higher floor then the one that we originally were assigned.  Without hesitation the front desk said sure, and put us on the 5th floor.  We did not have an ocean view room but the one that we did have you could stand on the balcony and look in both directions at the ocean.  The room was extremely clean.  As we are frequent travelers we always pull the beds out and look, and I am pleased to say that we found nothing!  The housekeeping staff seems to keep things very neat and orderly we were very impressed.  The pool area was very nice and clean and the pool was very inviting with plenty of places to sun bathe and just watch the boats go by or have a drink.  You…

title: Very clean! Courteous and helpful staff.
review: Stayed here for ten nights starting 4th August with my daughter.  Negatives first (mostly minor things); maid didnt come to clean the room when expected or came at inconveniant times; however, room was always cleaned and if there were any concerns, the front desk sorted this out. We stayed in a Gulf front suite with 2 rooms; the bedroom and a living area with microwave and Fridge. Air conditioning unit was noisy but we still slept quite well; the most annoying thing was the units outer part blowing out hot air on the balcony; it wasnt a major problem but we didnt really sit out on the balcony because of this. Would have been good if Fridge had a freezer section and better if there was a kettle rather than just the coffee maker; these are small things really but would have made…

title: Fab time at the Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach Florida
review: After a week in Kissimmee doing the fun parks we wanted a chill out week at the beach and this is exactly what we got :-). From the minute we checked in we knew we would have a great time. As a regular traveller I am a Platinum member of the IHG group Priority Club Loyalty scheme and was treated to an upgrade to a king kids suite on arrival (my family was delighted as I had booked a standard room using my points.)  The room was great, as was the pool area and Jimmy's fish bar and restaurant.   The pool is open until 11pm which is great fun for the family (security closes the pool at 11pm prompt.) Plenty of sun beds around the pool and no bed reservations allowed. Pool side towels are provided by the hotel and the pool is really warm and inviting as is the sea. Staff very…

title: Look elsewhere
review: How nice of you to take time to write a review following your recent stay with us!  We're so pleased you enjoyed the accommodations (yes, our suites are so comfortable) and the pool, Jimmy's, and other amenities.  Glad you were able to enjoy the area attractions such as Pier 60, Winter, and of course -- Clearwater Beach.  Love to see you returning again - please stay in touch and visit our Facebook page as well!  Have a nice summer.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Lack of Parking & Customer Service
review: Parking is extra?  Parking is extra?!  Parking is extra!  They gave me a drink voucher...for one?  No bargain for the money.  No amenities for the money.  The location is all it has going for it.  Close walk to the beach.  Rooms are just ok.

title: Recommend. 2nd stay. Stayed 2-9Aug2012. Suite. A/C very noisey! HDTV too dark most channels to view.  They charge ur rm for park
review: My favorite place to vacation in the summer!!!  The beach is great and a two block walk away.  Love to just hang out at hotel's Jimmy's Restaurant (w in/outdoor seating) & Iguana Bar+Tiki Bar at outdoor hugh pool (closes at 11:00pm).  All are right on Gulf of Mexico w jetski & parasailing $65 600ft..more for greater heights, available at hotel.  The food & beverages are exceptional and room service until 10:00pm.  Spa on site includes messages, mani/pedicures, waxing, & facials.  Taxi to Tampa area was $65..local rides on Clearwater $20.  Clearwater/St Pete Airport 1/2 hr ride from hotel.  Great for whole family!

title: Would not stay here again
review: Thanks so much for reviewing your second stay with us - we love repeat visitors!  So glad you enjoyed the resort facilities, including Jimmy's, the pool, the water activities and close location to all the fun in Clearwater.  FYI, the next time you come, you might want to look into SuperShuttle that runs from the Airport to the resort for about half of what a taxi would cost.  We look forward to your third visit - as soon as you find time!  Enjoy your summer!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Highly Recommended - great hotel, restaurant & ammenities
review: I love Holiday Inn hotels. They are reasonably priced and offer quality rooms. Not true for this location! We stayed in a room on the 5 floor and the toilet seat war cracked. We only had two bath towels and one hand towel innthe bathroom so we had to call for more. The rugs are fiflty and door was not sealed so at night you would get a ton of light coming into the room from the hall. It was so disturbing. The pool area is small and crowded. Last but not least parking was a hassle. I am giving it 3 stars only because the staff at the hotel is great. Judy at the front desk was fabulous and very informative.  Also the Fish House which is located inside the hotel is a decent resturant for breakfast and dinner.

title: I had garbage view from my room.
review: We stayed here two night in late July/early August and were very pleased - especially since we had been booked at another hotel that ended up being filthy and had bugs. We called the hotel about 9am looking for a new place and they told us to come right over. This hotel was not right on the beach but has a seawall and is right where the beach turns into the seawall. It was a very short walk and is worth the little bit extra to stay here because of the quality of the place you are getting. It was only $40 more a night for the filthy place we had been at the night before.  The place if very clean and modern and full of great ammenities. We used the pool many times, the laundry room and the kids loved the game room. The ladies in the gift shop were so nice and the restaurant was…

title: Good stay for our visit to see CMA & Winter.
review: Thank you so much for sharing your experience from your recent visit.  We're so pleased you had a great time because customer satisfaction is so important to us.    Glad you enjoyed the hotel amenities, including our fun gift shop and game room.  Our pool is a magnet for guests - most never want to leave it!  We'd welcome having you return whenever you have time - and thanks so much again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Relaxing
review: Most important, the hotel is not on the beach. There is a sea wall and great view of the beach...but no beach access. However, the beach is only a short walk away. The hotel is clean and housekeeping does an outstanding job. All of the employees were pleasant and customer service was great. The restaurant is good...I ate a hamburger so I couldn't go wrong with that. There is nightly entertainment on the outdoor patio of the restuarant, beginning at sunset  Awesome tropical feel and really enjoyable entertainers. The pool area was nice and well kept. Overall, the atmosphere was relaxing and low key.

title: Good hotel in a nice location
review: Thanks so much for reviewing your recent stay!  We're so pleased you enjoyed your visit to Clearwater and found our property to be inviting, a great place to relax, and close to all the attractions of Clearwater.  Sure would love to have you back again - please watch for our special offers and deals!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: I stayed here for 10 nights in July in a gulf front room on the 7th floor. The room was very clean, furnished to a good standard and the view from the balcony was excellent. The pool area was always clean and tidy and the separate pool deck was a quieter place to relax on a sun bed, whilst watching the boats pass by. The hotel is only a couple of minutes walk to the main beach, the pier and to several restaurants and shops. All of the staff were very friendly and helpfull and I would certainly stay here again

title: Acceptable but nothing special
review: Thank you so much for taking time to share your recent visit with us.  We're so pleased you enjoyed your 10-night stay - and since you came all the way from the UK, glad you were able to rest up before your return.  We do receive many compliments on our pool - everyone seems to gravitate towards it at one time or another during the day.  Happy to know you liked your view from the 7th floor!  Hope to see you return again - soon!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Average...
review: I stayed here on 1st and 2nd of July with my wife and daughter. We were allocated a suite upon check in which was furnished to a very decent standard and spotlessly clean. Having stayed in Clearwater before we found the location to be excellent with restaurants, beach and pier within easy walking distance. Would certainly stay here again.

title: No beach access Plus high rates!!!
review: This was our first trip to Clearwater Beach Florida.  We chose Holiday Inn Hotel and Suites because a friend recommended it to us. We had envisioned being able to walk directly on the beach from the hotel.  We were greatly disappointed.  This hotel is waterfront but not beach accessible. You are charged $12 a day for parking at the hotel and to park at the beach is $16 a day.  Then this hotel opens their parking to the public for $20 a day. That means if you leave you may or may not get a parking space again.   Walking to the beach with our 7 year old daughter plus carrying a ton of beach stuff in the hot sun was not what I had planned.  A person could stay at a nicer location at half the cost especially since this hotel is not ocean front.

title: NEVER STAY HERE AGAIN!
review: My husband and I stayed here on our honeymoon. We researched many locations and hotels and decided this Holiday Inn was the best choice. We were terribly wrong! On our first night we asked the hotel to bring us more pillows. After waiting for more than an hour and being jet legged we fell asleep. We don't even know if they even tried to deliver them. The next day we went down to the pool area. We noticed there weren't any towels so we asked the front counter if they could re-stock them. They told us they would let housekeeping know. After swimming for a good hour we decided to sunbath and when we went for towels there still wasn't any. We asked the counter and they told us they were in the dryer and they would be ready in 20 minutes. After another hour it started to rain so on…

title: Best stay in Clearwater!!!
review: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to convey your comments regarding your current stay with us.  Your willingness to share your thoughts with us is genuinely appreciated.    We rely on you, our guest to let us know how we are doing and how we can better meet your needs.  Your comments provide a stepping stone towards improvement of our services.   We do apologize that some of our amenities were not available to you at your time of need due to the weather, however we would be more than happy to assist in making appointments for you for those amenities in the coming days. It is true that our Tiki Bar was closed yesterday due to the weather, please note our Jimmy Iguana's Bar Is open everyday and does provide our guest with an outdoor seating area.    Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  I am confident our team has rectified or will be rectifying them now.  We appreciate your business and hope that the remainder of your stay as well as the weather will be enjoyable.    Sincerely,   Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Simply The Best in Clearwater
review: My husband and I made this trip with our two daughters. Check in was fast and the clerk, Patty, was awesome. I was given a voucher for a free drink and for the kids to eat free. There's a gameroom on site but the kids didn't get a chance to enjoy it. The beach was close, not a far walk at all. To be clear, none of the hotels are directly on the beach in Clearwater. When the tides are low, you can actually walk down some steps right outside of the hotel and chill beachside. I thought that was awesome. The beds were comfy, the room was clean and smelled really nice. The bathroom is updated and stylish. We are a family who travels a lot and found our stay to be comfortable and enjoyable. The only thing I didn't like was the $12 parking fee, but most of the hotels charge a parking…

title: Best Holiday Inn Resort
review: Thank you so much for writing such a lovely review of your family's stay with us!  We're so pleased your youngsters had fun and that you found our rooms and facilities to meet your expectations.     We'll be sure to say hello to Patty for you - she's such a great person!  Hopefully we can see you again soon -- in the meantime, we welcome you to join our Facebook Page at Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites - Clearwater Beach.  We have a great group of regular participants and we keep everyone updated with reasons to come back!  Thanks again - all the best...  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: After much research, I was very satisfied.
review: I researched many hotels in the area.  This hotel lives up to expectations.  The front desk staff are not very friendly or welcoming, but the rest of the staff was excellent.  We had an ocean front suite and the views were incredible.  The suites are actually two rooms that are connected but they result in a much larger area to eat and watch tv.  There is a very short walk to the beach which was no big deal.  Turn down service and towel animals left in our room daily.  I would definitely stay again.

title: Relaxing Vacation
review: Thank you so much for your kind review following your stay here.  You sure had a long way to travel from New Mexico, and we're glad you enjoyed our comfortable rooms (and the towel animals!), the beautiful views and the amenities around the resort.  Customer service is very important to us so your feedback will be share with our staff.  Thank you again and have a wonderful summer.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Really really like coming back to this hotel!
review: I loved this hotel. The rooms were clean and spacious. The service was great. The restaraunt gives you huge portions of food at a reasonable price. The atmosphere was relaxing with the live music and the boats passing by. I definitely want to return.

title: Great stay
review: Thank you so much for such a nice review of our property following your stay here -- all the way from the U.K.!  We're so pleased you enjoyed our resort and found everything to your liking.  You are right - Jimmy's Fish House portions are pretty super-sized!  We look forward to your next visit and - in the meantime - would love to have you join us on Facebook:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites - Clearwater Beach.  We have a great group of regulars and you'd be most welcome to comment!  All the best,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Excellent location, great service
review: Stayed here for a few nights with my adult daughter and grandchld. We used my priority rewards points and upgraded to a gulfview suite for $50.00 more per night.  Had a lovely room with two queen beds and a nice room with a pull out sofa bed.  Ample room, 2 bathrooms that were perfect.  The restaurant is delicious and the staff is super nice. They have a eating area out by the water that the kids love.  Pool is wonderful and it changes colors at nights.  Kids love that too.  The only thing that I did not like was the adults who made out in what was supposed to be a baby pool.  Management is very good about making the rounds by the pool and telling adults they can't drink their cocktails in the pool, but they need to chase the adults out of the tiny baby pool.  I mean, really,…

title: never again with holiday inn
review: the hotel was over booked.requested a room with a balcony the front desk staff was not helpful.the hotel is .5 mile walk to beach.the maid service was very good.the hotel is expensive and not worth it.there is a $12 a day  charge for parking on top of your room charge.

title: good for locals...
review: Dear jimntray,  We appreciate that you took the time to review our hotel. We are glad to know that our housekeeping service was able to meet your needs. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations as well as competitive rates to the area. It is disappointing to know you did not enjoy your overall experience with us and regrettable you were not satisfied with the service you received from our front desk. I will make sure that your feedback will be reviewed and be forwarded to the appropriate departments. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you would give us another chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  Sincerely,  Zelyn N Case Manager IHG Care

title: Not your run down beachfront hotel
review: i am a local and staying at this hotel in particular a couple nights is something almost everybody does, no it is not on the beach but the beach is a short walk away, and the pool is beautiful we had a gulf view room which did look at the gulf just don't look down where you will find the top of a roof oh well. we had room service twice with no problems and the restaurant was a bit of a disaster see below the room was very spacious and comfortable the free internet connection was great and i had no problem video chatting with friends. me and my mother decided to have fun in the game room and you get ticketsd to trade for prizes much like a chuckie cheese i don't remember how many tickets we had but when we told the lady how much we spent on the games she let us have more prizes…

title: will not stay here again
review: I recently had the opportunity to attend an annual meeting at the Holiday & Suites in Clearwater Beach. Many beachfront hotels tend to get a run down look since they know they will continue to get business just because of their location.   This is not the story at the Holiday inn & Suites. Rooms are very clean and up to date. The restaurants on location serve a very good selection of fish, beef and poultry.   A great family atmosphere.   My only criticism is they time it took to check in. Three clerks at the front desk but two were on the phone the whole time I was in line.

title: Amazing fantastic time. Property and staff exceeded my expectations!
review: How nice of you to take time to write such a nice review of your recent stay with us - thank you!  We're so glad you found us to be all you wanted for your vacation at the beach - and seeing that you're a Floridian -- maybe we can entice you to come back again soon!  We'd love to have you follow us on Facebook at Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach - post photos and jump into the conversation whenever you can!  Thanks so much again for your kindness!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Worst hotel experience ever.
review: This hotel is a nightmare, and it is not inexpensive. The parking is horrible, rooms smell like mildew, everything is overpriced. I was extremely disappointed.

title: Its showing its age
review: Dear vpurdy,  Thank you for taking time to post your comments. Please accept my sincerest apology for the room and parking issues you experienced. We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.  Again, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to give feedback.   Pam G. Case Manager IHGCare

title: We will not stay again
review: OK stay.  The family suite overlooks the air condiiioners on the south side of the building- third floor.  You can't use the balcony due the the room AC unit blowing hot air across the balcony.  Positive - it dries the swimsuits!!!  Overall, it just wasn't what I was expecting.  Huge letdown from my expectation since I have been here prior... but never in the family suite.  So Id go back for the regular hotel rooms on the upper floors.  The family suite is the red headed step child of this hotel.    Room service was good.  She made a cute litle elephant out of towels which my two year old really liked.    Like last time, I'll say that the pool is very deep for kids.  But there is a small mini pool if you want to let your kids soak their toes.  So nothign has changed there.     …

title: Great hotel located right on the Clearwater Beach
review: The hotel is clean and well located,it is in a walking distance from the beach.But we didn´t like it at all. When we were booking the room there were two options: with or without breakfast, we booked the option with breakfast included which was 20 dolars more per room per day, when we arrived they said that the breakfast was included only until those 20 dolars per room, I though it was a joke, why I should pay in advance 20 dolars if the breakfast is not a buffet? it doesn´t make sense. There isn´t any advantage by booking the room with breakfast included. The staff serving the breakfast was very rude, not friendly at all, work very slow and made us feel really bad about staying at this hotel.

title: Beautiful stay
review: Dear Sarah K,  We appreciate your feedback regarding our property. We are pleased you enjoyed our convenient location and the cleanliness of our hotel. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. I'm sorry to see you received hotel staff service that was less than satisfactory. The feedback we receive from our valued guests like you, enables us to target problem areas and take the necessary actions to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future.   Thank you again for your review. If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty.  Sincerely,   Zelyn N. Case Manager IHG Care

title: Perfect hotel, but staff was not too friendly.
review: We've stayed at this hotel before, so we knew what to expect. It's very clean and its in a great location, walking distance from the beach, gift shops, and restaurants. The only complaint was the staff was not very friendly and weren't willing to meet our needs. Priority club members should be treated better than we were, but the hotel is fantastic.

title: Clear choice in Clearwater
review: Dear Tatortot9620,  Thank you so much for being a Priority Club member and for your review of our hotel. We are so happy to hear you liked the cleanliness and the great location of our property. We are deeply sorry for the experience you had with our staff. We are hospitality professionals who pride ourselves on delivering world class service. For that reason, the comments are troubling and will certainly be looked into. I assure you that every comment, no matter how small, is taken very seriously. We hope to get a chance of hosting you again and show you how great our hotel is. Thank you for staying with us.   Sincerely,  Anthony M Case Manager IHGCare

title: This place delivers!
review: The hotel is well located with wonderful views out over the gulf. The rooms were large, spacious, and clean. I was apprehensive to find an A/C unit outside the room door but i could not hear a thing. Just really cold when you stepped out in th morning lol. The bathrooms were updated and tastefully decorated. The pool area was beautiful and the hotel is located within walking distance to the white sandy beach. To maximise those views it is worth upgrading to the the gulf front/view rooms to avoid a view of the carpark and road. Jimmys restaurat and bar (waterfront on site) was relaxed and a great location to grab a cold beer and watch the wonderful sunsets and leisure boats pass by. We only stayed for two nights but really managed to capture the unique clearwater feel. A nice…

title: Feels like home!
review: My wife and I booked this hotel through Allegiant and this is one of the few times in my life I can honestly say I got great value for my money. The hotel was beautiful, staff were friendly and more than accommodating and Jimmy's Fish House...excellent! We cannot wait to return!

title: A holiday gateway ideal destination
review: We stayed at Holiday Inn & Suites from 5/25/-5/28 - Memorial Day Weekend!  Despite the throng of people, EVERYONE from the front desk staff to Linda and Patricia's amazing housekeeping staff toTanny & Kim at the bar/restaurant always were gracious and ALWAYS had a smile and a welcome greeting. We have stayed here five times since Labor Day 2011 and it's always like coming home the minute we walk into the lobby!  Thank you so much!  We look forward to staying again soon!

title: Great hotel and great value
review: I really liked this hotel. close to the beach and many attractions.  Popular night club next door, also has a great water front bar, nice pool and good restaurant.  My view i could see the intercoastal and the Gulf of Mexico.  My room was HUGE. Ate in the restaurant/bar 3 times and it was really good.  The place is a popular spot for Phillies fans since Clearwater is the spring training grounds of the Philadelphia Phillies.

title: Beautiful hotel, good location
review: We stayed in a room with a view of the ocean and balcony. It was a beautiful hotel with a nice restaurant overlooking the ocean. The pool was nice and warm and the view was just incredible. Pool bar, small store and a short walk to the beach. Although the ocean is right next to the property, there is no beach there, you have to walk a block or two to get to the beach, but it was an easy walk. There are actually no hotels in this area on the beach, but across the road from the beach is as close as you can get. Our room did not have a microwave or fridge, and the rooms were a little small, but very nicely decorated.

title: Wonderful place & wonderful people
review: Stayed here again in May and had another great stay. Guest Service Manager JR Patel got us the room we prefer. The music & view from our balcony were great. Of course the dolphins swimming by while we were eating lunch and dinner at Jimmy's made it an even more memorable stay.  Wife and I (60ish) walked the approximately 1000' to the beach and then along the "Beach Walk" to pier 60. Plenty of places to sit and rest if it gets to be too much for you and it's nicely landscaped. This time we took the trolly for the tour of the area and I got to see a lot more by not having to drive.

title: Very nice
review: I would stay here again. Beautiful sunsets, very clean but the a/c sounded like an airplane taking off. Told the front desk and the only thing they said/ did was tell us they would mention it to the engenieers.

title: Great hotel; will return when visiting Clearwater Beach
review: Dear Kimberly C,  Thank you for your comments. It is delightful to hear that you would consider staying at our property again. Please accept my sincerest apologies for the air conditioning issues you experienced. We will address these points and I hope when you return you will see the improvements made.   Sincerely,   Pam G. Case Manager IHGCare

title: Excellent stay!
review: We recently stayed at this hotel and were pleasantly surprised.  The suites were large, spacious, and clean.  The bathrooms were updated and tastefully decorated.  The pool area was beautiful and the hotel is located within walking distance to the beach.  The hotel restaurant was nice and kids ate free which was great for our family.  Will definitely be back.

title: Perfect hotel for our family vacation!
review: I have been hesitant to stay at Holiday Inn properties lately but my husband had some points that we redeemed for this vacation to Clearwater beach. This hotel is beautiful and is in a perfect location. You can walk to the beach, restaurants and a great putt putt course. It is worth the extra cost to upgrade to a gulf view suite, we have enjoyed waking up and looking at the beautiful view while scanning the water for dolphins ( we saw two) . The suite gives you an extra room with a fridge and microwave, as well as a sitting area and an extra full bathroom so our family of four doesn't feel cramped at all.   The staff is very pleasant and the hotel itself is very clean. The pool area is wonderful, it sits right on the water so you can see the passing boats while at the pool. It…

title: Party area
review: If your idea of a good time is a loud party town, then this hotel and area is for you. The Holiday Inn itself is probably one of the better hotels on this strip of clearwater beach. Complaints would be the loud music on the pool deck that played late into the hours of the night, making it hard to sleep. Another big complaint would be the drunken young people making their ways to their rooms at all hours of the night, screaming in the halls. I must give accomadations to Joan- behind the front desk. She was an angel in disguise for us on this trip. She accomodated our group by going above and beyond for us several times. Other then her, out trip was less then memorable. The carpeting was stained in our rooms and it smelled of smoke upon arrival. Breakfast was outragously priced.…

title: Beautiful Hotel, excellent front desk staff.
review: Dear Rabs M,  Thank you for taking the time to convey your comments regarding your recent experience with us. We were very glad to read your compliment about our front desk clerk, Joan, she is one of our best. We are hospitality professionals who pride ourselves on delivering good service and are happy doing so. I am sorry for any inconvenience the noise from the music on the pool deck as well as from some of the other guests caused you.  I hope that this will not deter you from staying with us again.  If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty.  Sincerely,  Connie D Case Manager IHGCare

title: Great place by the water.
review: Very nice facility with a lot of activities.  Pool and outdoor bar overlook the water and it is a very short walk to the beach. We arrived early and the staff went out of their way to care for us until the room was ready.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: LOVED this hotel....from the location to the rooms to the pool everything was great!!  location just a short walk to the beach and pier 60 the hotel was a fantastic find!! the pool area made you feel like you were at a resort with a tiki bar and great service!!  the rooms were nice and clean and the staff was friendly.   They have a nice restaruant that features a live band, the food was ok

title: Great Location
review: My friend and I decided to go away for a few days we wanted someplace to relax have a little fun and be by the water..... Exactly what we got. We went with Allegiant Air for a Thur to Sun Getaway May 3rd to 6th (like my friend said it was 2 days 16 1/2 hours once we got there)lol we made the best of the time. Hotel:   The staff are very friendly our check-in was a breeze the hotel has a nice restaurant downstairs with bands there is also a bar area by the pool (which we enjoyed) this hotel is like a mini resort.  ROOM:   We had a reg hotel room with a microwave, mini fridge, coffee maker. The room was a nice size for us and CLEAN...(just wish my friend didn't snore) hehehe... LOCATION:   You can't beat the location you can walk down to the pier to many restaurants and shopping.…

title: Great Location, Good Value
review: What a wonderful review, and we certainly thank you for taking time to write it!  We're so pleased you and your friend enjoyed your stay, including your convenient flight via Allegiant into St.Pete/Clearwater Intl. Airport.   We'll make sure George receives your compliment, and so glad you enjoyed Jimmy's Fish House and the live entertainment.  Also, we're glad we met your expectations for friendly staff, cleanliness, rooms and central location.  If you'd care to, please follow our Facebook page at Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach for lots of reasons to come back -- and we hope it will be soon!  Many thanks again and have a great summer...  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great experience for what you pay. Superb location.
review: Stayed there because they had no rooms available at the hotel where the conference I was attending was located. Great last minute prices, wonderful breakfast at the restaurant and a very convenient location. Rooms are modern and well maintained, with all the amenities one could wish for at a premier Florida holiday spot!

title: Ohhh really!!
review: What a wonderful review and we certainly thank you for it!  You certainly had a long trip from Palau and we're pleased we met your expectations as to friendly staff, convenient location and pleasing accommodations.  We welcome you to join our Facebook page:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach to stay in touch with everything going on in Clearwater.  We'd love to have you back soon!  Have a great summer...  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Better than expected
review: A friend was down in Clearwater for a class and invited me to join her. The room was fully paid for so why not? I was most pleasantly surprised at the overall upkeep of this hotel. Toward the southernmost point of Clearwater Beach, the hotel is in a good spot close enough to everything but just far enough away from the traffic and noise of the central strip. The pool was crowded every day but just a 5 minute ride away from a beautiful beach in Sand Key Park. We had a King room with a mini kitchenette including snall fridge, sink and dishware and cutlery for 4. It was nice to come back from the beach and sit on the balcony with my friend having a glass of wine or beer brfore heading out to dinner. The Tiki bar by the pool was just beautiful to sit and enjoy a drink while watching…

title: HOLIDAY INN CLEARWATER BEACH
review: Nice hotel with great location. Exeptional housekeeping staff. We were on the 7th floor, gulf front, great views and still private. The pool/bar area was fine, bartender not very friendly. We ate at the restaurant several times, good food and drinks but watch the prices. We were charged 3 different prices for the same dish. The peel and eat shrimp came in a huge glass and was great, Friday afternoon it was $9.95, Sunday evening it was $14.95 and tuesday evening it was $9.50  We were there the 1st week of March, it was crowded but not noisy. Would love to go back in off season.

title: very nice and clean!!!
review: Thanks so much for taking time to write a review on our property.  We're so pleased you and your Dad could take a getaway break from Canada to visit us!    Happy you found our resort to be restful and relaxing and that you enjoyed your rooms and surroundings.  We hope you'll return again soon.  We also invite you to follow our Facebook page:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach for updates and reasons to come back!  Have a great summer!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: girls getaway
review: Had a little trip me and my Dad !!! Relaxing place...just a few minutes walk to the beach !!! Very nice beach...rooms are nice and clean !!! The food was good at the motel..but wonderfull at the I HOP .....pancakes !!!!!!

title: Holiday inn Clearwater
review: We are so pleased that you and your Dad were able to take a break from Canada and visit us here in Clearwater Beach.  Glad you found us relaxing and restful and that you enjoyed your room and the hotel's features.  Hope you can return again soon - and thanks again!  We invite you to follow us on Facebook at Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach for updates!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great location in Clearwater Beach for Families
review: Family of 4 spent 5 nights at this hotel in Clearwater Beach in March.  This hotel is in a great location but not directly on the beach.  A short walk to beautiful Clearwater Beach, Pier 60 and many good restaurants.  Stayed on Reward Nights and were updated to a suite.  Really appreciated the extra space and kitchenette with 2 children along.  Room was clean and comfortable although the couch was quite faded.  Pool area was clean and enjoyable.  The gift shop was doing a swift sale in floatation devices for children as the shallow area of the pool was 4.5 feet deep.  Great pool service for drinks and snacks.  Ate at Jimmy Dee's one night.  Food was ok but the service was slow.  Word of warning : bring your own beach towels as HI does not supply them from this location.  Would…

title: Nice hotel in a great location
review: Thank you so much for reviewing your March stay with us -- and we're pleased you and your family enjoyed your stay in Clearwater!  You are right - our location is just perfect for so many fun things Clearwater has to offer.  Glad you enjoyed the spaciousness of the suites and the convenience of our kitchenette.  We strive very hard to make our guests' stays enjoyable and we hope we have succeeded.  We would be pleased to have you visit again....and until that time, please keep in touch with us on our Facebook page, Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach.  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Family of 4 at Holiday Inn & Suites Clearwater Beach
review: I stayed one night in December 2011 with my family. The hotel is in a great location, with spacious rooms, good breakfast options, even if there was lots of confusion around the coupons for the breakfast that supposedly was included in the room. As it turned out it was just breakfast for 2 adults that was included, even though the room was booked for 2 adults and 2 kids..... We enjoyed that stay and will probably go back.

title: Perfect base for stay
review: We just returned from FL and had a great time in Clearwater Beach.  While I did like the hotel very much, there were definitely pros and cons.  Pros:  big rooms and bathrooms - we had a 1 BR suite with fold out couch (queen sized!) in the living room area; great location - we could walk almost everywhere; room was clean when we arrived; having the fridge, microwave and sink was great for leftovers; the restaurant had a "kids eat free" deal, which was a huge bonus; the breakfast buffet was very good;  pool was great - warm and with tremendous views of the Gulf - we even saw some dolphins on our last day while sitting on the sundeck.  Cons:  noisy - we were woken up on Sat. night by the Bachelorette party across the hall from us, and on Sunday night by people outside leaving the…

title: Great Experience
review: We're so pleased you took time to review your recent stay with us.  Glad you enjoyed the spaciousness of our 1-bedroom suite, and our kids eat free program.  You are right, our location is so easy to access all the fun things to do in Clearwater Beach, either by walking or trolley.  For sure we will call attention to your comment regarding housekeeping's early hours - comments such as yours help us to continue to improve our customer experience.  We invite you to join our Facebook page at: Holiday Inn Clearwater Beach Hotel & Suites - post any photos you'd like to share, feel free to comment, and stay in touch until your next visit -- which hopefully will be soon!  All the best and thanks again,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Thank You!
review: We booked our family vacation at a "resort" across the street from the Holiday Inn.  Upon arrival we were sorely disappointed as the "resort" was awful.  We walked across the street to the  Holiday Inn and were assisted by the Manager On Duty, JR.  He was wonderfully helpful.  He worked hard to find us a room with attached suite that was perfect for our 6 party group.  We were so thankful as it was Easter week and the beach was packed! The view was amazing.  The pool was beautiful, staff was awesome and rooms were SO CLEAN.  The food and drinks were top notch and the service was even better.  We would highly recommend this place for any multi age family.

title: Disappointed
review: Thank YOU, Suzanne, for taking time to share your experiences here at our hotel.  We're so pleased that JR was able to find satisfactory accommodations for your group despite the fact that it was a busy Easter weekend.  Also very happy to hear you enjoyed the pool and restaurant and found our staff friendly and helpful.  We do hope you'll be back soon and - until that time - we invite you to follow our Facebook Page - Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach for updates.  All best regards,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Miserable, unhelpful and generally rubbish!
review: On the posivtive side :   clean room and friendly staff.   On the downside:   Room was much too expensive for what was offered.  No breakfast ... small rooms and very small bathroom .   A retaining wall instead of beach front.   A five minute walk to the beach.  I was very dissatified and will not recommend this hotel.

title: Nothing Special
review: Dear Alyce:  Thank you for taking the time to express your dissatisfaction with our hotel on your most recent visit with us, which is the first step towards improvement of our services.    Our staff is committed to providing our guests with the highest level of quality and services.  While we are most delighted you found our staff to be friendly and our rooms to be cleaned we are disappointed to hear your dissatisfaction with the overall size and layout of our rooms.   We will be sure to review your comments with our ownership for any future cosmetic changes.   Again, thank you for taking to time to share your comments with us, and we appreciate your business.    Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great hotel!!
review: We have just had the pain of staying at this hotel for 3 nights of our American adventure! We arrived to no spare bed for my 14 year old son as requested..when we phoned reception they couldn't move us, couldn't give us a camp bed ( fire regulations)  so would provide him with bedding to make a bed on the floor..they arrived with 2 pillows and one blanket...oh thanks!!!!!So we phoned reception again and they provided us with a couple more blankets. The room (202..ask not to sleep in that one!!) had some sort of generator right outside the sliding doors which sounded like a train all hours of the day and night. When I approached guest services the morning after arrival in person, they were miserable and unprofessional to say the least..not once did I see one of the staff look…

title: Great hotel in the heart of Tampa!
review: This Holiday Inn offers an ideal location for activities in Tampa, St. Pete and Clearwater. The staff was helpful with directions and information about the local area. The hotel was clean, affordable and accommodating to our large group. The outdoor pool and hot tub were clean and the surrounding grounds were very pretty with a small pond and beautiful plantings.

title: Great staff and location!
review: Thanks for taking time to write us about your recent stay with us.  We're so glad you and your group enjoyed it here, plus all the amenities such as our pool and restaurant.  You are correct, we are centrally located to many wonderful area activities!  Until you can return again, we invite you to follow our Facebook page: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach and even share some of your holiday photos with us if you'd like.  Thanks again  - and we see you're from Beantown but were here during Spring Training time - so we don't know if we should end this by saying, "Go Sox" or "Go Phillies"..... (maybe it depends on how much you like Jonathan Papelbon!)  All the best,  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Items Stolen from Room
review: Stayed here for almost a week. They have very courteous staff -- front desk and housekeeping. They clean the rooms everyday and also called for car service daily for us, special mention to Will. He was very helpful and informative.  Standard rooms had a personal fridge, microwave, coffee maker, iron and board, hair dryer, TV and phone. WiFi is also free.  The hotel is walking distance to the restaurants and stores by the beach and also Pier 60. It was also by the bay so we were able to watch beautiful sunsets by the pool. They have a restaurant that serves great food (seafood too!) and alcohol, with live music. You can dine outside and watch the pelicans and herons feed. If you're lucky, maybe even dolphins!  Will definitely stay here again!

title: Beautiful views from the balcony
review: We're so pleased you took time to review your recent stay with us - thank you!  For sure we will pass on your compliments to Will and our other staff.  We pride ourselves on our great staff who really want our guests to enjoy their holiday experience.  At no extra charge do we offer the entertainment by the seabirds and dolphin!  LOL  We hope you have a great summer, and until you can return, we invite you to follow our Facebook Page: Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Clearwater Beach.  Thanks again!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Stay!
review: Our stay here was great until $100 and an IPod were stolen from our room.  After WEEKS of run-around from the Clearwater hotel managers as well as Holiday Inn customer service, we were told "there is nothing that can be done."  I would think twice about staying here or bringing any items of value to this hotel.  Try Sheppard's or TravelLodge first!!!

title: Good place, suites w/ kid bunkbeds aren't oceanfront
review: Nice place, nice pool.   Hotel is located on the channel; not directly on beach.  That said, very nice pool. If you get a suite with the kids bunkbeds, be warned, none of those suites are on the ocean side, they are all city view.  Room service food is non existent; called multiple times one nite; no answer.  Lots of local restaurants however.

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking time to write a review of your recent stay with us.  We're glad you and your family had a good time and enjoyed time in our beautiful pool.  Hopefully you had time to explore the area and see all that Clearwater has to offer.  We hope you have a nice summer up there in Michigan and will be able to return for another visit in the near future.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: The rooms, restaurant and view of the Gulf were great.
review: A group of 14 of us stayed at this hotel from March 16 to March 21.  Main purpose of the trip was to see the Philadelphia Phillies baseball spring training.  The hotel staff is friendly and helpful with any directions or to answer any questions we had.  The hotel is about 20 minute ride to Brighthouse Field and everything else is within walking distance to everything, including Pier 66.  We ate a few times at Jimmy's Fish House which was good and reasonable.  The Iguana Bar had live music until 11:00 pm every night.  Pool was heated and there were plenty of lounge chairs at any time of the day. Will defentiely stay here again and recommend this hotel to everyone!

title: Horrible Value for the money
review: Thanks so much for taking time to review your stay with us.  So glad you and your buds could escape for a few spring training games, plus a little fun in the sun!  We will pass along your comments to our staff on their friendliness and courtesy, because that is very important to all of us here.  And to know you will return as well as recommend us is all we could possibly ask for---thank you!  Tip:  Follow us on our Facebook Page - Holiday Inn Hotel  Suites Clearwater Beach for year-round updates.  We'll look to see you next year - or hopefully sooner!  Go Phillies!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Location
review: I went here with a group of friends for Phillies Spring Training. We ate at the restaurant there "Jimmy's Fish House" most of the time and it was pretty good. The view of the Gulf was beautiful while we sat by the pool. If you want to sit on the beach you have to walk down the street past 2 condos. It's not too bad, we basically just stayed around the pool. Everyone there was very accommodating.

title: Best place for Breakfast
review: This was our third visit to this hotel. All rooms have been clean and well maintained. This was the smallest, but as I didn't pay for it (used reward points) I can't really complain. Staff are lovely. Food in Jimmy's fish bar is good- especially the giant scallops. Sit outside for breakfast overlooking the sea and get a great, peaceful view.

title: Spring Training visit
review: Thank you so much for taking time to review our hotel!  We're so glad you returned here for your third visit!    Jimmy's Fish House will be happy to hear you like their breakfast -and we can agree on the scallops - they are pretty awesome!  Hope to see you back again - and in the meantime, we welcome you to follow us on our Facebook Page:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites, Clearwater Beach.  Again, we appreciate when you took time to write about your experience.  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Rob,  Niagara on the Lake
review: Stayed at hotel and went to Phillies spring training game. Very satisfied with Holiday Inn. We had a suite that was very spacious and very clean. We loved the chaise lounges overlooking the Gulf, a litttle bit of heaven! Close to everything needed for enjoyable vacation. We would stay again and highly recommend.

title: Perfect!
review: Thank you for taking time to tell us you enjoyed your recent visit with us.  You sure had great weather for the Phillies games!  We hope they do well this season!  Glad you enjoyed your suite, the pool and our other guest facilities.  You are right - our central location makes it easy to explore all the fun things to do in Clearwater Beach.  We'd welcome to have you follow us on our Facebook page:  Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites, Clearwater Beach -- we'll keep you up to date on what is happening until you can return for your next stay!  Again, thanks --- and GO PHILLIES!  Christine Bottger General Manager

title: Great Location
review: Stayed in Clearwater at the Holiday Inn for 4 days at the end of March Break and enjoyed our stay very much. Hotel was excellent,  we stayed in a suite and had plenty of room for a family of 5. The pool area was great with great poolside service for drinks and food.  The onsite restaurant had great food as well. Location was nice, close to the beach, walk about 200 yards and the beach goes for miles. We will be returning.

title: Great stay at the beach!
review: We booked this hotel for a stint in Clearwater for Phillies spring training games. This hotel was right on the water and just a short one-block walk to the beach. We were able to walk to all the bars, restaurants and attractions from the hotel, which was very convenient. Every room also had a balcony which was so great for relaxing on! The drive into Clearwater was only about 10 minutes, so I would recommend staying on the beach rather than in the town itself.  One note is that parking our rental car cost $12 a day which I didn't think was well advertised beforehand, but given that other beach parking was more expensive, this was a good deal. We would definitely stay here again!

title: Third time here, third time impressed
review: As stated this was our third time here escaping the bleak British winter. We always have a gulf view room and this was our first time in a room in the tower above the restaurant. Initially worried about any noise issues it turned out there were none. Had a couple of meals in Iguana bar - lovely! Parking charge still grates tho! Apart from that this is our go-to hotel in florida. Excellent

title: They will lie and keep your money
review: I called and asked if they were on the beach - they lied and said yes. So I booked online using the cheap non-refundable rate. Guess what - they are NOT on the beach, verified by the hotel itself, which I called after reading tripadvisor reviews stating they are not on the beach (I was looking for Clearwater restaurants and such)...yet they will not give me my money back. They hide behind the non-refundable clause. So Holiday Inn will flat out lie and keep your money.

title: Peaseant Stay
review: Our stay was pleaseant.  The hotel was clean.  The pool area was kept immaculate at all times and there was  bar and food service right to your poolsside lounge chair all afternnon.  I thought the food and drink  prices were resaonable.  The lady cleaning our room left towel animals each day which was quite nice.  Parking was only a problem on our last night when the hotel booked three events attended by mostly locals.  The parking lot quickly became full leaving any returning hotel guests without a place to park until very late.  Parking at the hotel costs guests  $12/day.  There are plenty of shops and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

title: Great hotel
review: I've stayed here a couple of times on business; and in my experience, the Holiday Inn Clearwater is excellent value for money. For my needs, the hotel was conveniently located. During each of my stays, I've had views of the Gulf and pool. My room was large and very well-appointed, with a kitchenette and living-room area, two bathrooms and a large bedroom. The restaurant was worth a visit -- good food with decent portions. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Great Views
review: Great place to stay. Nice clean rooms. Awesome views of the Ocean. Wonderful restaurant.

title: Great way to end our vacation!
review: We switched to the holiday inn after checking out early from a hotel nearby that was a huge disappointment.  The Holiday Inn was exactly what we needed to lift our spirits.  We stayed in the king size suite overlooking the water.  The view was beatiful and the room was excellent. We treated ourselves to some spa services as well.  Manicure for me and a massage for my boyfriend.  The staff in the spa was very friendly and we enjoyed our visit.  We also ate in the hotel restaurant for lunch and dinner and we thoroughly enjoyed our meals.  Unfortunately it was too cold for us to get to enoy the huge patio and pool area but it looked beautiful and well maintained.  I will definitely be recommending this place to friends.

title: very nice hotel
review: We stayed 5 nights in a suite here.  Very clean, great view (saw dolphins twice from our balcony), just a short walk to the beach & restaurants.  Having the suite allowed us to have a sitting area, 2 tvs & 2 bathrooms.  The pool was very nice - lots of chairs.  We had breakfast items from the cafe, ice cream bars from the gift shop, played games in the gameroom and ate 3 times in the restaurant.  Every morning at 7am I saw workers wiping down the chairs & tables outside - everything was very clean.  I was very happy with everything.

title: Oh what a night!!!
review: great staff, beautiful accomodations, wonderful pool area, and great gift shop....with a very helpful sales clerk I may add. She sent us to a great shopping area and a good place to eat.

title: Amazing hotel, amazing suite, amazing location!!!
review: My partner and I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights at the end of Jan.  Because of my IHG Platinum membership we got upgraded to a suite - basically this was 2 rooms with access through a connecting door. In one we had a king bed, playstation, balcony, big screen tv, huge bathroom.........in the other a kitchen, living room, playstation/big screen tv, another bathroom with massive marble shower. Room was so nice - weird as I didn't think Holiday Inn had such nice hotels (they don't in UK). Balcony overlooked the Gulf and Sand Key Beach.  Staff were helpful and friendly without being OTT.  Didn't eat/drink in hotel so can't comment on this.  We got free wi fi and there is a computer/printer in the lobby.  Overall, an awesome stay and I would recommend this hotel for location as…

title: Beach getaway
review: We really enjoyed our recent stay here at Clearwater Beach. The hotel is directly on the intercoastal waterway with beautiful views- esp for sunsets! Our room had a big balcony, microwave, and a fridge. Nice coffee shop in the lobby with nice snacks.There is a restaurant next to the pool where live music is played in the afternoon. Heated pool was great for my daughter to swim in. There is a gameroom and a great gift shop next to the pool. There's even a nail/hair salon on the first floor as well. Several great restaurants within walking distance and mini golf. Beautiful white sand beach 1 block away- the sand is so soft almost like flour! Pier 60 a little further down the beach has a great sunset celebration each night. On Fridays and Saturdays for sunset, they play a movie on…

title: Best view in Clearwater Beach
review: Sitting right at the spot where the Gulf of Mexico meets Tampa Bay, this hotel has the best views in Clearwater Beach.
